10.5cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
かの国で開発された艦艇防空用の連装高角砲です。
大型艦艇などに防空火器として装備されました。
建造と工事中止を繰り返したあの航空母艦にも、左右舷側と飛行甲板への背負い式装備が計画されていました。
10.5cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A twin high-angle gun mount for vessel air defense developed in that country.
It was equipped on large vessels as an air defense armament.
Even on that aircraft carrier that repeatedly went between construction and work stoppage, it was planned to be equipped on the broadside and flight deck of the ship in superfiring arrangements.

10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount._info:
防空型駆逐艦の主砲です。
画期的な長砲身半自動装填砲を動力砲塔に備えた「長10cm」と呼ばれた新型の防空用高角砲で、「秋月」型駆逐艦に搭載されました。
複雑な構造のため量産には不向きでしたが、敵機の跳梁を抑える艦隊防空の切り札の一つです。
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount._info_en:
This is the main gun of the anti-air destroyers.
It is a groundbreaking new model anti-air gun called the "Long 10 cm" had long barrel high-angle guns, with semi-automatic loading, and a powered turret, and was equipped on the "Akizuki-class" destroyers.
Its complex design made it difficult to mass-produce, but it was a key part of the fleet's defense against the air superiority of enemy aircraft.
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount._reading: 10せんちれんそうこうかくほう

10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount (Carriage._info:
「長10cm」と呼ばれた長砲身の新型高性能防空用高角砲、その大型艦対空火器バージョンです。
複雑な構造のため量産には不向きでしたが、敵機の跳梁から大切な艦と艦隊を守る艦隊防空の切り札です。
航空母艦や戦艦、巡洋艦などの大型艦の副砲として運用可能です。
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount (Carriage._info_en:
The "Long 10 cm" new long gun barrel, which was called the high-performance air defense high-angle gun, is a large ship-to-air secondary firearm.
Unable to be mass produced because of the complicated structure, it is the trump card for fleet air defense to protect your precious fleet from aerial attacker.
Whether aircraft carrier or battleship, you can operate this as a large ship secondary gun.
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount (Carriage._reading: 10せんちれんそうこうかくほう(ほうか)

10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Anti-Ai._info:
「長10cm砲」といわれる10cm連装高角砲と「94式高射装置」の組み合わせによる、艦隊防空システムです。
量産性が低く、また射撃装置は列強の最新鋭には劣りますが、優秀な長10cm砲と高射装置の組み合わせは艦隊の傘として十分に活躍します。
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Anti-Ai._info_en:
A fleet air defense system created by combining the 10 cm twin high-angle gun "Long 10 cm" guns and the "Type 94 Anti-Air Fire Director".
It was unable to be mass produced and the fire director was inferior to the state-of-the-art ones used by the great powers, but the combination of the Long 10 cm Gun and the fire director was still able to function as an air defense umbrella for the fleet.
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Anti-Ai._name: 10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Anti-Aircraft Fire Director
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Anti-Ai._reading: 10せんちれんそうこうかくほう+こうしゃそうち

10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Battery C._info:
画期的な長砲身半自動装填砲を動力砲塔に備えた「長10cm」と呼ばれた新型の防空用高角砲で、「秋月」型駆逐艦に採用された、新型連装高角砲。
複雑な構造のため量産には不向きでしたが、敵機の跳梁を抑える艦隊防空の切り札の一つでした。
改「大和」型への装備も検討された同高角砲を集中配備、連携する高射装置と共に艦、そして艦隊を守ります！
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Battery C._info_en:
The "Long 10 cm" is a revolutionary long-barrelled autoloading gun in a powered turret. It is a new model of twin high-angle gun meant as an anti-air high-angle gun that was mounted on the "Akizuki-class" destroyers.
Due to its complexity, it wasn't able to be mass-produced. Despite that, it still formed a key component of the fleet's air defenses against enemy air dominance.
These high-angle guns were expected to be mounted on the upgraded "Yamato-class" in a concentrated emplacement and paired with an anti-air fire director to protect the ship and the fleet!
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Battery C._japanese_name: 10cm連装高角砲群 集中配備
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Battery C._name: 10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Battery Concentrated Deployment

10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Add._info:
優れた艦隊防空能力を持つ長10cm高角砲。
同砲の大型艦対空装備用の改良兵装です。
秋月型防空駆逐艦などに装備された長10cm高角砲の大型艦搭載用改良バージョンに、増設機銃集中配備を組み合わせた対空兵装パッケージです。
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Add._info_en:
The long 10 cm high-angle gun has excellent fleet air-defense capability.
This equipment is a version of said gun upgraded for air defense on large ships.
It combines the upgraded version of the 10 cm gun mounted on the Akizuki-class air-defense destroyers with concentrated deployments of additional machine guns to form an air-defense package.
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Add._name: 10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Additional Machine Guns
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Add._reading: 10cmれんそうこうかくほう+ぞうせつきじゅう

10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Ant._info:
「長10cm砲」といわれる10cm連装高角砲と「94式高射装置」の組み合わせによる艦隊防空システム、その改良型です。
射撃装置や量産性は列強の最新鋭装備には劣りますが、優秀な長10cm砲と高射装置の改良型の組み合わせは、日本水上艦隊の傘として有効な防空戦力です。
精強な秋月型防空駆逐艦による運用で、敵の圧力から艦隊を護り切れ！
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Ant._info_en:
This is an improved version of the fleet air defense system, which combines a 10 cm twin anti-aircraft gun known as the "Long 10 cm" guns with the "Type 94 Anti-Air Fire Director".
Although its firing system and mass-production capabilities were inferior to those of the other world powers' state-of-the-art equipment, the combination of its excellent 10 cm cannon and improved anti-aircraft fire director, made it an effective air defense force for the Japanese surface fleet.
Protect your fleet from enemy pressure by using the powerful Akizuki-class anti-aircraft destroyers!
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Ant._name: 10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Anti-Aircraft Fire Director Kai
10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Ant._reading: 10せんちれんそうこうかくほうかい+こうしゃそうちかい

12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._card_name: 12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Type 94 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director
12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._card_reading: 12.7せんちれんそうこうかくほう+94しきこうしゃそうち
12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._info:
巡洋艦以上の大型艦の標準的な対空兵装として搭載された12.7cm連装高角砲と「94式高射装置」の組み合わせによる、艦隊防空システムです。
発射速度や砲の旋回速度にやや難がありますが、高角砲と高射装置の組み合わせは艦隊の傘として重要な兵装です。
12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._info_en:
The 12.7 cm high angle gun with "Type 94 AA Fire Director" combination is the fleet's standard AA defense system used aboard cruisers or other larger warships.
While its fire rate and traverse rate is a bit sluggish, this high-angle gun with a director serves as the umbrella of the fleet against air attacks.
12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._list_name: 12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount + Anti-Aircraft Fire Director
12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._list_reading: 12.7せんちれんそうこうかくほう+こうしゃそうち
12.7cm High-angle Gun + Anti-Aircraft Fi._reading: 12.7せんちこうかくほう+こうしゃそうち

12.7cm Single Gun Mount._info:
Z1型駆逐艦に搭載された、かの国の駆逐艦主砲です。
単装砲ではありますが、対艦・対地射撃では優れた火砲です。
本兵装は残念ながら対空戦闘には不向きです。
12.7cm Single Gun Mount._info_en:
This was the main gun of destroyers from that country, it was equipped on the Z1-class destroyers.
Although it was just a single-mount, it was a good gun for anti-ship and anti-ground shelling.
Unfortunately, this gun is unsuited for anti-air combat.

12.7cm Single High-angle Gun Mount (Late._info:
駆逐艦や海防艦などに装備された両用砲です。
特筆する高い性能を誇るわけではありませんが、対艦、対地、対空、いずれの戦闘も可能なある程度実用的な両用砲として、
後期の小型戦闘艦艇に装備されました。
12.7cm Single High-angle Gun Mount (Late._info_en:
A dual-purpose gun equipped by destroyers and coastal defense ships.
It didn't boast particularly good performance but it was a dual-purpose gun capable of anti-ship, anti-ground, and anti-air combat.
It was equipped on late-war small-sized combat ships.

12.7cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
日本海軍最後の量産型駆逐艦である丁型駆逐艦用に開発された単装両用砲です。
運用実績の豊富な八九式12.7cm連装高角砲を単装化、防盾付き艦載両用砲として再整備されました。
本砲は、さらに発射速度などの向上を図ったその改良型です。
松型駆逐艦を始め、一部の艦艇でより効果的な運用が可能です。
12.7cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
This is a dual-purpose single mount developed for use aboard the Japanese Navy’s last mass-produced destroyer line: The Type D destroyers.
The successful Type 89 12.7 cm twin high-angle mount was reintroduced into service as a shielded, dual-purpose single-mount.
This improved model incorporates planned upgrades for a higher rate of fire.
It will display increased combat effectiveness when mounted on certain vessels, such as the new Matsu-class destroyers.

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
艦隊型駆逐艦の主砲です。
防盾で全周を遮蔽、弾片や荒天対策を施しており、また動力操法も採用した近代的な小型艦の主砲で、多くの主力駆逐艦に採用されました。
あまり仰角はとれず、対空射撃は少し苦手です。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
The main gun of fleet destroyers.
It has an enclosed, shielded turret that protects it against shrapnel and stormy weather. It also has powered turrets. It served as the main gun of modern small ships and many frontline destroyers.
It isn't good at anti-air because of its low maximum elevation.

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A._info:
世界に衝撃を与えた特型駆逐艦、その初期型である吹雪型に採用された駆逐艦主砲A型です。
防盾で全集を遮蔽して弾片及び荒天対策に対応、比較的軽量で当時としては優れた駆逐艦装備でした。
平射砲であるため、対空射撃には不向きです。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A._info_en:
This is the Model A main gun used by the early-model Fubuki-class, the special-type destroyers that shocked the world.
With a covered turret that protected against shrapnel and stormy seas, this was a lightweight and outstanding destroyer gun for its time.
Being a low-angle gun, it is not suited for anti-aircraft use.

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 2._info:
特I型駆逐艦に採用された駆逐艦主砲、その改良型です。
防盾で全周を遮蔽、弾片や荒天対策を施しており、動力操砲も採用した近代的駆逐艦用主砲の先駆けである本兵装を改良、特I型での運用性と精度を向上させています。
ただし、本質的には平射砲であるため、対空戦闘には不向きです。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 2._info_en:
An improved version of the destroyer main gun used on the Special Type I destroyers.
It has an enclosed, shielded turret that protects it against shrapnel and stormy weather. It also has powered turrets. It was the precursor to modern destroyer main guns. It has increased accuracy when equipped on Special Type I destroyers.
However, it is primarily meant for shelling so it is unsuited for anti-air combat.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 2._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 2
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 2._reading: 12.7センチれんそうほうAがたかいに

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 3 (War._info:
旧式化したA型砲、その余剰装備を元に全面改修を実施、両用砲に換装した戦時改修if駆逐艦主砲です。
最大仰角、装填機構の換装、高射装置との連動も含め、従来のA型砲とは全く別の特型駆逐艦用主砲兵装となっています。
両用砲として、ある程度対空戦闘も可能です。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 3 (War._info_en:
A what-if remodel of what would happen if the remaining obsolete Type-A guns underwent an extensive mid-war upgrade and conversion into dual-purpose main guns for destroyers.
With improved maximum elevation and loading mechanisms, as well as being combined with a fire director, this Type-A gun has become a completely new main gun for the Special-Type destroyers.
As a dual-purpose gun, it is capable of limited anti-air combat.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 3 (War._japanese_name: 12.7cm連装砲A型改三(戦時改修)+高射装置
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 3 (War._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model A Kai 3 (Wartime Modification) + Anti-Aircraft Fire Director

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 2._info:
艦隊型駆逐艦の主砲のマイナーチェンジバージョンです。
基本形と同様、防盾で全周を遮蔽、弾片や荒天対策を施しており、また本バージョンでは仰角範囲等も改良されました。
駆逐艦夕立等に搭載されたとも云われています。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 2._info_en:
This is a slightly improved version of the main guns of fleet destroyers.
Similar to the base model, it has a shielded, enclosed turret that protects against shrapnel and stormy weather. This version has had its maximum elevation improved.
It was equipped on the destroyer Yuudachi.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 2._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 2
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 2._reading: 12.7せんちれんそうほうBがたかいに

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 4 (War._info:
やや旧式化したB型砲の余剰装備に全面改修を実施、両用砲に換装した戦時改修if駆逐艦主砲です。
現実的な対空戦闘に対応するため、最大仰角、装填機構の換装、高射装置との連動等、従来のB型砲とは全く別の駆逐艦用兵装に昇華しています。
特II型以降、初春型、白露型などでの装備運用を想定して改修され、両用砲として対空戦闘も可能です。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 4 (War._info_en:
A what-if remodel of what would happen if the remaining semi-obsolete Type-B guns underwent an extensive mid-war upgrade and conversion into dual-purpose main guns for destroyers.
In order to deal with the realities of anti-air combat, maximum elevation, and loading mechanisms have been improved. With the combination of a fire director, this Type-B gun has become an entirely new destroyer weapon.
It was meant to be equipped on the Special Type II, Special Type III, Hatsuharu-class, and Shiratsuyu-class after their upgrades. This dual-purpose gun is capable of anti-air combat.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 4 (War._japanese_name: 12.7cm連装砲B型改四(戦時改修)+高射装置
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 4 (War._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 4 (Wartime Modification) + Anti-Aircraft Fire Director
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 4 (War._reading: 12.7せんちれんそうほうBがたかいよん（せんじかいしゅう）+こうしゃそうち

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2._info:
中期以降の艦隊型駆逐艦に搭載された主砲のif改修型です。
防盾の全周遮蔽による弾片荒天対策、動力操法採用はそのまま、数々の戦訓を取り入れた改修を実施した、小型艦艇用の
熟成された小口径主砲です。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2._info_en:
This is a what-if remodel of the main guns equipped on fleet destroyers during the mid to late war.
It is a small-caliber main gun for use on small-sized ships that incorporates lessons learned during the war.
Shielding against shrapnel and storms has been improved and it is now servo-powered.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2._reading: 12.7センチれんそうほうCがたかいに

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3._info:
艦隊型日本駆逐艦に搭載された主砲のif改修型です。
本来D型砲への繋ぎ的存在だったC型砲に、数々の戦訓を取り入れた実戦的な改修を実施、対空戦には不向きですが、白露型・朝潮型・陽炎型、特に陽炎型駆逐艦の改装艦に最適化され、白露型の最後の一隻となった艦の改装艦の装備としても有効な、水上電探との運用も考慮された日本駆逐艦用改修if兵装です。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3._info_en:
A what-if upgraded version of the main gun mounted on Japanese fleet destroyers.
The Model C was meant as a stop-gap model preceding the Model D. This gun has been given an upgrade incorporating several lessons learned in combat. It is unsuitable for anti-air use. It is optimized for use on the Shiratsuyu-class, Asashio-class, and Kagerou-class. It is extra effective on remodeled versions of Kagerou-class ships and the last or the Shiratsuyu-class. This what-if Japanese destroyer equipment can also be used alongside surface RADAR.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3 H._info:
艦隊型日本駆逐艦に搭載された主砲のif改修型です。
本来D型砲への繋ぎ的存在だったC型砲に、数々の戦訓を取り入れた実践的な改修を実施。
さらに、対空近接防御として25mm機銃専用機銃座を新設し、対空及び水上電探との連携運用も考慮した日本駆逐艦用兵装です。
春の雨の名を冠する駆逐艦にも最適な、限定的ながら対空戦闘にも有効な改修駆逐艦兵装です。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3 H._info_en:
A what-if upgraded version of the main gun mounted on Japanese fleet destroyers.
The Model C that was meant as a stop-gap model preceding the Model D, has been given an upgrade incorporating several lessons learned in combat.
Additionally, a new 25 mm machine gun mount has been installed for close-range anti-aircraft defense, and this weapon is designed for use in conjunction with Japanese destroyer's anti-aircraft and surface detection systems.
It is a modified destroyer weapon that is ideal for the destroyer that bears the name of Spring Rain, being also reasonably effective in anti-aircraft combat.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3 H._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 3 H

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 2._info:
夕雲型駆逐艦などに搭載された駆逐艦主砲のif改修型です。
最大仰角を大きく設定しましたが、装填システムの基本構造は従来通りのため対空能力は限定的です。
ただし、数々の実戦の戦訓を取り入れた改修により、甲型及び丙型駆逐艦での運用において、優れた砲戦能力を発揮します。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 2._info_en:
A what-if upgrade of the destroyer main gun that was mounted on the Yuugumo-class destroyers.
It has a much higher maximum elevation but because the loading system is more or less the same, its anti-air capabilities are limited.
However, thanks to the improvements made by incorporating lessons learned in live combat, it will display excellent shelling power when equipped on Type-A and Type-C destroyers.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 2._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 2

12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 3._info:
夕雲型駆逐艦などに搭載された駆逐艦主砲のif改修型です。
対空戦闘用に最大仰角を大きくとることに加え、装填システムを改良、仰角時の装填と発射速度の向上に成功したif改良D型主砲です。
数々の実戦の戦訓を取り入れた改修により、甲型及び改甲型駆逐艦での運用において、優れた戦闘力を発揮します。
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 3._info_en:
A what-if version of the destroyer main guns that were mounted on the Yuugumo-class destroyers.
In addition to increasing the maximum elevation angle for anti-aircraft combat, this is an improved D-type main gun that has an improved loading system and has succeeded in increasing loading at elevation angle and firing rate.
It incorporates many lessons learned in combat and will have outstanding performance on Type-A and Improved Type-A destroyers.
12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 3._name: 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 3

12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount._info:
標準的な対空高角砲です。
量産に向いた構造で経済性も高く、戦艦や空母、巡洋艦などに広く搭載されました。
発射速度や旋回速度にやや難がありますが、重要な対空火器です。
12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount._info_en:
Standard anti-air high-angle gun.
Structured for mass production and aimed for economic efficiency, it’s widely equipped in battleships, carriers, and cruisers.
Although there is some difficulty in turning speed and rate of fire, it is an important anti-aircraft gun.
12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount._reading: 12.7せんちれんそうこうかくほう

12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount (Late M._info:
標準的な対空高角砲の後期改良型です。
量産に向いた構造で経済性も高く、量産両用砲として優れた性能を誇ります。
課題のひとつである旋回速度等も改善された、頼りになる対空火器です。
12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount (Late M._info_en:
A late-model, improved version of the standard anti-air high-angle gun.
It had a design that lent itself to mass production and low costs. This resulted in a mass-produced high-angle gun that boasted good performance.
It is a reliable anti-air weapon that has improved rotation speed.
12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount (Late M._reading: 12.7せんちれんそうこうかくほう(こうきがた)

12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
日本海軍最後の量産型駆逐艦である丁型駆逐艦などに搭載された運用実績の豊富な八九式12.7cm連装高角砲、その強化改良型です。
戦訓により従来型に対して発射速度等の向上を図った本改良型は、松型駆逐艦を始め一部の艦艇で運用することで、より効果的な戦闘力を発揮することが可能です。
12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
This is the improved version of the successful Type 89 12.7 cm twin high-angle gun, mounted aboard the Japanese Navy’s last mass-produced destroyer line: The Type D destroyers.
This improved model was designed to have a higher rate of fire based on lessons learned during the war, gaining increased combat effectiveness when mounted on the first batch of Matsu-class destroyers to join the fleet.

12.7mm Single Machine Gun Mount._info:
対空機銃です。
対空兵装として、主に駆逐艦などに装備されました。
より強力な25mm機銃への更新が進んでいます。
12.7mm Single Machine Gun Mount._info_en:
An anti-aircraft machine gun.
As an anti-aircraft weapon, it was mostly equipped on destroyers.
It was replaced by the more powerful 25 mm Single Autocannon Mount.

120mm/50 Twin Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生み出した連装の小艦艇用主砲兵装です。
口径は同クラスの日本海軍の主力駆逐艦の主砲より小さいものの、優れた機構と高いポテンシャルをもった新型小口径火砲です。
120mm/50 Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A twin-mounted gun produced in the country of pasta as the main armament of small ships.
Although its caliber is smaller than that of IJN front-line destroyers, it is still a new model small caliber gun with good machinery and high potential.

120mm/50 Twin Gun Mount Kai A.mod.1937._info:
パスタの国が生んだ連装の小艦艇用主砲兵装です。
口径は同クラスの日本海軍の主力駆逐艦の主砲より小さいものの、優れた機構と高いポテンシャルをもった新型小口径火砲。
本兵装は、別のメーカーで製造されたその改良後期型で、長く生き延びた駆逐艦「Grecale」にも装備されました。
120mm/50 Twin Gun Mount Kai A.mod.1937._info_en:
A twin-mounted gun produced in the country of pasta as the main armament for small ships.
Although it has a smaller caliber than comparable IJN destroyer guns, it is a new model small caliber gun with excellent mechanisms and great potential.
These improved late-model guns were produced by a different manufacturer and equipped on the long-lived "Grecale".

120mm/50 Twin Gun Mount mod.1936._info:
パスタの国が生んだ連装の小艦艇用主砲兵装です。
口径は同クラスの日本海軍の主力駆逐艦の主砲より小さいものの、優れた機構と高いポテンシャルをもった新型小口径火砲。本砲は、その改良後期型です。
120mm/50 Twin Gun Mount mod.1936._info_en:
A twin-mounted gun produced in the country of pasta as the main armament for small ships.
Although it has a smaller caliber than comparable IJN destroyer guns, it is a new model small caliber gun with excellent mechanisms and great potential. This gun is an improved late-model.

12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher._info:
12cm30連装噴進砲は、艦載用対空ロケットランチャーです。
四式ロケット式焼霰弾（ロサ弾）を30連発で連続発射する脅威の弾幕は、肉薄する敵艦載機から味方艦を護ります。
ぜひ、改装した伊勢・日向に満載して、敵空母の猛攻を突破してください！
12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher._info_en:
The 12 cm 30-tube launcher is an anti-aircraft rocket launcher for ships.
The threatening barrage that fires 30 consecutive rocket-type shrapnel shells (RoSa shells) protects allies from fragile enemy carrier-based aircraft.
By all means, pack these onto the refurbished Ise and Hyuuga and break through the onslaught of enemy aircraft carriers!
12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher._reading: 12せんち30れんそうふんしんほう

12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher Kai 2._info:
艦載用対空ロケットランチャー「12cm30連装噴進砲」をさらに戦訓によって改良した強化改修型です。
後方ブラスト対策や再装填、さらに射撃装置にも改良を加え、噴進式対空焼霰弾連続発射の弾幕により、肉薄する敵機から味方艦を護る能力はさらに向上しました。
「伊勢改」及び「日向改」では、さらに高い防空効果を発揮します。
12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher Kai 2._info_en:
An improved variant of the ship-based anti-air rocket launcher, the "12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher", further refined by lessons learned in combat.
With improvements to backblast countermeasures, reloading, and even fire control, the ability of the launcher's continuous rocket barrage of incendiary anti-air shrapnel to shield friendly ships from thinly armored enemy aircraft has further improved.
"Ise Kai" and "Hyuuga Kai" high anti-air effectiveness stands out further with this.
12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher Kai 2._reading: 12せんち30れんそうふんしんほうかいに

12cm Single Gun Mount._info:
旧型の小型砲です。
旧型駆逐艦に標準的主砲として搭載されました。
装填・操砲も人力ですが、シンプルな構造で経済性も高く、駆逐艦や海防艦等の主砲として、長く使われました。
対空射撃には不向きです。
12cm Single Gun Mount._info_en:
This is an old model small-caliber gun.
It was equipped on older destroyers as their main armament.
Both loading and rotation were manual, but with its simple construction and low cost, it served a long time as the main weapon of destroyers and coastal defense ships.
It cannot be used for anti-air.

12cm Single Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
旧型駆逐艦に標準的主砲として搭載された小口径主砲の改良型です。
装填・操砲も人力ですが、シンプルな構造で経済性も高く、駆逐艦や海防艦等の主砲として、長く使われました本兵装を戦訓を取り入れて改良、実戦時の運用性を大きく向上させています。
残念ながら対空射撃には不向きです。
12cm Single Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
An improved version of the small caliber main gun that was mounted as the standard main armament of older model destroyers.
Although its loading and traverse mechanisms are still manual, its simple design and low cost have allowed it to remain the main gun of destroyers and coastal defense ships for a long time. This upgraded version incorporates lessons learned during the war to significantly increase its usability in combat.
Unfortunately, it is unsuitable for anti-air combat.

12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount._info:
標準的な対空高角砲です。
量産に向いた構造で経済性も高く、後期の駆逐艦や海防艦、輸送船などにも搭載されました。
襲いかかる敵機に蟷螂の斧ですが対抗します。
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount._info_en:
A standardized high-angle anti-aircraft gun.
With a structure that was made for mass production and is highly economical, late destroyers, escort destroyers as well as transport ships were equipped with it.
It was made to shoot down courageous but doomed attacking enemy aircraft.
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount._reading: 12せんちたんそうこうかくほう

12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount + 25mm._info:
補給艦・潜水母艦・揚陸艦・工作艦などの戦場での生残性を向上させる増設火器兵装群です。
旧式火器や一般的な機銃などの増備による兵装ですが、前線や航行中の敵航空戦力などの攻撃に対して、非力な低武装水上艦の抵抗力を高めることが可能です。
また、これら低武装艦での運用では、改修によってより効果を高めることも可能です。
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount + 25mm._info_en:
This is a group of additional firearms that improves the survivability of fleet oilers, submarine tenders, amphibious assault ships, repair ships, etc. on the battlefield.
Although it is equipped with old-style firearms and regular machine guns, it is possible to increase the resistance of a weak and low-armed surface ship against attacks from enemy air forces on the front lines or during navigation.
In addition, when operating on these low-armed ships, it is possible to improve their effectiveness with improvements.
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount + 25mm._name: 12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount + 25mm Machine Guns Additions

12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E._info:
やや旧式ながら実績のある単装高角砲、その後期艦載型です。
量産に向いた構造で経済性が高く、後期の量産海防艦に搭載され、雲霞のような敵艦載機に立ち向かいます。
御蔵型、日振型、そして鵜来型、さらに小型簡略化された丙型及び丁型海防艦でも装備運用されました。
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E._info_en:
This is a version of the rather old but proven single high-angle gun that was mounted on ships during the late-war period.
It was cheap and easy to mass produce and was mounted on the mass-produced coastal defense ships late in the war where it faced swarms of enemy planes.
It was used by the Mikura, Hiburi, and Ukuru classes as well as the simplified C and D types coastal defense ships.
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E._name: 12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E

12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E._info:
量産に向いた構造で経済性が高く、後期生産型の海防艦に搭載され、雲霞のような敵艦載機に立ち向かった艦艇用高角主砲の改良型です。
給弾機構を改良、射撃速度及び応答性を大きく向上、さらに改修によって高い潜在能力を発揮する、小型艦艇に最適の両用砲として熟成されたif改修単装高角砲です。
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E._info_en:
It has a structure suitable for mass production and is highly economical. It is an improved version of the high-angle main gun for ships, which was mounted on late-production coastal defense ships and fought against hoards of enemy carrier planes.
This one is an upgraded what if single-mount high-angle gun that has been matured as a dual-purpose gun, ideal for small ships, with an improved ammunition mechanism, greatly improved shooting speed and responsiveness, and has a higher potential with upgrades.
12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E._name: 12cm Single High-angle Gun Mount Model E Kai

13.8cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
トリコロールの国で建造された新鋭大型駆逐艦、その主兵装として装備された主砲兵装です。
駆逐艦兵装としては強力な13.8cm砲を、連装で密閉型の砲塔に装備しました。
最新性の高速大型駆逐艦Mogador級に4基8門装備されました。
13.8cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
This is the main gun that was fitted as the primary armament on state-of-the-art large destroyers built in the tricolor country.
For a destroyer armament, it was equipped with powerful 13.8 cm guns mounted in twin enclosed turrets.
The latest high-speed large destroyers, the Mogador-class, are equipped with eight guns in four turrets.

13.8cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
トリコロールの国で建造された新鋭大型駆逐艦、その主兵装として装備された主砲兵装、その改修型です。
新型の高速大型駆逐艦Mogador級に装備された、連装で密閉型の小型艦主砲兵装、その後期改良型です。
ぜひ、Mogador級などのフランス艦で積極運用を！
13.8cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
This is an improved version of the main gun that was equipped as the main armament of a new large destroyer constructed in the tricolor country.
This is a later improved version of the twin enclosed, small shipboard main gun armament fitted to the new high-speed large destroyers, the Mogador-class.
We encourage you to actively use it on French ships such as the Mogador-class!

130mm B-13 Twin Gun Mount._info:
北の国の小型艦艇用の主砲です。
優れた火力を持つ本砲は大型の嚮導駆逐艦などにも装備され、対陸上砲撃などでも成果を上げました。
урааааааа!
130mm B-13 Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A main gun for small-sized ships from a Northern country.
This gun had good firepower and was mounted on large-sized destroyer leaders. It was also used successfully to shell land targets.
Hurrah!

14cm Single Gun Mount._info:
巡洋艦の主砲や戦艦の副砲として独自開発された中距離砲です。
やや旧式化していますが、列強の15cm砲とほぼ同等の射程と威力を持っています。
対艦対地専門で、対空射撃はできません。
14cm Single Gun Mount._info_en:
A medium-ranged gun that was developed domestically as the main gun of light cruisers and secondary gun of battleships.
Although it is slightly obsolete, it still has range and power comparable to 15 cm guns from the other major powers.
It is designed for surface combat so it is unable to be used for anti-air.

14cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
巡洋艦等の主砲として開発された中距離砲の連装型です。
練習巡洋艦「香取」や軽巡洋艦「夕張」などに搭載されました。
対艦対地用の兵装です。
14cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
This is the twin-mounted version of the medium-caliber guns developed for cruisers.
It was equipped on the training cruiser "Katori" and the light cruiser "Yuubari".
It is a weapon capable of anti-ship and anti-ground shelling.

14cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
軽巡洋艦や練習巡洋艦の主砲として搭載された中口径連装砲、その改良強化型です。
香取型練習巡洋艦「香取」「鹿島」や軽巡洋艦「夕張」、水上機母艦「日進」に搭載された主砲兵装の改良型です。
対空戦闘には向きませんが、対艦対地戦闘には有効です。
14cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
An improved version of a medium caliber twin gun mount equipped as the main armament of light cruisers and training cruisers.
The improved version of a naval weapon used on the Katori-class training cruisers "Katori" and "Kashima", the light cruiser "Yuubari", and the seaplane sender "Nisshin".
While not fit for anti-aircraft combat, they are effective as anti-ship and coast bombardment weaponry.

14cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
軽巡洋艦や練習巡洋艦の主砲として搭載された中口径連装砲、そのif改良強化型です。
改二改装された「夕張改二」各型、さらに練習巡洋艦「香取」「鹿島」や、水上機母艦「日進」などの水上機母艦に対応したif改良型主砲兵装で、対空戦闘には不向きですが、対艦対地戦闘などに有効な戦闘力を発揮します。
14cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
This is an improved what if version of the medium caliber twin gun mount, used as the main armament of some light and training cruisers.
This what if improvement is compatible with each form of the remodeled cruiser "Yubari Kai Ni", as well as the training cruisers "Katori" and "Kashima", and seaplane tenders such as "Nisshin". Although unsuitable for anti-aircraft warfare, it exhibits effective combat power in anti-ship and anti-ground combat.
14cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._reading: 14センチれんそうほうかいに

14inch/45 Triple Gun Mount._info:
米国の低速戦艦のスタンダード、いわゆる標準型戦艦コンセプトで誕生したネヴァダ級戦艦。
その主砲兵装として開発されたUSS初採用の三連装大口径戦艦主砲です。
同級の進水は1910年代前半ですが、背負い式に装備した連装砲と共に、集中防御方式と四基十門のバランスのよい高い火力を誇ります。
14inch/45 Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
The Nevada-class battleship was born from the so-called standard battleship concept, the standard for low-speed battleships in the United States.
It is a triple large-caliber battleship main gun that was developed for the first to be used on an USN ship.
Although the said class was launched in the early 1910s, it presented great firepower balance, with an all-or-nothing armor, and ten guns split on four turrets, with two upper-firing twin turrets.

14inch/45 Twin Gun Mount._info:
主力戦艦の主兵装として、米国で開発運用された戦艦用大口径主砲です。
標準型戦艦として整備されたネヴァダ級戦艦やその前級のニューヨーク級戦艦などに装備されました。
低速戦艦の標準型戦艦、大火力と集中防御方式を採用したネヴァダ級では同砲の三連装バージョンと混合搭載となります。
14inch/45 Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A large-caliber battleship main gun developed and operated in the United States as the main armament of their battleships.
It was installed on the Nevada-class battleships, which was a continuation of the standard battleship, and their predecessors, the New York-class battleships.
The standard low-speed battleship, the Nevada-class, which employs large firepower and a concentrated defense system, was also equipped with a triple-barreled version of the same gun.

15.2cm Single Gun Mount._info:
英国開発のものを国産化、「金剛」型戦艦や「扶桑」型戦艦の副砲として搭載されました。
「伊勢」型戦艦以降は改良軽量型14cm砲が搭載されるようになりました。
対空射撃は不可能で、後に近代化改修に伴い、対空火器増設や軽量化のため、表舞台から去っていきました。
15.2cm Single Gun Mount._info_en:
Knocking down British-made gun, this weapon was utilized as secondary guns on the "Kongo-class" and the "Fuso-class".
After the "Ise-class" the renewed, lightened variant of 14 cm caliber was adopted.
Anti-air firing was impossible; during later modernizations, these guns either gave their way to anti-air weapons or were taken down for weight reduction.

15.2cm Triple Gun Mount._info:
トリコロールの国で開発された副砲です。
軽巡クラスに搭載する主砲としても運用されました。
ぜひ「Richelieu」級戦艦に搭載して、主砲＋主砲+副砲運用を！
15.2cm Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
Secondary guns from the tricolore country.
Also used on light cruisers as main guns.
Certainly use this on "Richelieu-class" battleships in a Main+Main+Secondaries combination!

15.2cm Triple Main Gun Mount._info:
トリコロールの国で建造された軽巡級の主砲兵装、その改修型です。
特徴ある迷彩仕様となる「Gloire」などのLa Galissonnière級軽巡の主砲兵装として運用されます。
改修して迷彩仕様となったフランス生まれの軽巡「Gloire」で運用するのもいいですね！
15.2cm Triple Main Gun Mount._info_en:
This is an improved version of the light cruiser main gun armament built in the Tricolor country.
It is used as the main gun armament for La Galissonnière-class light cruisers such as the "Gloire" in her distinctive camouflage designs.
It would also be nice to operate it on the French light cruiser "Gloire" that has been refitted and repainted in a camouflage patern!

15.2cm Triple Main Gun Mount Kai._info:
トリコロールの国で建造された軽巡級の主砲兵装です。
後に特徴ある迷彩仕様となる「Gloire」などのLa Galissonnière級軽巡の主砲兵装として運用されました。
改修して、特徴ある迷彩仕様にするのもいいですね。
15.2cm Triple Main Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
This is a light cruiser main gun armament built in the Tricolor country.
It is a later version used as the main gun armament for La Galissonnière-class light cruisers such as the "Gloire", which was given a distinctive camouflage design.
It would also be nice to renovate her and give her a distinctive camouflage design.

15.2cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
新型軽巡のために開発された新型の両用砲です。
対巡洋艦戦闘に重きをおいた新設計の軽巡主砲で、限定的ですが対空戦闘も可能です。
阿賀野型軽巡シリーズに装備されました。
15.2cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A new type of dual-purpose gun developed for a new class of light cruisers.
It was a new design of light cruiser guns that emphasized combat with other cruisers but also possessed limited anti-air capabilities.
It was equipped on the Agano-class light cruisers.

15.2cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
阿賀野型軽巡シリーズの主兵装として開発された両用砲の改良改修型です。
対巡洋艦戦闘に重きをおいた新設計の軽巡主砲で、限定的ですが対空戦闘も可能です。
改修により精度が若干向上しました。軽巡にフィットした新型の主砲兵装です。
15.2cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
The improved and revised model of the dual-purpose gun developed as the main armament for the Agano-class light cruisers.
It was a new design of light cruiser guns that emphasized combat with other cruisers but also possessed limited anti-air capabilities.
This upgrade slightly improves its accuracy. It is a new model main gun that fits light cruisers.

15.2cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
阿賀野型軽巡シリーズの主兵装として開発された両用砲の性能向上改良型です。
対巡洋艦戦闘に重きをおいた新設計の軽巡主砲で、限定的ですが対空戦闘も可能。
改良によりさらに運用性が向上しました。
特に阿賀野型に最適化された、最新鋭if中口径主砲兵装です。
15.2cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
An improved version of the dual-purpose gun developed as the main armament of the Agano-class light cruisers.
It is a newly developed gun intended for engaging other cruisers and is capable of limited anti-air combat.
Improvements have enhanced its handling further.
It is a state-of-the-art what-if medium caliber gun that works best on the Agano-class.

15.5cm Triple Gun Mount._info:
条約下で保有数に制限のあった重巡を、火力を増強した強力な軽巡で補うために開発されました。
初の三連装砲でしたが、射程・発射速度・運用面全てに高い評価を得ることになりました。
後に有名な「大和」型戦艦の副砲としても採用されています。
対空戦にも効果を発揮する傑作砲です。
15.5cm Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
To cover the shortfall of heavy cruisers that were limited by the Treaty, this gun was developed to produce powerful light cruisers.
It was the first 3-gun turret with excellent range, fire rate, and operability.
It was later adopted as secondary guns of the Yamato-class battleships.
It is a masterpiece that can also be used for anti-air.

15.5cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info:
条約下で保有制限のあった重巡を火力を増強した強力な軽巡で補うために開発された三連装主砲です。
射程・発射速度・運用性等のバランスに優れ、対空戦もある程度可能な傑作砲となりました。
後に有名な「大和」型戦艦の副砲としても採用されています。
本砲は、大型軽巡などでの運用で熟成・改修を重ねた同改良主砲です。
15.5cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
To cover the shortfall of heavy cruisers that were limited by the Treaty, this gun was developed to produce powerful light cruisers.
It is a masterpiece that had a good balance of range, firing rate, and operability. It was also capable of anti-air.
It was later adopted as the main gun of the famous "Yamato-class" battleships.
This is an upgraded version of the gun that was used on the large-type light cruisers that have gone through many refinements and upgrades.
15.5cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._reading: 15.5センチさんれんそうほうかい

15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount._card_reading: 15.5せんちさんれんそうほう（ふくほう）
15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount._info:
巡洋艦の主砲だったものを、戦艦の副砲として活用しました。
「大和」型に搭載され、対空戦も可能な、性能・運用ともに優秀な戦艦副砲となりました。
砲塔部の装甲が薄いのが玉に傷で、諸説ありますが「大和」型の唯一の弱点という指摘もありました。
15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount._info_en:
Although designed to be a part of the cruiser's main battery, it saw a more practical use as the battleship's secondary armament.
The "Yamato-class" was designed with this, for potential use as an anti-aircraft gun, however, its combined ability and performance were outstanding enough to be used as the battleship's secondary armament.
However, the turret section's armor was very thin, resulting in various rumors about it being the Yamato-class' Achilles' heel when pointed out.
15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount._reading: 15.5せんちさんれんそうふくほう

15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount Kai._info:
巡洋艦主砲だったものを大型戦艦の副砲として転用しました。
「大和」型戦艦に搭載され、対空戦も可能な、性能・運用性ともに優秀な戦艦副砲となりました。
防御面においては、諸説ありますが「大和」型の唯一の弱点という指摘もありました。
本副砲は、同砲を「大和」型副砲として運用、改修と最適化を施した改良型装備です。
15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
The cruiser's main gun array that was converted for use as battleship secondaries.
Loaded on the "Yamato-class" battleships, they became capable battleship secondaries, boasting anti-air capabilities, efficiency, and traverse speed.
There are differing opinions about the defensive plating, but it was pointed out as a "Yamato-class" Achilles' Heel.
This turret has been improved and optimized for use as secondaries on the "Yamato-class".
15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount Kai._reading: 15.5センチさんれんそうふくほうかい

15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
巡洋艦主砲兵装を「大和」型戦艦副砲に搭載した、対空戦闘も可能な、性能・運用性ともに優秀な戦艦副砲です。
防御面においては、諸説ありますが「大和」型の唯一の弱点という指摘もありました。
本改良砲塔は上面に装甲を増設、更に被弾時に強い内部構造に改良、最大仰角及び射撃速度を向上させた大和改二型に最適化した性能向上型副砲です。
15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
This gun was mounted on cruisers as a main gun and on the "Yamato-class" battleships as a secondary gun. This high-performance and easy-to-use gun is capable of anti-air combat and is an excellent battleship secondary gun.
There are lots of opinions on its defensive capabilities, some identifying it as the sole weak point of the "Yamato-class".
This version has had the armor on the upper face of the turret reinforced. Further improvements have been made to the fire rate, firing angle, and layout of the inner spaces to better resist incoming fire. This secondary gun has been optimized for use with Yamato Kai Ni.

152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生んだ、伝統と信頼の高性能中口径の三連装速射砲、その軽巡用主砲バージョンです。
砲の旋回や俯仰、砲弾の揚弾及び装填は主に電力で稼働する最新型です。
戦後も活躍した新鋭軽巡の主砲、そして同構造の砲は新型高速戦艦の副砲にも採用されました。
152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount._info_en:
A version of the traditional, but reliable high-performance, medium caliber, triple mounted gun from the country of pasta that was used on light cruisers.
This is the latest model where the rotation and elevation of the gun, and also the hoisting and loading of the shells, were electrically powered.
These guns were even used after the war by the newly-produced light cruisers and were also mounted as the secondary armament of the new fast battleship.
152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount._wikipedia: 152 mm/55 Italian naval gun Models 1934 and 1936

152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount Kai._info:
パスタの国が生んだ、伝統と信頼の高性能中口径の三連装速射砲、その軽巡用主砲バージョンです。
砲の旋回や俯仰、砲弾の揚弾及び装填は主に電力で稼働する最新型です。
戦後も活躍した新鋭軽巡の主砲、そして同構造の砲は新型高速戦艦の副砲にも採用された本砲をさらに熟成した、改修後期型です。
152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
A version of the traditional, but reliable high-performance, medium caliber, triple mounted gun from the country of pasta that was used on light cruisers.
This is the latest model where the rotation and elevation of the gun, and also the hoisting and loading of the shells, were electrically powered.
These are an improved late model of the guns that were used on the new light cruisers into the post-war period and mounted as secondary armaments on the new fast battleship.
152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount Kai._name: 152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount Kai
152mm/55 Triple Rapid Fire Gun Mount Kai._wikipedia: 152 mm/55 Italian naval gun Models 1934 and 1936

15cm Twin Secondary Gun Mount._info:
ビスマルク級戦艦に搭載された、かの国の戦艦副砲です。
主に近距離へ接近する小艦艇に指向する射撃を担当します。
艦の射撃指揮装置は充実していますが、本副砲は対空戦闘には不向きです。
15cm Twin Secondary Gun Mount._info_en:
This is a battleship secondary gun from that country, mounted on the Bismarck-class battleships.
Its job is to engage small vessels at close range with direct fire.
Ship fire-control system has been enhanced, but the low attack angle of the gun makes it unsuitable for surface-to-air combat.

15m Duplex Rangefinder + Type 21 Radar K._info:
大和型戦艦のために開発された射撃&電探兵装です。
特注の大型光学15m二重測距儀と、その上に熟練した技術者が調整を重ねた精度の高い21号対空電探を配しています。
大型かつ重量もあるため、戦艦の艦橋上部構造物のみに装備可能な光学及び電波兵装です。
15m Duplex Rangefinder + Type 21 Radar K._info_en:
A radar that was made mainly for the Yamato-class.
It uses its 15 m long optical to find the distance between yourself and the enemy, and includes an improved model of the type 21 anti-air radar.
''Owing to its size, this radar can only be equipped on battleships and needs to be mounted on the upper bridge of the ship.
15m Duplex Rangefinder + Type 21 Radar K._reading: 15メートルにじゅうそっきょぎ+21ごうでんたんかいに

15m Duplex Rangefinder Kai + Type 21 Rad._info:
大和型戦艦のために開発された射撃&電探兵装です。
特注の大型光学15m二重測距儀の改良型と、その上に卓越した技術者が調整を重ねた精度の高い21号対空電探を配しています。
大型かつ重量もあるため、戦艦の艦橋上部構造物のみに装備可能な光学及び電波兵装の改良後期型と、熟練乗組員で構成された射撃指揮所により精密な射撃を実現します。
15m Duplex Rangefinder Kai + Type 21 Rad._info_en:
A fire-control and surface search equipment developed for the Yamato-class battleships.
A customized equipment consisting of an upgraded 15m coincidence rangefinder coupled with an accurate Type 21 air RADAR tuned by excellent engineers.
Due to its size and weight, it can only be equipped on the bridges of battleships. With a crew of skilled operators and its upgraded optics and RADAR, it can enable precision shelling.
15m Duplex Rangefinder Kai + Type 21 Rad._japanese_name: 15m二重測距儀改+21号電探改二+熟練射撃指揮所
15m Duplex Rangefinder Kai + Type 21 Rad._name: 15m Duplex Rangefinder Kai + Type 21 Radar Kai 2 + Skilled Fire Direction Center

16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount._info:
紅茶の国で建造されたビックセブン、条約下時代に建造された16inch砲搭載超弩級戦艦ネルソン級。
その主兵装として、同艦前部に集中配備された大口径三連装戦艦主砲です。
課題を残しつつも、本三連装主砲三基九門を全て艦前部に集中配備した野心的な艦形を持つネルソン級は、日本の長門、そして陸奥と並んで、ビックセブンの一角を構成しました。
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
The Nelson-class was a class of super-dreadnoughts that were built with 16 inch guns in the land of black tea as part of the Big Seven under the naval treaty.
These large-caliber triple battleship guns were used as their main armament and carried entirely in the front.
While it wasn't without its problems, the Nelson-class, with its ambitious design of three of these main batteries, for a total of nine barrels, all concentrated north of the bridge, were part of the Big Seven alongside Japan's Nagato and Mutsu.
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount._reading: 16インチマークワンさんれんそうほう

16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount + AFCT Kai._info:
紅茶の国で建造されたビックセブン、条約下時代に建造された16inch砲搭載超弩級戦艦ネルソン級。
その主兵装として、同艦前部に集中配備された大口径三連装戦艦主砲です。
同射撃管制用最新アナログコンピューターAdmiralty Fire Control Tableの熟成改良を重ね、その射撃精度を向上させました。
ネルソン級などで運用することで、高い戦闘力を発揮します。
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount + AFCT Kai._info_en:
The Nelson-class was a class of super-dreadnoughts that were built with 16 inch guns in the land of black tea as part of the Big Seven under the naval treaty.
These large-caliber triple battleship guns were used as their main armament and carried entirely in the front.
Their shelling accuracy has been increased by improving the Admiralty Fire Control Table, their latest analog computer fire-control system.
Using them on ships like the Nelson-class should allow them to demonstrate their high combat efficiency.
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount + AFCT Kai._name: 16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount + AFCT Kai
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount + AFCT Kai._reading: 16インチマークワンさんれんそうほう+AFCTかい

16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount Kai + FCR T._info:
紅茶の国で建造されたビックセブン、条約下時代に建造された16inch砲搭載超弩級戦艦ネルソン級。
その主兵装として、同艦前半部に集中配備された大口径三連装戦艦主砲の改良型です。
さらに同砲と連携する射撃管制レーダー284型を採用、精度の高いレーダー射撃も可能です。
ネルソン級や紅茶の国の戦艦で運用することで、高い戦闘力を期待できます。
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount Kai + FCR T._info_en:
The Nelson-class was a class of super-dreadnoughts that were built with 16 inch guns in the land of black tea as part of the Big Seven under the naval treaty.
These large-caliber triple battleship guns are an improved version of the ones that were used as their main armament and carried entirely in the front.
Furthermore, the Type 284 Fire-Control Radar that is used in tandem with the guns allows highly accurate radar-guided shelling.
You can expect excellent performance in combat when using them on ships like the Nelson-class or other battleships from the land of black tea.
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount Kai + FCR T._name: 16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount Kai + FCR Type 284
16inch Mk.I Triple Gun Mount Kai + FCR T._reading: 16インチマークワンさんれんそうほうかい+FCRタイプ284

16inch Mk.I Twin Gun Mount._info:
米国で建造されたビッグセブン、「Colorado」級。その初期の主砲兵装として採用された標準的な16inch連装砲です。
日本の「長門」「陸奥」、そして紅茶の国の「Nelson」級と共にビッグセブンの一角を構成した同級戦艦の三隻。
ネームシップ「Colorado」、そして一度は真珠湾で撃破された妹達も浮揚修理され、太平洋の戦いを身を投じていきます。
16inch Mk.I Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
The American-made members of the Big 7, the "Colorado-class", employed these early 16 inch main gun turrets as their standard armament.
These three battleships stood next to the Japanese "Nagato" and "Mutsu" as well as the "Nelson-class" of the country of black tea, as the Big Seven.
The name ship, "Colorado", as well as her sisters that were once destroyed at Pearl Harbour and later refloated, will once again devote themselves to the war in the Pacific Ocean.
16inch Mk.I Twin Gun Mount._reading: 16インチ マークワンれんそうほう

16inch Mk.V Twin Gun Mount._info:
米国で建造されたビッグセブン、「Colorado」級。その初期の主砲兵装として採用された標準的な16inch連装主砲、その改良強化型です。
あの戦いの開戦時オーバーホール中だった「Colorado」級戦艦ネームシップ、そして真珠湾で撃破された妹達も改装を受け、主砲兵装を本砲に順次更新装備していきます。
16inch Mk.V Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
This is an improved and enhanced version of the 16 inch main gun turrets adopted as the standard armament of the American-made Big 7, the "Colorado-class".
The nameship of the "Colorado-class" battleships, along with her sisters that were once destroyed at Pearl Harbor, were refitted with these guns after their overhaul at the start of the war.
16inch Mk.V Twin Gun Mount._reading: 16インチ マークファイブれんそうほう

16inch Mk.VIII Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
米国で建造されたビッグセブン、「Colorado」級。その初期の主砲兵装として採用された標準的な16inch連装主砲、その改良型のさらなる強化版兵装です。
16inch連装主砲に改良を加え、さらに近接対空兵装も充実させました。改装後の「Colorado」級戦艦で装備運用することで、特に高い砲戦能力を発揮します。
16inch Mk.VIII Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
A further improved and enhanced version of the 16 inch main gun turrets adopted as the standard armament by the American-made Big 7, the "Colorado-class".
Improvements were made to the 16 inch twin gun mounts, including the improvement of close-range anti-air armaments. It provides especially strong firepower when equipped on the improved "Colorado-class" battleships.
16inch Mk.VIII Twin Gun Mount Kai._reading: 16インチ マークエイトれんそうほうかい

16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.6._info:
主力戦艦の主兵装として、米国で開発運用された標準的な戦艦用大口径主砲です。
南太平洋海戦に機動部隊と共に参加、さらに南方ソロモン海域で日本の高速戦艦や水雷戦隊と激しい夜戦を演じた米高速戦艦「South Dakota」にも、その主兵装として装備されました。
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.6._info_en:
This is a large-caliber main gun developed and deployed by the US as the standard issue main weapon of their front-line battleships.
It was the main gun of the "South Dakota", who participated in the Pacific War with a carrier task force, and fought a fierce night battle with a Japanese fast battleship and torpedo squadrons in the Southern Solomon Sea.

16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.6 + GFCS._info:
主力戦艦の主兵装として、米国で開発運用された標準的な戦艦用大口径主砲です。
本兵装は同砲の後期改修型に、さらに射撃レーダーと砲射撃指揮装置との連携を付与した主砲火力システムです。
最新Mk.7には一歩劣るものの高いバランスと運用性を持つ本兵装は、高火力と優れた射撃精度も期待できます。
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.6 + GFCS._info_en:
This is a large-caliber main gun developed and deployed by the US as the standard issue main weapon of their front-line battleships.
This gun is a late-war upgraded model that is linked with an artillery radar and gun fire control system.
Although it is slightly inferior to the newer Mk.7, it is a practical weapon that has high firepower and accuracy.

16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.6 mod.2._info:
主力戦艦の主兵装として、米国で開発運用された標準的な戦艦用大口径主砲です。
南太平洋海戦に機動部隊と共に参加、さらに南方ソロモン海域で日本の高速戦艦や水雷戦隊と激しい夜戦を演じた米高速戦艦「South Dakota」の主兵装となった兵装の強化改修型です。
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.6 mod.2._info_en:
This is a large-caliber main gun developed and deployed by the US as the standard issue main weapon of their front-line battleships.
This is the new and improved version of the main gun of the "South Dakota", who participated in the Pacific War with a carrier task force, and fought a fierce night battle with a Japanese fast battleship and torpedo squadrons in the Southern Solomon Sea.

16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.7._info:
Iowa級戦艦の主兵装として米国で開発された新型三連装主砲です。
前級に搭載された主砲の改良型で、長砲身化などの改良によって威力がより向上しています。
発展途上ではありましたが、レーダー連動の砲射撃指揮装置によるレーダー射撃も可能です。
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.7._info_en:
This is a new model triple mount main cannon developed by the United States used as the main weapon for Iowa class battleships.
As an improved main cannon to the one used by a previous class, the power is upgraded due to modifications such as the lengthening of the gun barrel.
It is still in development but, it could also be fired by radar using a radar-linked gun fire control system.
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.7._reading: 16インチさんれんそうほう マークセブン

16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.7 + GFCS._info:
Iowa級戦艦の主兵装として米国で開発された強力な新型三連装主砲と、その改良された射撃管制システムです。
現在のFCSの先祖ともいえる射撃レーダーと砲射撃指揮装置によるシステムを有しており、その高火力と共に高い射撃精度が期待できます。
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.7 + GFCS._info_en:
A powerful triple cannon developed by the US as the main gun of the Iowa-class battleships that have been paired with an improved fire control system.
An ancestor of modern FCS, it pairs a fire control radar with a computer to achieve devastating firepower with precision and accuracy.
16inch Triple Gun Mount Mk.7 + GFCS._reading: 16インチさんれんそうほう マークセブン + GFCS

20-tube 7inch UP Rocket Launchers._info:
紅茶の国で開発され、大型艦などの対空近接防御に使用された多連装対空ロケットランチャーです。
日本の対空噴進砲に使用された12cmロサ弾より大型のロケット弾を採用しています。
紅茶の国の艦艇や一部の戦艦などでポンポン砲と一緒に、または集中運用することで、限定的ではありますが近接対空防御に効果を発揮します。
20-tube 7inch UP Rocket Launchers._info_en:
A multi-tube rocket launcher that was developed in the land of black tea and used for short-range anti-aircraft defense on large ships among other things.
Its rockets are much larger than the 12 cm Rosa projectiles used by Japanese rocket launchers.
Using it on warships from the land of black tea as well as certain battleships, either with Pom-Pom guns or several grouped together, allows it to provide short-range anti-aircraft defense, albeit to a limited extent.
20-tube 7inch UP Rocket Launchers._reading: 20れんそう7インチ UP ロケットランチャーズ

20.3cm (No.2) Twin Gun Mount._info:
20.3cm連装砲のマイナーバージョンアップ版、それが同2号連装砲です。
元々優秀な重巡洋艦用主砲を改良して、主に妙高型などに搭載されました。
初期主砲搭載の他の重巡達も、近代化改装時に順次本砲に換装されていきました。
20.3cm (No.2) Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
The no.2 twin gun is a slightly upgraded version of the 20.3 cm twin gun.
The excellent heavy cruiser main guns were upgraded and used as the main guns of the Myoukou-class.
Other heavy cruisers had their early-model guns eventually replaced with this one during their modernizations.

20.3cm (No.3) Twin Gun Mount._info:
20.3cm連装砲の改良型、それが同3号連装砲です。
元々優秀な重巡洋艦用主砲をさらに改良。
55口径の極めて優れた重巡用主砲が完成しました。
優秀な砲ですが、経済性に難があり、少量の試作だけで量産はされていません。
20.3cm (No.3) Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
The no.3 twin gun is an upgraded version of the 20.3 cm twin gun.
It is a further improved model of the excellent heavy cruiser main gun.
An extremely excellent heavy cruiser main gun with a length of 55 was made.
Although this gun is excellent, it wasn't able to be mass-produced due to economic trouble. So only a few prototypes were made.

20.3cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
重巡に搭載された主砲、それが20.3cm連装砲です。
条約上限一杯の8インチ（20.3cm）のこの砲は、中距離での砲撃戦はもちろん、夜戦のような近距離での殴り合いでも十分にその威力を発揮します。
限定的ですが、対空射撃も可能です。
20.3cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
The 20.3 cm twin-gun was the main armament of heavy cruisers.
With a caliber at the maximum allowed by the Treaty of 8 inches (20.3 cm), it has sufficient power for medium-range combat and close-range night battle brawls.
It also has limited anti-air capabilities.

203mm/53 Twin Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国で生まれた中口径主砲です。
昼間砲撃戦で優位を確保すべく誕生したザラ級重巡の主兵装として採用されました。
最大仰角で射撃では戦艦並の長射程距離を誇りましたが、構造上の問題でその精度と命中率には課題を抱えています。
203mm/53 Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A medium-caliber gun from the country of pasta.
It was used as the main armament of the Zara-class heavy cruisers that were created to secure superiority in artillery combat during the day.
Although it was capable of ranges comparable to battleships when firing at maximum elevation, it had problems with accuracy due to structural problems.

21inch 4-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Init._info:
米海軍で開発され、Salmon級などの潜水艦で運用された潜水艦用魚雷兵装です。
前部4門の発射管から、水上の敵艦を攻撃可能ですが、初期型の魚雷は信頼性が低く、問題もありました。
信頼性の向上した後期型では、日本の輸送船団、さらに護衛艦艇に対しても威力を発揮していきます。
21inch 4-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Init._info_en:
A submarine torpedo developed by the US Navy and operated by Salmon-class submarines.
The four forward launch tubes are capable of attacking enemy surface ships, but early torpedoes were unreliable with various problems.
The late model, with improved reliability, will demonstrate its power against Japanese convoys and escort ships.

21inch 4-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Late._info:
米海軍で開発され、Salmon級などの潜水艦で運用された潜水艦用魚雷兵装です。
前部4門の発射管から、水上の敵艦を攻撃可能ですが、初期型の魚雷は信頼性が低く、数々のチャンスを逸しています。
信頼性の向上した後期型では、日本の輸送船団、さらに護衛艦艇に対しても威力を発揮、日本の継戦能力を削っていきます。
21inch 4-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Late._info_en:
A submarine torpedo developed by the US Navy and operated by Salmon-class submarines.
The four forward launch tubes are capable of attacking enemy surface ships, but early torpedoes were unreliable and missed many opportunities.
The late model, with improved reliability, will demonstrate its power against Japanese convoys and escort ships, and will reduce Japan's ability to continue fighting.

21inch 6-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Init._info:
米海軍で開発され、運用された潜水艦用魚雷兵装です。
前部6門の発射管から、水上の敵艦を攻撃可能ですが、初期型の魚雷は信頼性が低く、数々のチャンスを逸しています。
逆に、信頼性の向上した後期型では、日本の輸送船団、さらに護衛艦艇や主力艦に対しても猛威を発揮することになります。
21inch 6-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Init._info_en:
A torpedo weapon developed and deployed by the US Navy.
Though possible to launch an attack against surface targets with 6 tubes, early torpedoes were unreliable, and many opportunities were missed.
Conversely, the more reliable late-model torpedoes would menace Japanese convoys, escort vessels, and front-line combatants.

21inch 6-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Late._info:
米海軍で開発され、運用された潜水艦用魚雷兵装です。
前部6門の発射管から最大6射線、後部発射管もあわせれば、10発の魚雷で攻撃可能です。
信頼性の向上した後期型の魚雷は、日本の輸送船舶や護衛艦艇に対して圧倒的な猛威を発揮、
日本海軍そして日本全体の継戦能力を大きく削っていきました。
21inch 6-tube Bow Torpedo Launcher (Late._info_en:
A torpedo weapon developed and deployed by the US Navy.
When the 6 bow tubes are combined with the stern tubes, the submarine is capable of launching a 10 torpedo spread.
The more reliable late-model torpedoes were an overwhelming menace against Japanese convoys and escort vessels.
It severely limited the ability of the Imperial Japanese Navy and Japan to prosecute the war.

25mm Anti-aircraft Autocannon Mount & Ma._info:
大戦後期には、増大する敵機の脅威に対抗するため、後部主砲を降ろし、25mm対空機銃を可能な限り増備した駆逐艦も少なくありませんでした。
占有場所をとる大型の三連装機銃だけでなく、比較的小型の単装機銃も組み合わせて、近接対空火力の増大と航空攻撃などから艦の護りを高めます。
※駆逐艦など比較的小型の艦艇に適した装備です。
25mm Anti-aircraft Autocannon Mount & Ma._info_en:
In the latter part of the war, many destroyers were equipped with as many 25 mm anti-aircraft guns as possible, removing their rear gun, in order to counter the increasing threat of enemy aircraft.
Combining not only a large autocannon mount that takes up space, but also the relatively small single-barreled machine guns, it increases the close-range anti-aircraft firepower and protects the ship from air attacks.
※This equipment is suitable for relatively small ships such as destroyers.

25mm Single Autocannon Mount._info:
標準的な対空機銃兵装です。
後期の艦艇のほとんど全てが装備した機銃です。
命中しない…すぐ加熱する…等の評価もありますが、雲霞のように迫りくる敵機から味方艦艇を必死に守りました。
銃身の過熱を防ぐため、連装、三連装タイプも生産＆配備されました。
25mm Single Autocannon Mount._info_en:
This is the standard anti-aircraft machine gun.
Most late naval vessels were equipped with this machine gun.
These were used to protect against attacks from enemy aircraft, but later evaluation showed they were subjected to overheating.
In order to prevent the issues of the barrels overheating, the twin and triple barrel variations are produced and deployed.

25mm Triple Autocannon Mount._info:
国産対空機銃兵装の強化バージョンです。
25mm高角機銃の三連装型ですが、一度に撃てるわけではなく、一門ずつ順番に撃って銃身の加熱を防ぎます。
従来の連装機銃や仮設の単装機銃を加え、この25mm三連装機銃が近接対空兵装の中核となりました。
25mm Triple Autocannon Mount._info_en:
An enhanced version of the domestic anti-aircraft machine gun armament.
Although it has a triple mounting of the 25 mm high-angle machine gun, it does not shoot simultaneously, but one by one in order to prevent the barrels from overheating.
In addition to the standard twin mounts and temporary single mounts, this 25 mm triple machine gun formed the core of close-range anti-aircraft armament.
25mm Triple Autocannon Mount._reading: 25みりさんれんそうきじゅう

25mm Triple Autocannon Mount (Concentrat._info:
増大する敵航空兵力の脅威に対抗するため、25mm高角機銃の三連装型を集中的に複数配備した、ハリネズミのような対空機銃兵装です。
命中精度にも難があり、すぐに砲身が過熱してしまう25mm機銃ですが、集中運用することで個艦防空能力を高めます。
25mm Triple Autocannon Mount (Concentrat._info_en:
In order to counter the threat of increased enemy air forces, concentrated deployment of multiple 25 mm Triple Autocannon Mounts, this is a hedgehog-like anti-air machine gun weapon.
Although there is an increase in accuracy, the 25 mm machine guns can end up overheating quickly, but it does increase an individual ship's air-defense capability by concentrating firepower.
25mm Triple Autocannon Mount (Concentrat._reading: 25みりさんれんそうきじゅう しゅうちゅうはいび

25mm Twin Autocannon Mount._info:
標準的な対空機銃兵装です。
フランス製の25mm機関砲をベースに国産化した、25mm高角機銃の連装型です。
連装型は標準に対空装備でしたが、スペースや状況が許す限り、より強力な三連装型に更新されていきました。
25mm Twin Autocannon Mount._info_en:
This is a standard anti-aircraft machine gun armament.
Domestically produced based on a French 25 mm cannon, it is a twin-mounted high-angle 25 mm machine gun.
The twin type was the standard anti-aircraft equipment, but it was updated to the more powerful triple-barrel type where space and circumstances allowed.

2cm Flakvierling 38._info:
かの国からもたらされた四連装対空機銃です。
2cm Flakvierling38と呼ばれる優れた近接防空火器で、艦船だけでなく対空戦闘車両や防空陣地でも運用されました。
2cm Flakvierling 38._info_en:
'A quad mount anti-air turret brought over from that country.
An excellent air defense weapon known as the 2 cm Flakvierling 38, it was not only used on ships but also on land vehicles.

3.7cm FlaK M42._info:
かの国からもたらされた大口径二連装高射機関砲です。
主に陸戦で用いられましたが、Uボートや艦船などにも一部搭載・運用されました。
高い近接防空火力を発揮します。
3.7cm FlaK M42._info_en:
A large caliber twin anti-aircraft gun that was brought from another country.
It was primarily used on land, but was also mounted on U-boats and ships too.
It will provide a great amount of proximity air defense.

30.5cm Triple Gun Mount._info:
北の国の戦艦主砲です。
戦艦の主砲としては、超弩級戦艦の時代にはスケール的に時代遅れの感もありましたが、三連装主砲として当時新鋭の弩級戦艦に装備されました。
30.5cm Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
A battleship main battery from a Northern country.
As far as battleship main guns are concerned its scale was considered behind the times during the age of superdreadnoughts, but nevertheless it was mounted as a triple-barrelled main battery on at the time modern dreadnoughts.

30.5cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info:
北の国の戦艦主砲です。
戦艦の主砲としては、超弩級戦艦の時代にはスケール的に時代遅れの感もありましたが、三連装主砲として当時新鋭の弩級戦艦に装備されました。
本兵装は同砲を改修した、近代化改装した北の国の戦艦のための改良型装備です。
30.5cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
A battleship main battery from a Northern country.
As far as battleship main guns are concerned its scale was considered behind the times during the age of superdreadnoughts, but nevertheless, it was mounted as a triple-barrelled main battery on at the time modern dreadnoughts.
This armament is an improved version of said gun that was modified for the modernized and remodeled battleship from the country up north.

305mm/46 Triple Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生んだ弩級戦艦のための主砲兵装です。
Conte di Cavour級では一番、三番、五番主砲に本三連装を、第二、第四主砲に連装砲を装備、計13門の火力を誇ります。
弩級時代の主砲であり、列強の新型戦艦に対する火力不足は否めず、近代化改装時に既存主砲を改造、同砲砲身をボーリングするという手法で320mmへと口径を拡張強化します。
305mm/46 Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
This is the main gun of dreadnoughts from the country of pasta.
The Conte di Cavour-class boasted 13 barrels with the 1st, 3rd, and 5th mounts being this triple-barreled; and the 2nd and 4th mounts being twin-barreled mounts.
It was the standard main gun of the dreadnought era but it's undeniable that it lacked power compared to the Great Powers' latest battleships, so the existing guns were upgraded, with the barrels of these guns were forcibly bored to enlarge the caliber to 320 mm.

305mm/46 Twin Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生んだ弩級戦艦のための主砲兵装です。
Conte di Cavour級では一番、三番、五番主砲に三連装を、第二、第四主砲に本連装砲を装備、計13門の火力を誇ります。
弩級時代の主砲であり、列強の新型戦艦に対する火力不足は否めず、既存主砲を改造、同砲砲身をボーリングするという半ば強引な手法で320mmへと口径を拡張強化します。
305mm/46 Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
This is the main gun of dreadnoughts from the country of pasta.
The Conte di Cavour-class boasted 13 barrels with the 1st, 3rd, and 5th mounts being triple-barreled; and the 2nd and 4th mounts being this twin-barreled.
It was the standard main gun of the dreadnought era but it's undeniable that it lacked power compared to the Great Powers' latest battleships, so the existing guns were upgraded, with the barrels of these guns were forcibly bored to enlarge the caliber to 320 mm.

320mm/44 Triple Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生んだ弩級戦艦のための改造主砲兵装です。
相対的に旧式化が進むConte di Cavour級弩級戦艦の近代化改装時に、従来装備していた同主砲の砲身をボーリングして削るというアプローチで、320mmへの大口径化を実現しました。
本兵装は、同改装砲の三装砲塔バージョンです。
320mm/44 Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
The remodeled main gun for the dreadnoughts from the country of pasta.
During the modernization of the relatively obsolete Conte di Cavour-class dreadnoughts, the barrels of the main batteries were bored out to enlarge the caliber to 320 mm.
This gun is the triple gun mount version of the upgraded gun.

320mm/44 Twin Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生んだ弩級戦艦のための改造主砲兵装です。
相対的に旧式化が進むConte di Cavour級弩級戦艦の近代化改装時に、従来装備していた同主砲の砲身をボーリングして削るというアプローチで、320mmへの大口径化を実現しました。
本兵装は、同改装砲の連装砲塔バージョンです。
320mm/44 Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
The remodeled main gun for the dreadnoughts from the country of pasta.
During the modernization of the relatively obsolete Conte di Cavour-class dreadnoughts, the barrels of the main batteries were bored out to enlarge the caliber to 320 mm.
This gun is the twin gun mount version of the upgraded gun.

35.6cm Triple Gun Mount Kai (Dazzle Camo._info:
「金剛」型高速戦艦の代替新造艦装備のために計画されていた三連装35.6cm主砲、その改二以降用if改良強化型兵装です。
射撃精度が向上、効果のほどは不明ですが、最期まで呉軍港で防戦に努めた「榛名」前部主砲最終仕様と同様のゼブラ模様のダズル迷彩も施しています。
35.6cm Triple Gun Mount Kai (Dazzle Camo._info_en:
This is a what-if triple-barreled 35.6 cm gun mount that was planned as a brand new alternative armament for the "Kongou-class" fast battleships, and is improved and enhanced for use after their remodel.
It has improved accuracy, although the full effectiveness is unclear. The final specification of the zebra-pattern dazzle camouflage on "Haruna" fore turrets, with which she fought to the end at Kure Naval Base, has also been applied.
35.6cm Triple Gun Mount Kai (Dazzle Camo._japanese_name: 35.6cm三連装砲改(ダズル迷彩仕様)

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
標準的な戦艦の主砲です。
「金剛」型建造と同時期に英国に発注され、後に国産化、「伊勢」型までの標準的な戦艦主砲して運用されました。
遠距離からの堂々たる艦隊砲撃戦を実現します。
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A standard battleship main gun.
It was ordered from the UK at the same time as the "Kongou-class". It was later produced domestically as the main gun of battleships up to the "Ise-class".
It is the grand realization of long-ranged fleet artillery combat.

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount (Dazzle Camouflage._info:
金剛型高速戦艦「榛名」の前部主砲の最終形態です。
あまり効果がなかったといわれていますが、縦縞ゼブラ模様のダズル迷彩を施しています。
三式弾を装填して敵機が跳梁する空を睨み、母港呉と動けない残存艦隊の防戦に努めました。
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount (Dazzle Camouflage._info_en:
The final version of the forward battery of the Kongou-class fast battleship "Haruna".
Although it was of questionable efficacy, the turret was given a zebra-striped pattern dazzle camouflage.
Loaded with the Type 3 shell and facing the skies dominated by enemy aircraft, it did its best to defend the remaining fleet trapped in Kure Harbour.
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount (Dazzle Camouflage._reading: 35.6せんちれんそうほう(だずるめいさい)

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
「金剛」型建造時期に英国に発注され、後に国産化、「伊勢」型までの標準的な戦艦主砲兵装として運用された大口径主砲、そのif改良型です。
射撃速度と精度の向上を図りつつ、砲自体の軽量化及び被弾時の抗耐性の向上を図っています。
改「金剛」型高速戦艦による運用で、その威力を発揮します！
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
An improved what-if version of the large caliber guns ordered from the United Kingdom at the time of "Kongou-class" construction.
Later produced domestically, it was made a standard battleship armament up to the "Ise-class". While the main objective was to improve accuracy and the rate of fire, efforts were made to lower the weight and improve protection.
Their power reaches its peak when used on the of "Kai Kongou-class" fast battleships.

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
「金剛」型建造時期に英国に発注され、「伊勢」型までの標準的な戦艦主砲兵装として運用された大口径主砲、そのさらなる改良砲if後期型です。
射撃速度向上に高精度の測距儀、さらに対空防備も充実。
各種戦訓を採り入れ、運用性は大きく向上、改「金剛」型高速戦艦による運用で、その真価を発揮します！
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
A what-if late-model upgrade of the large-caliber main gun that was ordered from the British for the construction of the "Kongou-class" and used up to the "Ise-class".
It has an increased firing rate, a high-precision rangefinder, and improved anti-air defenses.
Lessons learned in combat have been incorporated into this to greatly increase its operability.
Its true power will be realized by equipping it on the "Kai Kongou-class" fast battleships.
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._reading: 35.6センチれんそうほうかいに

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 3 (Dazzle Camo._info:
改金剛型主砲兵装、特に同改装「榛名」に特化して改修改良された、ダズル迷彩仕様のif改良強化型です。
射撃速度向上に高精度の測距儀、さらに対空防備も充実。
各種戦訓を採り入れ、一部最新型電探との連携も可能。
対空戦闘含む実戦での運用性は大きく向上しています。
特に防空戦艦仕様の「榛名改二乙」による運用で、その真価を発揮します！
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 3 (Dazzle Camo._info_en:
An improved version of the Kai Kongou-class's main battery armament, especially remodeled and improved for “Haruna”, with what if dazzle camouflage and improvements.
It has a high-precision range finder improving firing speed and with enhanced anti-air defenses.
Incorporating various combat feedbacks, it can also synergize with some of the latest radars.
Its operability in combat, including anti-air combat, has been greatly improved.
It especially shows its true value, when equipped on the air-defense battleship "Haruna Kai Ni B"!
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 3 (Dazzle Camo._japanese_name: 35.6cm連装砲改三(ダズル迷彩仕様)

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 3 C._info:
改金剛型主砲兵装、特に「比叡」「霧島」丙改装の運用に特化して改修改良された、35.6cm連装砲のif改良強化後期型です。
新型測距儀と装甲強化、被弾誘爆への対策、戦訓を採り入れ各電探との連携も可能。
夜戦含む水上打撃戦での火力投射力が、大きく向上しています。
高レベル改修により、改金剛型の夜戦及び火力の殴り合いでは、さらに力強い戦闘力を発揮します。
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 3 C._info_en:
The modified Kongo-class main gun armament is a late-model what if 35.6 cm twin gun mount that was modified and improved specifically for use on the "Hiei" and "Kirishima" C remodels.
It is equipped incorporates elements learned from battles, with a new rangefinder, reinforced armor, explosions preventions measures, and the ability to be linked with radars.
The firepower in surface battles, including night battles, has been greatly improved.
With this high level of modification, the Kai Kongou-class will be able to demonstrate even greater combat power in night battles and gunfire duels.

35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 4._info:
改金剛型主砲兵装、特に同改装「榛名」に特化して改修改良された、35.6cm連装のif改良強化後期型です。
射撃速度向上にさらに高精度の測距儀、各種戦訓を採り入れ、各種電探との連携も可能。
夜戦含む水上打撃戦での運用性が、特に大きく向上しています。
水上打撃戦特化の「榛名改二丙」による運用や装備改修で、さらにその真価を発揮します！
35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 4._info_en:
The main gun of the Kai Kongou-class, especially refurbished and improved for the remodel of “Haruna”, it is a what if improved and strengthened late model of a 35.6 cm.
It incorporates a high-precision rangefinder to improve shooting speed, following various battle lessons, and can also be coupled with various radars.
The operability in naval combat, including night battles, has been greatly improved.
It will demonstrate its true value even more when upgraded and used on "Haruna Kai Ni C", which specializes in naval combat!

38.1cm Mk.I Twin Gun Mount._info:
紅茶の国の戦艦主兵装用に開発された連装大口径主砲です。
同国ならではの堅実な作りの主砲ですが、後期にはレーダーシステムの連動した射撃管制装置も開発されました。
38.1cm Mk.I Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
A large caliber main battery developed for the country of tea's main battleships.
A reliable main gun made in that country, it was later linked with a radar and fire control system.

38.1cm Mk.I/N Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
紅茶の国で戦艦主兵装用に開発された連装大口径主砲です。
堅実な作りの傑作砲に対して最大仰角を上げる等の近代化改修を行いました。
熟成した戦艦主砲の改良版です。
38.1cm Mk.I/N Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
A large caliber twin-mounted gun developed in the country of tea for use on battleships.
A reliable master-crafted gun with an angle of elevation increased from modernization improvements.
An improved version of the tried and tested battleship gun.

381mm/50 Triple Gun Mount._info:
パスタの国が生んだ三連装型の戦艦主砲です。
高射速の50口径、中近距離戦闘での火力は同クラス最強です。
また、射程も大和型46cm砲と同等以上のカタログスペックを誇ります。
ただし、砲の耐久性に難点があります。
また散布界が広く、その命中率にも課題を残していました。
381mm/50 Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
A triple gun mount made for battleships by the land of pasta.
A 50-caliber gun with a high rate of fire, being more powerful at medium-short ranges.
In addition, the range is on par with the 46 cm cannons of the Yamato-class.
There were issues with the cannon's durability.
The spread of its fire was also wide, giving it poor accuracy.
381mm/50 Triple Gun Mount._reading: 381みり/50 さんれんそうほう

381mm/50 Triple Gun Mount Kai._info:
パスタの国が生んだ三連装型の戦艦主砲です。
高射速の50口径、中近距離戦闘での火力は同クラス最強です。
また、射程も大和型46cm砲と同等以上のカタログスペックを誇ります。
砲の耐久性や命中率にも課題を残していましが、改修によってその命中精度などが向上しています。
381mm/50 Triple Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
This triple-barreled cannon was one of the main cannons used in the land of the pastas by battleships.
Boasting a fast-firing 50 caliber barrel, it was considered to have some of the highest firepower among mid-range combat equipment.
As for firepower, it's very similar to the Yamato Class 46 cm cannons, and holds its rankings among them.
Some of the main problems were its accuracy and durability, but with modernization, its accuracy has been improved over time.
381mm/50 Triple Gun Mount Kai._reading: 381ミリ/50 さんれんそうほうかい

38cm Quadruple Gun Mount._info:
トリコロールの国で開発された戦艦主砲です。
大口径38cm砲四門を一つの砲塔に収めたる迫力の四連装砲です。
「Richelieu」級戦艦に装備され、大火力を実現します。
38cm Quadruple Gun Mount._info_en:
A battleship gun developed in the tricolor country.
A powerful quadruple mount that combines four 38 cm large caliber guns in one turret.
Equipped on the "Richelieu-class" battleships, it provides a large amount of firepower.

38cm Quadruple Gun Mount Kai._info:
トリコロールの国で開発された戦艦主砲です。
大口径38cm砲四門から構成される迫力の四連装砲で、「Richelieu」級戦艦に装備されました。
同砲を熟成、改修した改良大口径主砲装備です。同クラスとしては圧倒的な火力を実現します。
38cm Quadruple Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
A battleship gun developed in the tricolor country.
A powerful quadruple mount that combines four 38 cm large caliber guns, equipped on the "Richelieu-class" battleships.
This is an improved large caliber gun mount, matured and modified. It achieves overwhelming firepower in its category.
38cm Quadruple Gun Mount Kai._reading: 38センチよんれんそうほうかい

38cm Quadruple Gun Mount Kai Deux._info:
トリコロールの国で開発された戦艦主砲の改良型です。
「Richelieu」級戦艦に装備された大口径38cm砲四門から構成される迫力の四連装砲をさらに改良、「Richelieu」級での運用に最適化された、if改修の大口径四連装主砲兵装です。
38cm Quadruple Gun Mount Kai Deux._info_en:
An improved version of the battleship main gun developed by the tricolore country.
This is a further upgrade of the powerful large caliber 38 cm quadruple gun mount that was equipped on the "Richelieu-class" battleships, with this what-if upgrade of the large-caliber quadruple mount optimized for use on the Richelieu-class.

38cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
ビスマルク級戦艦に搭載された、かの国の戦艦主砲です。
主に電動を用いた砲塔旋回・揚弾・装填などが可能です。
短～中距離での砲撃戦を意識した戦艦主兵装です。
38cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
This is a battleship main gun from that country that was mounted on the Bismarck-class battleships.
Its traverse, ammunition hoist, and loading mechanisms were primarily electric-powered.
It is a battleship main armament meant for short to medium-range artillery combat.

38cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info:
ビスマルク級戦艦に搭載された戦艦主砲の改修型です。
短～中距離での砲撃戦を意識した高速戦艦の主力兵装で、改修によってその命中精度などが大きく向上しています。
38cm Twin Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
An improved version of the main guns mounted on the Bismarck-class battleships.
Meant as the main armament of fast battleships for short to medium ranged artillery combat, this upgrade has significantly improved its accuracy.

41cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info:
呉海軍工廠砲熕部で試作された純国産戦艦主砲の三連装砲、その改修改良型です。
if兵装ではありますが、各部及び射撃装置を熟成改良し、砲弾誘爆防止措置も考慮した同砲を装備した改長門型戦艦は、当時世界列強の「ビッグ７」水準を遥かに凌駕した攻防のバランスと高い砲撃精度を実現します。
41cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
This is an improved version of the domestically made battleship main gun mount prototype that was designed by the artillery department of the Kure Naval Arsenal.
The gun was refined in multiple areas, including improvements to the fire control system and countermeasures against shell explosions. Even though this is a "what-if" equipment, the Kai Nagato-class battleship with this gun mount surpasses the "Big 7" standard of great power at the time tremendously, achieving an excellent balance of offensive and defensive prowess as well as high shelling accuracy.
41cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._reading: 41せんちさんれんそうほうかい

41cm Triple Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
呉海軍工廠砲熕部で開発された純国産戦艦用三連装主砲、その改修改良型です。
if兵装ではありますが、軽量化及び射撃装置を熟成改良した同改良砲を、航空戦艦への装備、特に伊勢型航空戦艦に最適化改修した戦艦主砲兵装です。
特に大規模改装後の伊勢型改二では、その潜在能力を遺憾なく発揮します。
41cm Triple Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
An improved version of a triple main battery for purely domestic battleships that was developed at the artillery department of the Kure Naval Arsenal.
Although it is a what-if version, it is a gun with reduced weight and improved fire control system, turning it into a battleship main armament optimized for aviation battleships, especially the Ise-class aviation battleships.
The Ise-class Kai Ni in particular, after undergoing its large-scale remodel, will show its full potential.
41cm Triple Gun Mount Kai 2._reading: 41センチさんれんそうほうかいに

41cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
呉海軍工廠砲熕部で開発された初の純国産戦艦主砲です。
16インチ（40.6cm）を僅かに上回る、この41cm砲は「大和」型の46cm砲が登場するまで世界最大の戦艦砲でした。
これを搭載した「長門」「陸奥」は、当時世界列強の「ビッグ7」として、多くのファンに称えられていました。
41cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
Developed by Kure Naval Arsenal's Artillery Division, this is the first entirely domestic battleship gun.
At a little over 16 inches (40.6 cm), this 41 cm gun was the largest battleship gun in the world until the introduction of the "Yamato-class" 46 cm guns.
It was equipped on "Nagato" and "Mutsu" who it was praised by many fans as two of the great power's "Big 7".

41cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info:
呉海軍工廠砲熕部で開発された純国産の戦艦用連装主砲、その改修改良型です。
if兵装ではありますが、防御面及び射撃速度を向上、さらに射撃装置を改良、長門型主力戦艦及び改装伊勢型に最適化改修した熟成戦艦主砲兵装です。
特に大規模改装後の長門型戦艦改二では、その潜在能力を遺憾なく発揮します。
41cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._info_en:
A what-if improved version of a twin-gun main battery for battleships that was entirely domestically developed by the artillery department of the Kure Naval Arsenal.
Although fictional, it's supposed to be a modified battleship main armament with better plating, rate of fire, and a further improved firing system, and which has been optimized for Nagato-class main force battleships as well as the Ise-class.
Especially on the Nagato-class Kai Ni battleships after their large-scale remodeling it will unfold its full potential.
41cm Twin Gun Mount Kai 2._reading: 41センチれんそうほうかいに

46cm Triple Gun Mount._info:
呉海軍工廠砲熕部が極秘開発した世界最大最強の戦艦主砲です。
敵戦艦に対してアウトレンジが可能な最大射程40kmを超える最新鋭のこの巨砲は、機密保持のため公式には16インチ砲とされていました。
「三式弾」を用いた強力な対空射撃も可能です。
46cm Triple Gun Mount._info_en:
Developed in absolute secrecy at the Kure Naval Arsenal's Artillery Division, this is the largest and most powerful battleship gun in the world.
It is a state-of-the-art gun capable of outranging enemy battleships with its maximum range in excess of 40 km. To ensure secrecy, it is officially designated as a 16 inch gun.
It is capable of strong anti-air fire when used alongside the "Type 3 Shell".

46cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info:
呉海軍工廠砲熕部が極秘開発した世界最大最強級の戦艦主砲、その改良改修型です。
敵主力戦艦に対してアウトレンジが可能な「大和」型戦艦搭載用主砲を、各種戦訓を採り入れて改修強化しました。
「大和」「武蔵」への装備、さらに「15.5cm三連装副砲改」との複合装備によって、本兵装はその真価を発揮します。
46cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._info_en:
An improved variant of the largest and most powerful ship guns ever built, which were developed in secret at Kure Naval Yard Gunnery Division.
This strengthening and improvement incorporate the various lessons learned from the main batteries installed on the "Yamato-class" battleships, which could outrange the enemy's main battleships.
The true value of this weapon shines when equipped together with the "15.5cm Triple Secondary Gun Mount Kai" aboard the "Yamato" and "Musashi".
46cm Triple Gun Mount Kai._reading: 46せんちさんれんそうほうかい

51cm Twin Gun Mount._info:
大和型戦艦の発展強化型への搭載が検討されていた大口径大型用戦艦主砲、その完成版です。
最大最強の艦艇搭載用砲熕兵装となる本砲は、改装強化された大和型等で運用可能です。
実戦配備されることのなかった本砲で、海原で一斉射を！
51cm Twin Gun Mount._info_en:
This is the finished version of the large-caliber main gun that was intended to be installed on the upgraded Yamato-class that was in development.
It is the largest and most powerful naval artillery in existence. It can be used by the remodeled Yamato-class and other ships.
Though it has never been used in combat, go forth and fire a volley upon the sea!

533mm Quintuple Torpedo Mount (Initial M._info:
米国で開発され、広く実戦配備された標準的な対水上艦用魚雷兵装です。
初期においては、動作不良も多く、安定性を欠いていた本兵装ですが、後期には不具合も解消され、対水上艦戦闘時において大きな戦果を挙げることになります。
533mm Quintuple Torpedo Mount (Initial M._info_en:
A standardized anti-surface torpedo armament that was developed in the United States and widely used in combat.
While the initial model tended to malfunction a lot and lacked stability, later models rectified these issues and proved to be very effective in anti-surface ship engagements.
533mm Quintuple Torpedo Mount (Initial M._reading: 533ミリごれんそうぎょらい(しょきがた)

533mm Quintuple Torpedo Mount (Late Mode._info:
米国で開発され、広く実戦配備された標準的な対水上艦用魚雷兵装、その改良後期型です。
初期型では動作不良も多く安定性を欠いていましたが、改良更新されたこの後期型には不具合も解消され、対水上艦戦闘時において大きな力を発揮することが可能となりました。
533mm Quintuple Torpedo Mount (Late Mode._info_en:
An improved late model of the standard-issue anti-surface torpedo weapon that was developed and widely deployed by the US.
The early models were prone to malfunctions that largely reduced their reliability, but the improvements made to the late model fixed these defects, and they are now a significant threat in surface combat.

533mm Triple Torpedo Mount._info:
北の国の艦艇用魚雷装備です。
北の国から来た艦艇にはもちろん、信頼できるあのコにも装備させてあげたいですね。
хорошо!
533mm Triple Torpedo Mount._info_en:
This is torpedo equipment for ships from the Northern country.
Not only can it be equipped on northern country ships, but the faithful one can equip it as well.
Khorosho!
533mm Triple Torpedo Mount._reading: 533ミリさんれんそうぎょらい

533mm Triple Torpedo Mount (Model 53-39)._info:
北の国の艦艇用魚雷装備、その改良型です。
北の国から来た艦艇にはもちろん、信頼できるあのコにもぜひ装備させてあげたいですね。
хорошо!
533mm Triple Torpedo Mount (Model 53-39)._info_en:
An improved version of the ship-borne torpedo weapon from the Northern country.
Be sure to equip it not only on the ships from the Northern country, but also on the trustworthy one.
Khorosho!

53cm Bow (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount._info:
伊号潜水艦の艦首に装備する潜水艦の主兵装です。
水上艦艇に搭載するものよりやや直径の小さい、長射程高威力を誇る必殺の酸素魚雷です。
大型艦艇に大ダメージを与えることも可能です。
53cm Bow (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount._info_en:
This torpedo is the primary weapon of the I- submarines.
While smaller than the torpedoes of surface ships, it still is renowned for its incredible range and deadly firepower.
It could inflict severe damage even against larger warships.
53cm Bow (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount._reading: 53せんちかんしゅ(さんそ)ぎょらい

53cm Twin Torpedo Mount._info:
旧式の53cm魚雷の連装発射管です。
新型の61cm酸素魚雷と比較すると、射程・威力共に陳腐化は否めませんが、近距離魚雷戦ではまだまだ現役です。
やや旧式の艦隊型駆逐艦「神風」型などに装備されました。
53cm Twin Torpedo Mount._info_en:
This is the firing tube of the older 53 cm Torpedo.
When compared with the newer 61 cm oxygen torpedo, the range and power are outclassed, but it is serviceable in close-range torpedo combat.
This was equipped by the slightly older-class destroyers such as the "Kamikaze-class".

5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30._info:
米国で開発・実戦配備された優れた両用砲。
同駆逐艦クラスの搭載主砲として、広く運用された単装砲兵装です。
対艦戦闘及び対空戦闘両面で優れた実用性を発揮した本砲は、あのフレッチャー級駆逐艦や、レイテ沖で栗田艦隊主力からタフィー3護衛空母群を護って奮戦した護衛駆逐艦などにも、主砲として装備されました。
5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30._info_en:
An excellent dual-purpose gun developed and deployed by the US.
It was extensively used as the main armament of US destroyers in single gun mounts.
It displayed both excellent anti-ship and anti-air capabilities. It was the main gun of the Fletcher-class destroyers, as well as the destroyer escort that fought hard protecting the Taffy 3 escort carriers from the main force of the Kurita Fleet at Leyte.
5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30._reading: 5インチたんそうほう マークサーティ

5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30 Kai._info:
米国で開発・実戦配備された優れた両用砲。
同駆逐艦クラスの搭載主砲として広く運用された単装砲、その改良型です。
対艦戦闘及び対空戦闘両面で優れた実用性を発揮した本砲は、あのフレッチャー級駆逐艦などの主砲兵装としても採用され、優れた戦闘力を発揮することになります。
5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30 Kai._info_en:
An excellent dual-purpose gun developed and deployed by the US.
This is the improved version of the gun extensively used by US destroyers in single gun mounts.
