A carrier-based torpedo bomber from the country of black tea that is named after the swordfish and boasts a high reliability, high serviceability, and exceptional maneuverability even though it belongs to an old generation of biplanes that aren't fully metallic.
This is an elite biplane torpedo bomber squadron piloting an improved version of the masterpiece that, while outdated, accomplished outstanding feats such as unleashing a devastating strike worthy of a medal from the "Ark Royal" during the fierce battle between the battleship "Bismarck" and the Royal Navy Fleet.

Swordfish Mk.II Kai (Reconnaissance Seap._info:
複葉非全金属製の旧世代機でありながら、高い信頼性と運用性を誇る、旧式ながら赫々たる戦果をおさめたメカジキの名を持つ紅茶の国の傑作艦上攻撃機、その改修水偵型です。
同水上機の索敵偵察装備も強化、よりバランスの良い索敵機として仕上がった紅茶の国の水上偵察機です。
Old Ladyへの搭載もぜひ!
Swordfish Mk.II Kai (Reconnaissance Seap._info_en:
Although it is an older-generation non-metallic biplane, it boasts high reliability and operability. This is a modified seaplane recon version of the masterpiece torpedo bomber from the tea country known as the Swordfish, which achieved great military results despite being an old model.
The country of tea's reconnaissance seaplane became a more balanced recon plane through improvements to its reconnaissance equipment.
Go equip it on the Old Lady!

Swordfish Mk.III (Skilled)._info:
複葉非全金属製の旧世代低速機でありながら、高い信頼性と運用性、優れた運動性を誇る、メカジキの名を持つ紅茶の国の傑作機。
戦艦「Bismarck」と英艦隊との激闘で大殊勲となる一撃を放つなど、旧式ながら赫々たる戦果をおさめた名機、その哨戒や対潜性能を高めた後期改良型を駆る精鋭飛行隊です。
Swordfish Mk.III (Skilled)._info_en:
Although a low-speed machine of an older generation with multiple non-metallic wings, it boasts high reliability, operability, and outstanding mobility, serving as an excellent aircraft of the country of tea with the name of Swordfish.
A famous aircraft that struck a hit that became disastrous in the battle with "Bismarck" and the British Fleet, and had old-fashioned but brilliant fight results. This is the elite squadron that used a later, improved model in patrol and anti-submarine missions.

Swordfish Mk.III Kai (Seaplane Model)._info:
複葉非全金属製の旧世代機でありながら、高い信頼性と運用性を誇る、メカジキの名を持つ紅茶の国の艦上攻撃機。
旧式ながら赫々たる戦果をおさめた傑作機、その水上機型を強化改修、S9 Ospreyの後継機として輸出導入するif多用途作戦水上機、その初期モデルです。
Swordfish Mk.III Kai (Seaplane Model)._info_en:
The Swordfish is a seaplane from the country of tea, and even though it is an old model, this non-metal biplane has excellent reliability and operability.
This masterwork has a magnificent service record, with this multirole seaplane being an early what-if model that has been improved for export to replace the S9 Osprey.

Swordfish Mk.III Kai (Seaplane Model/Ski._info:
複葉非全金属製の旧世代機でありながら、高い信頼性と運用性を誇る、メカジキの名を持つ紅茶の国の艦上攻撃機。
旧式ながら赫々たる戦果をおさめた傑作機、その水上機型を強化改修、S9 Ospreyの後継機として輸出導入するif多用途作戦水上機を駆る熟練水上機作戦部隊です。
Swordfish Mk.III Kai (Seaplane Model/Ski._info_en:
The Swordfish is a seaplane from the country of tea. Even though it is an old model, this non-metal biplane has excellent reliability and operability.
This masterwork has a magnificent service record, with this multirole seaplane being an early what-if model piloted by a skilled crew that has been improved for export to replace the S9 Osprey.

TBD._info:
九七艦攻のライバルともいえる艦上攻撃機です。
速度が遅く、大戦初期の機体で激戦の中でも陳腐化しつつありましたが、その必死の戦いは大きな戦いの勝機をもたらしました。
TBD._info_en:
This carrier-capable torpedo bomber can be considered a rival to the Type 97.
It was slow and obsolete even during the fierce early days of the war, but its desperate attack contributed to a great victory.

TBF._info:
重い発動機と頑丈なボディを備えた、太平洋の戦い、その後半の大空を駆けた主力雷撃機「TBF」。
復讐者の名を持つこの新鋭艦上雷撃機は、F6Fシリーズの援護下で多くの日本主力艦艇群に痛撃を放つこととなります。
TBF._info_en:
With its heavy engine and sturdy body, the "TBF" is the mainstay torpedo bomber that took to the skies during the later stages of the Pacific War.
With the name of Avenger, this state-of-the-art carrier-capable torpedo bomber would unleash a crushing blow on many of Japan's naval groups under the protection of the F6F series.

TBM-3D._info:
重い発動機と頑丈なボディを備えた、太平洋の戦い、その後半の大空を駆けた主力雷撃機「TBF」。
復讐者の名を持つこの新鋭雷撃機に機上レーダーを搭載し、夜間作戦能力を付与したのが本機「TBM-3D」。
夜戦型艦戦を組み合わせた夜戦空母での集中運用もお試しあれ！
TBM-3D._info_en:
Equipped with a heavy engine and sturdy body, This main torpedo attack plane, "TBF" raced across the skies of the latter half of the Pacific War.
This new carrier-borne torpedo attack plane, carrying the name of Avengers, equipped with on-board radar, is capable of night operations as "TBM-3D".
Try out operations with a carrier-included fleet that focuses on night battles.

TBM-3W+3S._info:
重い発動機と頑丈なボディを備えた、太平洋の戦い、その後半の大空を駆けた主力雷撃機「TBF」。
同機に哨戒用レーダーを搭載したW型、さらに同機とペアを組む対潜攻撃に特化したS型。
戦後海上自衛隊でも運用された、対潜哨戒攻撃機ペアをさらに汎用性を高めたif改装機による攻撃哨戒機隊です。
TBM-3W+3S._info_en:
Possessing a heavy engine and a sturdy airframe, the "TBF" was the main torpedo bomber that soared in the skies during the latter half of the Pacific War.
This is a combination of the W-type that was mounted with a radar for patrolling and the S-type that was designed for anti-submarine strikes.
This is a what-if version that would've been operated by the post-war JMSDF as a hunter-killer combo after upgrades to increase versatility.
TBM-3W+3S._localized_name: Grumman TBM-3W Avenger & Grumman TBM-3S Avenger

Tenzan._info:
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新型の艦上攻撃機「天山」。
機動部隊に配備され、主に雷撃任務を担当します。
急降下爆撃機の｢彗星｣などと一緒に、ぜひ空母機動部隊で運用してくださいね。
Tenzan._info_en:
Developed as the successor of the obsolete "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", the new carrier-based attack aircraft "Tenzan".
When deployed in a mobile squadron, it is mainly responsible for fast-strike missions.
Together with the "Suisei" dive bomber, please operate it as part of your aircraft carrier mobile squadron.

Tenzan (601 Air Group)._info:
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新鋭艦上攻撃機「天山」。
本部隊は、同機を装備して内地で錬成を重ねた六〇一空による精鋭艦攻機隊です。
新生空母機動部隊の打撃力を担います。
Tenzan (601 Air Group)._info_en:
The new "Tenzan" was developed as a successor to the obsolete "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber".
This is the aircraft of choice of the elite 601st Air Group currently in training at the mainland.
This aircraft is intended to form the backbone of strike groups of the newly formed Carrier Task Force.
Tenzan (601 Air Group)._reading: てんざん(ろくまるいちくう)

Tenzan (931 Air Group)._info:
登場の遅れた名艦上攻撃機「天山」。
この機体を用いて対潜哨戒・対潜制圧・対艦攻撃を担う九三一航空隊所属の「天山」装備飛行隊です。
Tenzan (931 Air Group)._info_en:
The "Tenzan" was a carrier-based attack aircraft that was delayed into service.
This "Tenzan" saw service with the 931st Air Group where they were used for anti-submarine patrols and warfare, and surface warfare operations.
Tenzan (931 Air Group)._reading: てんざん(きゅうさんいちくう)

Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron)._info:
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新鋭艦上攻撃機「天山」。
同機を装備した本部隊は、高技量と豊かな指導力を兼ね備えた歴戦の空中指揮官が率いる、「天山」への機種転換が完了した精鋭艦攻隊です。
Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron)._info_en:
The "Tenzan" is an advanced torpedo bomber developed as a successor to the obsolete "Type 97 Attacker".
The command squadron equipped with this plane is an elite attack squadron that has converted to the "Tenzan", led by a veteran commander with a history of high skill and abundant leadership.
Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron)._reading: てんざんいちにがた(むらたたい)

Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron)._info:
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新鋭艦上攻撃機「天山」。
本部隊は、闘志溢れる空中指揮官が率いる、「天山」への機種転換が完了した熟練搭乗員で構成された精鋭艦攻隊です。
Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron)._info_en:
The "Tenzan" is a carrier-based torpedo bomber developed as a successor to the obsolete "Type 99 Torpedo Bomber".
This squadron, made up of a select group of skilled pilots, transitioned to the new "Tenzan" and was led by a spirited Air Group commander.
Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron)._reading: てんざんいちにがた(ともながたい)

Tenzan Model 12A._info:
「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された艦上攻撃機「天山」。
発動機を換装し、武装を強化。さらに細部を改修した「天山」の改良後期型です。
「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」、そして「大鳳」などの航空母艦で運用して、戦果を挙げたいですね。
Tenzan Model 12A._info_en:
A carrier-based torpedo bomber developed as the successor to the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", the "Tenzan".
Its engine has been replaced and armament strengthened. This is an improved late-model "Tenzan" with improved specs.
Use them on carriers like "Shoukaku", "Zuikaku", and "Taihou" for improved results.
Tenzan Model 12A._reading: てんざんいちにがたこう

Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6._info:
「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された艦上攻撃機「天山」その改良後期型に、機上電探空六号の改良調整型と電波高度計などの夜間作戦機材を装備した、夜間雷撃可能な新型夜間作戦艦上攻撃機。
同機で編成され、熟練搭乗員を集中配備した夜間作戦の要となる精鋭艦攻隊です。
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6._info_en:
Developed as the successor to the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", the "Tenzan", with this improved, late-war model coming equipped with a tuned-up Type 6 Airborne RADAR and a radio altimeter for nighttime operations, being a carrier-based torpedo bomber capable of performing night attacks.
This is an elite squadron of skilled pilots that will play an important role in nighttime operations.
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6._japanese_name: 天山一二型甲改(熟練/空六号電探改装備機)
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6._localized_name: Heavenly Mountain Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne Radar Kai)
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6._name: Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6 Airborne Radar Kai)
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (Skilled w/ Type 6._reading: てんざんいちにがたこうかい　(じゅくれん/くうろくごうでんたんかい そうびき)

Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne._info: 「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された艦上攻撃機「天山」その改良後期型に、機上電探空六号の改良調整型と電波高度計などの夜間作戦機材を装備した、夜間雷撃可能な新型夜間作戦艦上攻撃機です。
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne._info_en: Developed as the successor to the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", the "Tenzan", with this improved, late-war model coming equipped with a tuned-up Type 6 Airborne RADAR and a radio altimeter for nighttime operations, being a carrier-based torpedo bomber capable of performing night attacks.
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne._japanese_name: 天山一二型甲改(空六号電探改装備機)
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne._name: Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne Radar Kai)
Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne._reading: てんざんいちにがたこうかい　(くうろくごうでんたんかい そうびき)

Tenzan Model 12A Kai 2 (Murata Squadron._japanese_name: 天山一二型甲改二(村田隊/電探装備)
Tenzan Model 12A Kai 2 (Murata Squadron._name: Tenzan Model 12A Kai 2 (Murata Squadron w/ Radar)

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft._info:
特大発動艇、略して「特大発」。
輸送船からの揚陸作業や上陸戦に用いる数多く量産された上陸用舟艇、「大発」。
この海上のトラック「大発」を新型中戦車搭載等に対応するためより大型化、搭載力が向上しています。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft._info_en:
Toku Daihatsu-class Landing Craft or "Toku Daihatsu" for short.
Unloading and landing operations made use of great numbers of these mass-produced "Daihatsu" landing craft.
The maritime truck "Daihatsu" was increased in size to accommodate the new medium tank.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft._reading: とくだいはつどうてい
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft._special:
Provides bonuses against installations
Affects various resources mechanics

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + 11th Tank._info:
終戦時、北千島最北端、占守島に布陣していた精鋭、戦車第11連隊。
「士魂」部隊とも云われた同精鋭部隊を特大発動艇で輸送、海上機動及び上陸戦闘運用が可能です。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + 11th Tank._info_en:
The exceptional 11th Tank Regiment that was stationed on Shumshu, the northernmost of the Chishima Islands, at the end of the war.
With the help of Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft this elite unit, also called "Warrior Soul" unit, can be used to transport supplies, combat units from shore to shore and for landing operations.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + 11th Tank._japanese_name: 特大発動艇+戦車第11連隊
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + 11th Tank._name: Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + 11th Tank Regiment
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + 11th Tank._reading: とくだいはつてい+せんしゃだい11れんたい

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha._info:
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、 特徴的な鉢巻アンテナを持つ九七式中戦車、通称「チハ車」。
列強の新型戦車との対機甲戦闘には不向きでしたが、数多く量産され日本機甲部隊の主力となりました。
占守島の戦いでは、戦車第11連隊で多くの犠牲を出しつつ奮戦しています。
対機甲戦闘力向上を図った新砲塔のチハ車改も開発されています。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha._info_en:
The Type 97 medium tank was the principal tank of the Imperial Japanese Army. It has a characteristic headband-shaped antenna and was commonly known as the "Chi-Ha Tank".
Though it was unsuited for straight-up fights with newer tanks of the other great powers, it was produced in large numbers and used as the main tank of the IJA.
At the Battle of Shimushu, the 11th Tank Regiment fought bravely and sustained many casualties.
An upgraded Chi-Ha with better anti-tank capability was also in development.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha._reading: とくだいはつどうてい+チハ

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha Kai._info:
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、九七式中戦車、通称「チハ車」。
歩兵支援に主眼をおいたチハの対機甲戦闘力向上を図るべく、新開発の貫通力の高い新主砲を搭載した通称「チハ車改」。
列強の機甲戦力とも限定的な条件下なら、ある程度対抗が可能かもしれません。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha Kai._info_en:
The Type 97 medium tank was the main tank of the Imperial Japanese Army, commonly known as the "Chi-Ha".
In order to improve the Chi-Ha's anti-armor capability for its role as infantry support, the "Chi-Ha Kai" was equipped with a new main gun with better penetration power.
In some situations, it was able to overcome armored forces of the other great powers.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha Kai._name: Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha Kai
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Chi-Ha Kai._reading: とくだいはつどうてい+チハかい

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._info:
精鋭陸戦兵装を装備した陸戦隊とIII号戦車G型を搭載した、特別編成部隊と特大発動艇によるif強襲部隊です。
同部隊を満載した特大発自体も、北アフリカ戦仕様の特別塗装＆仕様となっています。
ある程度の対機甲戦闘も可能、北アフリカ戦線の着上陸戦闘において、その高い戦闘力を十分に発揮します。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._info_en:
A what-if specialized assault force consisting of elite troops accompanied by a Panzer III Ausf. G embarked on a toku daihatsu.
The toku daihatsu has a special paint job and modifications to suit the North African theatre.
Capable of limited anti-armor combat, it will display its full power in landing operations on the North African front.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._japanese_name: 特大発動艇+Ⅲ号戦車(北アフリカ仕様)
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._name: Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III (North African Specification)

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._info:
50mm60口径主砲を持つⅢ号戦車J型と、各国の精鋭陸戦隊が結集して日本の特大発動艇に乗り込むif着上陸強襲部隊です。
対機甲戦闘力を持つ後期Ⅲ号戦車を中心とした精鋭諸兵科連合部隊である本装備は、対深海ノルマンディー上陸作戦における着上陸戦闘においても、その真価が期待されます。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._info_en:
This is a what if landing force that combines the Panzer III Ausf. J with a 50 mm 60-caliber main gun and an elite landing squadron from various countries to board a Japanese Toku Daihatsu landing craft.
This equipment, which is an elite combined arms unit centered around a late Panzer III model with armor-piercing capability, is expected to prove its true value in landing battles during the deep-sea invasion of Normandy.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III._name: Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Panzer III Ausf. J

Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Type 1 Gun._info:
九七式中戦車の車体をベースに九〇式野砲を搭載した自走砲、通称一式砲戦車。
限定的ながら対戦車能力を有した機甲戦力です。
本部隊は、対戦車自走砲として圧倒的な敵に対して善戦した一式砲戦車と完全武装の随伴陸軍歩兵を特大発動艇に搭載。
対地上戦闘において、有効な戦闘力を発揮します。
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Type 1 Gun._info_en:
A self-propelled gun consisting of a Type 90 field gun mated to a Type 97 medium tank chassis, aka the Type 1 Gun tank.
This is an armored unit with limited anti-tank capabilities.
This unit consists of a Type 1 Gun tank, an anti-tank self-propelled gun that fought against overwhelming odds. It is accompanied by an armed-to-the-teeth infantry unit, all loaded on a Toku Daihatsu landing craft.
It is very effective in landing operations.
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Type 1 Gun._japanese_name: 特大発動艇+一式砲戦車
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Type 1 Gun._name: Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Type 1 Gun Tank
Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft + Type 1 Gun._special:
Provides bonuses against installations
Affects various resources mechanics

Torpedo Squadron Skilled Lookouts._info:
水雷戦隊、特にその主力である駆逐艦の熟練見張員です。
その鍛え抜かれた肉眼視力による偵察力・索敵力は状況によっては大きな威力を発揮し、敵艦隊のレーダー兵装が充実するまでは、夜戦などで水雷戦隊の脅威の戦闘力を支えます。
※状況によって専用の夜戦雷撃、鼠輸送時反撃も可能です！
Torpedo Squadron Skilled Lookouts._info_en:
A skilled lookout for torpedo squadrons, especially for those main force destroyers.
Depending on the circumstances, a trained eye can provide superior search and reconnaissance. Before the enemy's RADAR matured, this helped to increase the combat potential of torpedo squadrons in night battle.
※Depending on the setup, it's possible to perform exclusive night battle torpedo attacks or rat transport counterattacks!
Torpedo Squadron Skilled Lookouts._japanese_name: 水雷戦隊 熟練見張員

Toukai (901 Air Group)._info:
十七試哨戒機として開発された本格的な陸上発進の対潜哨戒機「東海」。
第九〇一航空隊の集中配備された本機は、悪化した戦局と失われた制空権の中、大きな犠牲を払いながらも、対潜哨戒による敵潜制圧に努めました。
Toukai (901 Air Group)._info_en:
A fully-fledged land-based anti-submarine patrol aircraft developed from the 17th experimental patrol aircraft, the "Toukai".
The 901st Air Group, which was exclusively equipped with these aircraft, made many sacrifices conducting anti-submarine patrols to counteract enemy submarines amidst the deteriorating state of the war and loss of air superiority.

Type 0 Fighter Model 21._info:
「ゼロ戦」の名で知られる名機「零式艦上戦闘機」の初期型です。7.7mm機銃2門と自慢の20mm機銃2門を装備。
優れた格闘戦能力と長大な航続距離で、その圧倒的な力を見せつけました。
やがて敵が強力な新型機になってくると、火力と速度、防弾性などの弱点が露呈していきます。
Type 0 Fighter Model 21._info_en:
Known as the "Zero-fighter", this is the initial variant of the "Type Zero Carrier-based Fighter". Equipment included twin 7.7 mm machine guns and boasted twin 20 mm cannons.
With a far-reaching range and excellent dogfighting ability, it represented overwhelming power.
But eventually, when the enemy produced new machines with greater firepower and speed, weaknesses such as ballistic resistance were revealed.
Type 0 Fighter Model 21._reading: れいしきかんせん21がた

Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)._info:
熟練搭乗員で構成された「零式艦上戦闘機」装備の艦戦隊です。
7.7mm機銃2門と自慢の20mm機銃2門、優れた格闘戦能力と長大な航続距離。
搭乗員達の高い技量もあって、初期段階では圧倒的な力を誇りました。
艦隊の上空直援や攻撃隊の護衛で活躍しま 。
Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)._info_en:
"Zero carrier-borne fighters" used by skilled pilots.
It boasts incredible agility and long operational range and has two 7.7 mm machine guns on the engine cowling and two 20 mm cannons at the wings.
In the hands of a skilled pilot, it can be a deadly adversary in the early times.
This aircraft also patrols and guards the airspace of the fleet.
Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)._reading: れいしきかんせん21がた(じゅくれん)

Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Tainan Air Grou._info:
圧倒的な練度を誇る、基地航空隊の戦闘機部隊「台南空」。
数々のエースを輩出した熟練戦闘機搭乗員による零戦隊です。
初期型ではありますが、航続距離が長く現場に愛された零式艦戦21型を駆り、制空戦闘や防空、攻撃隊掩護に活躍しました。
Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Tainan Air Grou._info_en:
A land-based fighter squadron boasting overwhelming skill, the "Tainan Air Group".
This is a skilled Type 0 squadron that has produced numerous aces.
Although it is an early-war model, the long cruising range of the Type 0 Model 21 made it a favorite among deployed forces, being used for air superiority, base defense, and even escorting bombers.

Type 0 Fighter Model 22 (251 Air Group)._info:
圧倒的な練度を誇った基地航空隊の戦闘機部隊「台南空」が名称変更した部隊です。
厳しいソロモンの空を支えました。翼端が短くなって航続距離の落ちてしまった32型をさらに改良、ある程度バランスのとれた機体となりました。
熟練搭乗員が次々と倒れる中、苦しい戦局の崩れつつあるソロモンの空を必死に支えます。
Type 0 Fighter Model 22 (251 Air Group)._info_en:
A land-based fighter squadron boasting overwhelming skill, the "Tainan Air Group".
They defended the harsh skies above the Solomons. The Type 32 with, its shortened wingspan and lower cruising range, has been upgraded further to produce a well-rounded airframe.
With aces dropping like flies, they desperately defend the skies above the Solomons amidst the deteriorating situation.

Type 0 Fighter Model 32._info:
名機零式艦戦21型の性能向上型、「零式艦上戦闘機32型」です。
翼端を角型に変更、エンジン換装により出力向上を図りました。
また、搭載機銃の弾数も増やしています。
航続距離など不利な点もありましたが、ラバウル航空隊やブイン、そしてソロモン上空の戦いに参加しました。
Type 0 Fighter Model 32._info_en:
An improvement over the high-performance Model 21 Zero, the "Type 0 Fighter Carrier-Based Model 32".
The wing tips were squared off and the engine retrofitted to improve performance.
In addition to that, the ammunition capacity of the machine guns was increased.
It was at a disadvantage when it came to operation range but it still served in the Rabaul and Buin Air Corps as well as in the skies of Solomon.
Type 0 Fighter Model 32._reading: れいしきかんせん32がた

Type 0 Fighter Model 32 (Skilled)._info:
熟練搭乗員で構成された「零式艦上戦闘機32型」装備の艦戦隊です。
翼端を切り落としたスタイルの21型の性能向上型「32型」は、航続距離などに課題もありましたが、精鋭の熟練搭乗員が駆る同機は、ラバウル、そしてソロモン上空の激戦を支えました。
Type 0 Fighter Model 32 (Skilled)._info_en:
A carrier-based squadron made up of skilled crew equipped with the "Type 0 Fighter Model 32".
The "Model 32" was an improvement over the Model 21, it had its wingtips squared off and although it had issues with range, it was piloted by skilled elites in Rabaul and in the fierce battles in the skies above Solomon.
Type 0 Fighter Model 32 (Skilled)._reading: れいしきかんせん32がた(じゅくれん)

Type 0 Fighter Model 32 (Tainan Air Grou._info:
圧倒的な練度を誇る、基地航空隊の戦闘機部隊「台南空」。
数々のエースを輩出した熟練戦闘機搭乗員による零戦隊、より運動性の高い32型に機種転換しました。
零式艦戦21型より航続距離が劣り、ソロモンの空では苦戦しましたが、高い格闘性能で制空戦闘や防空戦などで前線を支えます。
Type 0 Fighter Model 32 (Tainan Air Grou._info_en:
A land-based fighter squadron boasting overwhelming skill, the "Tainan Air Group".
The skilled Type 0 squadron that had produced numerous aces switched over to the Model 32 which had greater mobility.
However, the cruising range was inferior to the Model 21 and they struggled in the skies above the Solomons, but despite this, its high dogfighting capabilities allowed it to support the front lines in air superiority and air defense.

Type 0 Fighter Model 52._info:
零戦の最終的な量産機となった改良型、「零式艦上戦闘機52型」です。
後継機の開発が遅れたため、零戦52型が後期の主力艦上戦闘機として奮戦することになりました。
「彗星」艦爆や「天山」艦攻と一緒に、機動部隊の主力として運用してくださいね。
Type 0 Fighter Model 52._info_en:
The final mass-production version of the Zero-fighter, "Type Zero Carrier-based Fighter Type 52".
As the development of its successors was delayed, the Zero-fighter Type 52 fought bravely as the main late-war carrier-based fighter.
Along with the "Suisei" bomber and "Tenzan" torpedo bomber, please use it as your mainstay air task force.
Type 0 Fighter Model 52._reading: れいしきかんせん52がた

Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)._info:
熟練搭乗員で構成された「零式艦上戦闘機52型」装備の艦戦隊です。
零戦の最終的な量産機となった「52型」は、後継機の開発が遅れたため、後期の艦上戦闘機の主力として奮戦することになりました。
熟練搭乗員の巧みな操縦技術で、機材の質的劣勢をカバーします。
Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)._info_en:
Carrier-based "Type 52 Zero Fighters" piloted by skilled pilots.
"Type 52" was the last mass-produced model of the Zero fighters and due to the development delays of its successors, it continued to be the backbone of the carrier fighter force.
The skills of the skilled pilots will cover for the technological inferiority.
Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)._reading: れいしきかんせん52がた(じゅくれん)

Type 0 Fighter Model 53 (Iwamoto Squadro._info:
遂に飛行隊を預かることになった「零戦虎徹」岩本隊長率いる、「零式艦上戦闘機53型」装備の艦戦隊です。
「52型」のエンジンと生存性を強化した性能向上型である「零戦53型」を駆り、熟練搭乗員を率いて戦いの空に駆け上がります。
Type 0 Fighter Model 53 (Iwamoto Squadro._info_en:
The last command of Lt. Iwamoto, the "Reisen Kotetsu", a carrier-based squadron equipped with "Type 53 Zero Fighters".
Improvements to the engines and airframe of the "Type 52" resulted in the new model "Type 53", it soars into battle piloted by skilled pilots.
Type 0 Fighter Model 53 (Iwamoto Squadro._reading: れいしきかんせん53がた(いわもとたい)

Type 0 Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber)._info:
零式艦上戦闘機を艦上爆撃機仕様にした、通称「爆戦」です。
52型の胴体下に250㎏爆弾掛吊架を増設しました。
戦闘爆撃機型の機体で、爆撃後は制空戦闘機として空戦に参加できるマルチロールファイター。
あの攻撃方法は採用しないで通常攻撃です！
Type 0 Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber)._info_en:
The Type Zero Fighter in bomber specification, commonly known as a "fighter-bomber".
A hanging 250 kg bomb has been added under the fuselage of the Type 52.
As a fighter-bomber, it is a multi-role fighter that can participate in dogfighting as an air superiority fighter after bombing.
That paradigm of engagement is not usually seen!
Type 0 Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber)._reading: れいしきかんせん62がた(ばくせん)

Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber)._info:
零式艦上戦闘機の戦闘爆撃機仕様、通称「爆戦」の改良後期型です。
改良型エンジンに換装、燃料タンクを防弾仕様化した零戦の性能向上型、53型。
その胴体下に250kgまたは500kg爆弾懸吊架を増設、爆撃機動に耐えられるよう、一部機体強度も強化しています。
重巡改装の攻撃型軽空母などで、ぜひ機動部隊運用を！
Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber)._info_en:
An improved, late-model version of the Zero "Fighter-Bomber".
The improved Model 53 features an improved engine and bulletproof fuel tanks.
Under the fuselage are added hardpoints for 250 kg or 500 kg bombs, and parts of the airframe have also been strengthened to better withstand the movements of bombing missions.
Add it to the improved heavy cruisers and light carriers of your mobile task force!
Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber)._reading: れいしきかんせん63がた(ばくせん)

Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Air Superiority._info:
名機零戦の最終モデルの一つ。
数機のみ実際に完成した幻の機体です。
次々に登場する連合国の新型高性能機に対抗すべく、高出力の金星エンジンを搭載、従来の格闘戦より一撃離脱戦法を重視した機体です。
本機は改修熟成していくことで、さらに制空戦闘機として能力を発揮していきます。
Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Air Superiority._info_en:
One of the last models of the famous Type Zero Fighter.
Only a few of these fabled fighters were ever completed.
In order to contest the new high-performance allied aircraft that entered the theatre, it is equipped with a high-output Kinsei engine. This model deemphasizes dogfighting in favor of hit-and-run tactics.
It will continue to demonstrate its strength as an air superiority fighter as its upgrades improve.
Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Air Superiority._japanese_name: 零式艦戦64型(制空戦闘機仕様)
Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Air Superiority._name: Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Air Superiority Fighter Specification)

Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Skilled Fighter._info:
数機のみ実際に完成し、終戦時に残存した名機零戦の幻の最終型、本機は熟練搭乗員の駆る、その戦闘爆撃機タイプです。
次々に登場する連合国の新型高性能機に対抗すべく、高出力の金星エンジンを搭載、機体強度を強化。
従来の格闘戦重視を捨て、一撃離脱に注力した機体に、250kg爆弾と両翼に全機銃とロケット弾搭載レールを装備した、強襲型戦闘爆撃機です。
Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Skilled Fighter._info_en:
Only a few of the last models of the fabled Type Zero fighter were produced and survived till the end of the war. This fighter-bomber variant is piloted by an experienced crew.
In order to contest the new high-performance Allied aircraft that entered the theatre, it is equipped with a high-output Kinsei engine and a strengthened airframe.
Equipped with 250 kg bombs and machine guns and rocket rails on both wings, it is an assault-focused fighter bomber that deemphasizes dogfighting to focus on striking a single blow.

Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Two-seat w/ KMX._info:
零式艦上戦闘機の後期強化型64型。
同機をさらにif改装し、小型軽量化したKMX及び対潜攻撃兵装を装備。
コックピットも複座化して索敵及びナビゲート要員も搭載する対潜戦闘爆撃機です。
南方航路を死守すべく、基地航空隊及び護衛空母で戦う931航空隊に配備され、彼我の切迫する制空権の中、東海などと共に哨戒に出撃敵潜制圧と海上護衛のために戦います。
Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Two-seat w/ KMX._info_en:
A late-model upgrade of the Type 0 Model 64 shipborne fighter.
This unit is a what-if upgrade is equipped with a lightweight KMX and anti-submarine equipment.
The two-seat cockpit on this anti-submarine fighter/bomber has space for a reconnaissance/navigation officer.
It was deployed with the 931 Squadron who operated from land bases and escort carriers to defend the Southern corridor. Along with desperately trying to secure air superiority, it patrolled the seas alongside the Toukai to suppress enemy submarines and escort convoys.
Type 0 Fighter Model 64 (Two-seat w/ KMX._japanese_name: 零式艦戦64型(複座KMX搭載機)

Type 0 Observation Seaplane._info:
複葉でありながら、優れた運動性と高い空戦能力を持つ二座の水上偵察機です。
主力艦隊の砲戦弾着観測と偵察のための機体ですが、その高い格闘戦闘力は、専門の水上戦闘機も顔負けの高性能ぶり。
複葉機だけど近代的な、名作観測機なのです！
Type 0 Observation Seaplane._info_en:
Although being a biplane, this is a dual-seat float reconnaissance plane with outstanding maneuverability and high air-to-air capability.
Its initial purpose was for fleet gunnery spotting and reconnaissance, however its high dogfight ability even out-qualify purposely built float fighters.
Being modern enough and a biplane, it's undoubtedly a masterpiece of its own class.
Type 0 Observation Seaplane._reading: れいしきすいじょうかんそくき

Type 0 Passive Sonar._info:
大型艦用パッシブソナー兵装です。
九三式水中聴音機の捕音機を増強した大型グレードアップバージョンで、大和型戦艦のバルバス・バウ付近にも装備されました。
専門の人員も配置して水面下の音を収集、敵潜などの早期発見に努めます。
Type 0 Passive Sonar._info_en:
A Passive SONAR system for large ships.
An upgrade from the Type 93 Passive SONAR, with a larger sound collector, it was equipped on Yamato-class battleship within their bulbous bow.
Specialized personnel constantly listening on the machine, trying to quickly recognize any enemy submarines.
Type 0 Passive Sonar._reading: れいしきすいちゅうちょうおんき

Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane._info:
「零水偵」とも呼ばれる標準的な水上偵察機です。
戦艦や巡洋艦、水上機母艦などに搭載され、索敵任務担当として艦隊の「目」の役目を務めます。
海戦は索敵が大事！
ぜひ、主力艦艇に搭載して、運用してくださいね。
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane._info_en:
The standard naval reconnaissance aircraft, also known as the "Reimitei".
Carried by battleships, cruisers, and seaplane tenders, it served as the "Eye" of the fleet, operating recon missions.
Scouting is important for battles!
Please operate it on your flagships!
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane._reading: れいしきすいじょうていさつき

Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11A._japanese_name: 零式水上偵察機11型甲改二

Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._info:
艦隊の航空偵察の主役として、戦いの前半期では幅広い局面で活躍した「零式水上偵察機」。
戦艦や巡洋艦、水上機母艦などに搭載され、三座を活かして艦隊の「目」としての索敵任務に務めました。
本機は、哨戒性能等を強化した同機の改良後期型です。
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._info_en:
A "Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane" that played a large role as the fleets' aerial scout during various stages in the first half of the war.
It was carried by battleships, cruisers, and seaplane tenders among other ships and served as the "eye" of the fleet during reconnaissance missions by capitalizing on its three seats.
This plane is an improved model that received modifications to its patrolling capabilities etc.
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._reading: れいしきすいじょうていさつき11がたおつ

Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._info:
艦隊の航空偵察の主役として、戦いの前半期では幅広い局面で活躍した「零式水上偵察機」。
各水上艦艇に搭載され、三座を活かして艦隊の「目」としての索敵任務に務めました。
本機は、熟練搭乗員ペアの駆る、哨戒性能等を強化した改良後期型です。
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._info_en:
The "Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane" was the leading reconnaissance seaplane of the fleet. It performed various missions early in the war.
It was equipped on every ship in the fleet. The crew of three would undertake reconnaissance missions and act as the "eye" of the fleet.
This plane is an improved late model with improved reconnaissance abilities that is piloted by a pair of skilled pilots.
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._japanese_name: 零式水上偵察機11型乙(熟練)
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._reading: れいしきすいじょうていさつき11がたおつ（じゅくれん）

Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._info:
艦隊の航空偵察の主役として、戦いの前半期では幅広い局面で活躍した「零式水上偵察機」。
各水上艦艇に搭載され、三座を活かして艦隊の「目」としての索敵任務に務めました。
本機は電探装備の同機をさらに改修、夜間偵察機として整備改修された新配備三座夜間水上偵察機です。
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._info_en:
The "Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane" was the leading reconnaissance seaplane of the fleet and was widely used during the first half of the war.
It was equipped on every ship in the fleet. The crew of three would undertake reconnaissance missions and act as the "eyes" of the fleet.
This unit is a new three-seater night reconnaissance seaplane that has been upgraded for night operations with the addition of a surface RADAR.
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._japanese_name: 零式水上偵察機11型乙改(夜偵)
Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B._name: Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane Model 11B Kai (Night Recon)

Type 0 Small Reconnaissance Seaplane._info:
潜水艦搭載偵察機として開発された、文字通り小型格納可能な水上偵察機で巡潜甲型及び同乙型などに搭載されました。
主翼及びフロート、そしてその支柱までも分解格納及び組み立て発進が容易となるように設計された小型軽量の潜水艦搭載用の偵察機です。
日本機として、唯一の実績も持つ機体です。
性能だけが、全てではないかもしれません！ぜひ、伊号潜に！
Type 0 Small Reconnaissance Seaplane._info_en:
Developed as a submarine-based reconnaissance aircraft, it was a small seaplane that could literally be stored on board, and was deployed on submarine cruisers such as the Type B and C.
It is a small and lightweight reconnaissance aircraft designed for submarine deployment, with the main wings, floats, and even their struts designed for easy disassembly, storage, and assembly.
It is the only Japanese aircraft with a proven track record.
Performance alone may not be everything! By all means, go to I-go Sub!

Type 0 Small Reconnaissance Seaplane (Sk._info:
伊号潜水艦搭載偵察機として開発された、文字通り小型軽量、小さく格納可能な水上偵察機、その熟練搭乗員操縦機です。
主翼及びフロート、そしてその支柱までも分解格納及び組み立て発進が容易となるように設計された小型軽量の潜水艦搭載用の偵察機です。
日本機として、唯一の実績も持つ機体を熟練のペアが操ります。
潜水艦による要地偵察にぜひ！
Type 0 Small Reconnaissance Seaplane (Sk._info_en:
It is literally a small, lightweight, and retractable surface reconnaissance aircraft that was developed as a reconnaissance aircraft mounted on I-go submarines, and it is operated by an experienced crew.
It is a small and lightweight reconnaissance aircraft designed for submarine deployment, with the main wings, floats, and even their struts designed for easy disassembly, storage, and assembly.
A pair of experienced pilots operate the aircraft, which is the only Japanese aircraft with a proven track record.
Great for scouting key locations by submarine!

Type 1 Armor Piercing Shell._info:
遠距離砲撃戦における秘密兵器「九一式徹甲弾」の改良版です。
海中突入後魚雷のように敵艦水線下に突き進み、喫水下破砕を企図した特殊徹甲弾です。
九一式より性能・生産性が向上しており、弾頭部には弾着観測用着色剤を充填していたと云われています。
戦艦・航空戦艦・高速戦艦で使用可能です。
Type 1 Armor Piercing Shell._info_en:
The Type 1 Armor Piercing shell is an improved version of the secret "Type 91 Armor Piercing Shell" fired from long-range cannons.
It is intended to work by plunging into the sea, striking the hull below the waterline of the enemy ship like a torpedo.
It has better performance than the Type 91, and has colored dyes for identification and target assists.
It can be equipped on battleships, aviation battleships, and fast battleships.
Type 1 Armor Piercing Shell._reading: いちしきてっこうだん

Type 1 Armor Piercing Shell Kai._info:
遠距離砲撃戦における秘密兵器「九一式徹甲弾」改良版、「一式徹甲弾」。
本徹甲弾はそのさらなる改良版です。
本改良徹甲弾は弾頭炸薬を増量し、被帽頭を再設計したif強化弾です。
海中突入後魚雷のように敵艦水線下に突き進む喫水下破砕を企図した水中弾能力も強化、もちろん弾頭部に弾着観測用着色剤を充填。
戦艦・航空戦艦・高速戦艦で運用可能です。
Type 1 Armor Piercing Shell Kai._info_en:
The "Type 1 Armor-Piercing Shell" is an improved version of the "Type 91 Armor-Piercing Shell" that was meant as a secret weapon for long-ranged shelling.
This AP shell is a further improved version.
This what-if upgrade of the AP shell has a larger bursting charge and a redesigned cap, and it was designed to cut through the water to hit enemy ships below the waterline like a torpedo.
Of course, dye caps were also included to help spot the shots.
It can be used on battleships, aviation battleships, and fast battleships.
Type 1 Armor Piercing Shell Kai._reading: いちしきてっこうだんかい

Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II._info:
最も量産された陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」、その改良二型です。
零式艦戦とよく似た機体ですが、防弾性にも留意したその機体はやや旧式ながら各戦線で戦いの最後まで奮戦を続けました。
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II._info_en:
'The most mass-produced, main fighter model used by the Imperial Japanese Army - the Army Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa", the improved second model.
It resembles the IJN's Zero Fighters, and despite the consideration of its bullet-proof capabilities and that it is an old model, it continued to fight hard at various front lines til the end of the war.
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II._localized_name: Army Type 1 Fighter Peregrine Falcon Model II
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II._reading: いっしきせんはやぶさIIがた

Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II (64th S._info:
陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」を装備する飛行戦隊です。
加藤隼戦闘隊とも呼ばれました。
加藤名隊長の育てた同戦隊は緒戦の大活躍の後、南方作戦やビルマ方面で苦しい戦局の中奮戦を続け、最後まで隼と共に戦い抜きます。
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II (64th S._info_en:
This is an army fighter squadron equipped with the IJA's main fighter, the Army Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa".
It is also called as the Katou's Hayabusa Squadron.
Led and trained by the famous squadron leader Katou and after various outstanding performances since the beginning of the war, it continued to fight hard in the Southern Operations and the Burmese region despite the unfavorable state of the war. It continued to use the Hayabusa until the end.
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II (64th S._localized_name: Army Type 1 Fighter Peregrine Falcon Model II (64th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II (64th S._name: Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II (64th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II (64th S._reading: いっしきせんはやぶさIIがた(64せんたい)

Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20._info:
最も量産された陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」、その改良二型です。
機体の基本設計自体は旧式となりつつありましたが、使い慣れた機体を洋上迷彩で塗装、対潜爆弾を装備、さらに本機は陸軍特設空母などでの運用に特化したif改良艦載対潜哨戒機です。
※基地航空隊戦力としても、展開＆運用可能です。
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20._info_en:
The mass-produced Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa" was the main fighter of the IJA. This is the upgraded Model II variant.
Though its basic design was becoming obsolete, the mature design was given a maritime camouflage and anti-submarine bombs. This what-if variant is an upgraded anti-submarine patrol aircraft designed for operating off certain IJA carriers.
※This aircraft can be deployed on land bases.
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20._japanese_name: 一式戦 隼II型改(20戦隊)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20._localized_name: Army Type 1 Fighter Peregrine Falcon Model II Mk.1 (20th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20._name: Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model II Kai (20._reading: いっしきせん はやぶさにがたかい(20せんたい)

Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A._info:
最も量産された陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」、その最終量産型です。
機体の基本設計自体は旧式となりつつありましたが、エンジン等を強化した本機は各戦線で戦いの最終局面まで奮闘を続けました。
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A._info_en:
The most mass-produced, main fighter model used by the Imperial Japanese Army - the Army Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa", the final mass-production model.
The design of the plane follows the older model, but the engine and other various parts were improved and it continued to fight desperately at various front lines until the end of the war.
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A._localized_name: Army Type 1 Fighter Peregrine Falcon Model III A
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A._name: Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A._reading: いっしきせん はやぶさIIIがたこう

Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54t._info:
陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」を装備する飛行戦隊です。
折り鶴の部隊マークの同戦隊は、北海道や北方千島方面などにも展開しました。
北千島派遣隊の隼は、占守島の戦いでも奮戦します。
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54t._info_en:
This is an army fighter squadron equipped with the IJA's main fighter, the Army Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa".
Marked with patterns of folded cranes, this squadron was deployed to places like Hokkaido and the Kuril Islands.
The Hayabusas that were deployed to the northern Kuril Islands fought desperately during the Battle of Shumshu.
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54t._japanese_name: 一式戦 隼III型甲(54戦隊)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54t._localized_name: Army Type 1 Fighter Peregrine Falcon Model III A (54th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54t._name: Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III A (54t._reading: いっしきせんはやぶさIIIがたこう(54せんたい)

Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (S._info:
最も量産された陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」、その改良三型をさらに船載運用if改装した戦闘洋上哨戒機です。
機体の基本設計自体は旧式となりつつありましたが、熟成を重ねた名機に洋上迷彩を塗装、対潜爆弾を装備、さらに本機は陸軍特設空母などでの運用に特化したif改良艦載対潜哨戒機です。
熟練空中勤務者の駆る同機は強力な洋上戦力へと成長します。
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (S._info_en:
The mass-produced Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa" was the main fighter of the IJA. This upgraded what-if variant is a maritime patrol aircraft capable of shipborne operations.
Though its basic design was becoming obsolete, the mature design was given a maritime camouflage and anti-submarine bombs. This what-if variant is an upgraded anti-submarine patrol aircraft designed for operating off certain IJA carriers.
This unit piloted by skilled airmen will be a powerful maritime asset.
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (S._japanese_name: 一式戦 隼III型改(熟練/20戦隊)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (S._localized_name: Army Type 1 Fighter Peregrine Falcon Model III Mk.1 (Skilled/20th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (S._name: Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (Skilled/20th Squadron)
Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (S._reading: いっしきせん はやぶさIIIがたかい(じゅくれん/20せんたい)

Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft._info:
陸上航空基地より発進、敵艦船への対艦攻撃及び敵飛行場等への対地攻撃などを行った海軍の主力陸上攻撃機です。
戦場の制空権を失った大戦後期は大きな犠牲を払いましたが、本機「一式陸攻」は、まぎれもない海軍基地航空打撃力の中核として奮戦しました。
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft._info_en:
Launching from land-based airfields, it was deployed in anti-naval roles against enemy vessels as well as for bombardment of enemy airfields as the Navy's main land-based bomber.
Although late in the war the loss of air superiority led to heavy losses, the "Type 1 Land Attacker" indisputably fought bravely as the core of the Naval Aviation's attacking forces to the end.

Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft (Hachi._info:
あの戦いの前半期活躍した一式陸攻と内地後方の精鋭搭乗員をかき集めて編成された八幡空襲部隊の陸攻隊です。
最前線となった硫黄島に展開、大きな戦果が期待されましたが、進出タイミングの不首尾や事故等もあり、ほぼ戦わずして戦力を喪失しています。
今度は大きな戦果を！
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft (Hachi._info_en:
The land-based attack section of the Hachiman Force was formed by gathering the elite crew who flew Type 1 Attack Aircraft early in the war and from domestic squadrons.
It was deployed to the front at Iwo Jima with the expectation of great things, but due to problems with timing and accidents, it was destroyed without seeing much action.
They will bring great results this time!
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft (Hachi._reading: いっしきりくこう（はちまんぶたい）

Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft (Nonak._info:
歴戦の中攻乗りの空中指揮官、野中飛行長の率いる精鋭「一式陸攻」隊です。
新鋭の「一式陸攻」を装備し、士気の高い「野中一家」の搭乗員たちと共に、通常攻撃で対艦・対地攻撃に出撃します。
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft (Nonak._info_en:
This is the "Type 1 Land Attacker" squadron led by a commander in the air, Nonaka.
Equipped with the newest "Type 1 Land Attacker", the pilots of the "Nonaka branch" will run anti-ship/anti-structure missions with high morale.
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft (Nonak._reading: いっしきりくこう(のなかたい)

Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._info:
陸上航空基地より発進、敵艦船への対艦攻撃及び敵飛行場等への対地攻撃などを行った海軍の主力陸上攻撃機「一式陸攻」、その性能向上型です。
機体の一部を再設計改修、さらに機体上部の旋回機銃と機体側面機銃を強化、性能は限定的ではありましたが機上電探も搭載しました。
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._info_en:
This is the improved-capability model of the Navy's main land-based attack aircraft the "Type 1 Land-based Attacker", which deployed from land air bases and carried out anti-ship attacks on enemy ships, anti-ground attacks on enemy airfields, and such.
Portions of the airframe were redesigned, as well as the addition of a rotating machine gun on the top of the airframe and the enhancement of the lateral machine guns, and even though its capabilities were limited, a plane-mounted radar was also installed.
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._japanese_name: 一式陸攻 二二型甲
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._reading: いっしきりくこう ににがたこう

Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._info:
陸上航空基地より発進、敵艦船への対艦攻撃及び敵飛行場等への対地攻撃などを行った海軍の主力陸上攻撃機「一式陸攻」のさらなる性能向上型です。
尾翼形状などを再設計改修、また脆弱性の原因となっていた燃料タンク問題改善にも着手した改良後期型の一式陸攻です。
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._info_en:
An improved version of the Navy's premier ground attack plane "Type 1 Land Attacker"; launched from land-based air bases for anti-ship operations against enemy vessels and air-raids against enemy airfields.
This is a late remodel of the Type 1 Land Attacker that has undergone changes to the shape of the tail and a redesign to fix the vulnerability of the fuel tank.
Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model._reading: いっしきりくこう さんよんがた

Type 13 Air Radar._info:
艦載用対空電探です。
当初陸上用として開発されたものでしたが、小型軽量で艦載も可能だったため、「13号対空電探」として採用されました。
最終的に戦艦や空母まで、多くの艦艇に装備された傑作電探です。
Type 13 Air Radar._info_en:
It is a ship-borne radar.
Originally intended as ground-based radar, a lightweight version intended for ships was conceived and the "Type 13 Air Radar" was developed.
It then became a mainstay radar of ships from battleships to aircraft carriers.

Type 13 Air Radar Kai._info:
艦載用対空電探の改良調整版です。
比較的信頼性も高く、小型軽量で駆逐艦等への装備も可能だった「13号対空電探」に、技術者達がさらに改良を加えた対空電探です。
水雷戦隊の眼として活躍します。
Type 13 Air Radar Kai._info_en:
This is an improved version of the radar intended for use aboard warships.
While the "Type 13 Air Radar" is reliable, this small class of air search radar intended for use in destroyers was further improved by engineers.
This radar is basically the eyes of the Destroyer Squadron.
Type 13 Air Radar Kai._reading: 13ごうたいくうでんたんかい

Type 13 Air Radar Kai (Late Model)._info:
艦載用対空電探の戦訓を活かした改良後期型です。
比較的信頼性も高く、小型軽量で駆逐艦等への装備も可能だった「13号対空電探」に、第一線の駆逐艦等で運用された戦訓を盛り込み、現場と技術者達がさらに改良を加えたif改良小型対空電探です。
水雷戦隊の眼として活躍します。
Type 13 Air Radar Kai (Late Model)._info_en:
This is a late-model shipborne anti-air RADAR improved with lessons learned from combat.
The "Type 13 Air RADAR" was relatively reliable. Compact and lightweight, it was equipped on destroyers and the like. Incorporating lessons learned by the frontline destroyers, this small RADAR is a what-if version with upgrades done by engineers on site.
It will prove its worth as the eyes of torpedo squadrons.

Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai._info:
元々は大戦後半期に日本陸軍が開発した陸戦用の迫撃砲です。
十分な対潜装備のなかった陸軍の船舶などに搭載され、前方投射型の対潜火器としても運用されました。
本兵装は同迫撃砲をさらに改良した艦載用強化型です。
爆雷投射機の代替として、また限定的ながら対地攻撃も可能です。
Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai._info_en:
This mortar was originally developed by the Imperial Japanese Army in the latter half of the war.
It was mounted forwards for anti-submarine use on IJA ships that did not have sufficient anti-submarine equipment.
This is an improved shipborne model of that mortar.
It can substitute for a depth charge projector and is also capable of limited ground attacks.
Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai._reading: にしき12センチはくげきほうかい

Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai (Concentrated Dep._info:
日本陸軍が開発した陸戦用の迫撃砲の艦載型改良型です。
十分な対潜装備のなかった船舶に装備され、前方投射型の対潜火器としても運用された同迫撃砲をさらに強化改良、これを集中配備した代替対潜火器装備です。
同兵装をさらに集中運用、大量の迫撃砲弾の連続発射による対地制圧攻撃も可能です。
Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai (Concentrated Dep._info_en:
An improved shipborne model of the mortar was developed by the Imperial Japanese Army for land warfare.
This is the concentrated deployment of the improvised anti-submarine equipment, with these upgraded mortars mounted forward on ships that did not have sufficient anti-submarine equipment.
Further concentrated deployment also allows these mortars to be used for ground suppression by firing multiple large salvos.
Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai (Concentrated Dep._japanese_name: 二式12cm迫撃砲改 集中配備
Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai (Concentrated Dep._reading: にしき12センチはくげきほうかい しゅうちゅうはいび

Type 2 Depth Charge._info:
対潜水艦に使用する増加爆雷装備です。
爆雷は戦訓を踏まえ、改良されています。
駆逐艦や海防艦などに爆雷投射機やソナー類などの対潜装備ともに装備することで、対潜能力の向上が図れます。
Type 2 Depth Charge._info_en:
This is additional depth charge equipment for use in anti-submarine actions.
The depth charges have been improved from wartime testing.
When equipped in combination with depth charge projectors, sonar, and such anti-submarine equipment on destroyers, coastal defense ships, and the like, anti-submarine ability will increase.

Type 2 Depth Charge Kai 2._info:
対潜水艦に使用する増加爆雷装備です。
装填爆薬の改良、爆発深度調整幅の拡大、誘爆対策など、爆雷は戦訓を踏まえ、実用的に大きく改良されています。
駆逐艦や海防艦などに爆雷投射機やソナー類などの対潜装備とともに装備することで、対潜能力の向上が図れます。
一部改装駆逐艦で、さらに高い運用性を発揮します。
Type 2 Depth Charge Kai 2._info_en:
A supplementary depth charge for anti-submarine use.
Using lessons learned in combat, these depth charges have been upgraded with a larger explosive charge, wider operational depth, and resistance to secondary explosions.
You can improve the anti-submarine strength of destroyers and coastal defense ships by equipping this along with depth charge projectors and sonars.
It has even greater capabilities on certain remodeled destroyers.

Type 2 Land-based Reconnaissance Aircraf._info:
十三試陸戦として開発された双発陸上戦闘機。
双発遠距離戦闘機開発としては成功しなかった本機を、偵察機として正式採用したのが、この「二式陸偵」です。
ラバウルに展開した本機が後に現地改修され、20mm斜銃2挺を装備、ラバウルや本土防空戦で大型爆撃機相手に奮戦した、あの夜間戦闘機「月光」が誕生しました。
Type 2 Land-based Reconnaissance Aircraf._info_en:
A twin-engine land-based fighter developed during thirteen trial fights.
Developed as a twin-engine long-distance fighter plane that didn't succeed, was formally accepted as a reconnaissance plane, this is the "Type 2 Land Based Reconnaissance Aircraft".
Deployed in Rabaul the original plane was locally improved, equipped with two diagonally firing 20 mm guns, it fiercely fought a large-sized enemy bomber in Rabaul and in the mainland air defense, on those battles the night fighter "Gekkou" was born.
Type 2 Land-based Reconnaissance Aircraf._reading: にしきりくじょうていさつき

Type 2 Land-based Reconnaissance Aircraf._info:
十三試陸戦として開発された双発陸上戦闘機。
双発遠距離戦闘機開発としては成功しなかった本機を、偵察機として正式採用した「二式陸偵」、同機を装備した熟練搭乗員ペアによる偵察隊です。
ラバウルに展開した本機は現地改修され、20mm斜銃を装備し、後に本土防空戦で大型戦略爆撃機相手に奮戦した、あの夜間戦闘機「月光」隊が誕生します。
Type 2 Land-based Reconnaissance Aircraf._info_en:
A twin-engine land-based fighter developed during thirteen trial fights.
Developed as a twin-engine long-distance fighter plane that didn't succeed, was formally accepted as a reconnaissance plane, this is the "Type 2 Land Based Reconnaissance Aircraft".
This is a reconnaissance squadron composed of skilled crews equipped with the plane. Deployed in Rabaul the original plane was locally improved, equipped with two diagonally firing 20 mm guns, it fiercely fought a large-sized enemy bomber in Rabaul, and in the mainland air defense, on those battles, the night fighter "Gekkou" was born.
Type 2 Land-based Reconnaissance Aircraf._reading: にしきりくじょうていさつき(じゅくれん)

Type 2 Large Flying Boat._info:
四発の大型飛行艇「二式大型飛行艇」、通称「二式大艇」です。
巨大な翼と船のような構造を持つ機体で、長距離偵察や司令部要員の移動等に用いられました。
同時代の世界水準を大きく超えた傑作機で、今の時代もその後継は空に海に活躍しています。
Type 2 Large Flying Boat._info_en:
This is the four-engined "Type 2 Large Seaplane", otherwise known as the "Type 2 Flying Boat".
It has a large wing-like airframe, and was made for the usage of long-range reconnaissance as well as providing transportation for fleet command personnel.
It was a state-of-the-art plane exceeding the world standard during its time, and to this day its successors are still active flying in the seas and skies.

Type 2 Reconnaissance Aircraft._info:
名機「彗星艦爆」の艦上偵察機型です。
偵察用カメラと増加燃料タンクを搭載して、艦隊の目として活躍可能です。
ぜひ、彩雲と共に機動部隊で運用してね！
Type 2 Reconnaissance Aircraft._info_en:
This is the carrier-based recon aircraft variant of the "Suisei Dive Bomber".
Mounted with a surveillance camera and a larger fuel tank, it is now capable of being the fleet's eyes.
By all means, use it in your task force along with the Saiun!
Type 2 Reconnaissance Aircraft._reading: にしきかんじょうていさつき

Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai._info:
新型水上戦闘機の実戦投入までの繋ぎとして、零式艦上戦闘機をベースに急遽開発/実戦投入された水上戦闘機です。
カタパルトによる艦上運用を考慮した機材ではありませんでしたが、本機は機体及びフロート強度を改良強化して投入です。
Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai._info_en:
A new model of seaplane fighter thrown into combat in order add numbers to the fight, the base form of the Type 0 Zero Carrier Fighter has been hurriedly converted to a seaplane and put in service.
No extra equipment was added to the plane, instead, the airframe and float devices have been strengthened to handle catapult-assisted take-off.

Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai (Skilled)._info:
熟練搭乗員によって編成された「二式水戦」装備の水戦隊です。
新型水上戦闘機「強風」実戦投入までの繋ぎとして、零式艦上戦闘機をベースに急遽開発/実戦投入された水上戦闘機、二式水戦。
元々は艦上運用を考慮した機材ではありませんでしたが、機体及びフロート強度を改良強化して投入です。
Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai (Skilled)._info_en:
A squadron of "Type 2 Seaplane Fighters" operated by a skilled crewman.
Intended as a holdover until the introduction of the new fighter "Kyoufuu", these are Type 0 Fighters hurriedly converted to and deployed as seaplane fighters, and called the Type 2 Seaplane Fighter.
Although it was not originally designed with floats for shipboard operations, these aircraft have reinforced and improved seaplane floats.
Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai (Skilled)._reading: にしきすいせんかい(じゅくれん)

Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu._info:
日本陸軍が開発、配備した二式複座戦闘機、通称二式複戦、「屠龍」です。
双発複座のため比較的重武装が可能ですが、単座戦闘機に対して運動性では劣り、対戦闘機戦闘には不向きです。
戦いの後半、本土上空に飛来した戦略爆撃機B-29の迎撃で飛び立ち、劣勢ながら日本の空を守る防空戦で奮戦します。
Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu._info_en:
This is the Type 2 two-seater fighter developed and deployed by the Imperial Japanese Army, the "Toryuu".
With two seats and two engines, it can be more heavily armed. Its mobility is inferior to single-seat fighters so it is unsuited for dogfighting.
It flew sorties to intercept B-29 bombers over the Japanese mainland late in the war. Despite being outnumbered, it fought hard to defend Japanese skies in the air war.

Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C._info:
日本陸軍が開発、配備した二式複座戦闘機、通称二式複戦、「屠龍」。
その改良型重武装型です。
本機はその改良丙型に対重爆迎撃用の大口径上向き銃、いわゆる「斜銃」を試験的に備えた重爆キラー、まさしく「屠龍」の名の通りの機体。
対戦闘機戦には不向きですが、日本本土防空戦において、敵重爆に対して海軍「月光」と共に奮戦します。
Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C._info_en:
The "Toryuu" Type 2 Two-seat Fighter developed and deployed by the Imperial Japanese Army.
This is an improved and up-gunned version.
The Model C upgrade featured additional high-caliber guns meant for intercepting heavy bombers. This anti-heavy bomber Toryuu was experimentally equipped with these "oblique guns".
Though it is unsuited for dogfighting, it fought hard alongside the Navy's "Gekkou" to defend the Japanese mainland against heavy bombers.
Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C._japanese_name: 二式複戦 屠龍 丙型
Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C._localized_name: Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Dragonslayer Model C
Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C._name: Type 2 Two-seat Fighter Toryuu Model C

Type 21 Air Radar._info:
初の実用艦載電探です。
対空用ですが、対水上電探としても使用可能です。
13号電探と混載することも可能で、基本的にこの21号は大型艦に搭載されました。
Type 21 Air Radar._info_en:
This is the first practical ship-borne radar.
Primarily tasked for air search, it can also be used for surface search.
While it could be used in conjunction with the Type 13 radar, the Type 21 was basically used aboard larger warships.

Type 21 Air Radar Kai._info:
二式二号電波探信儀一型の改良型です。
様々な改良と調整によって、安定性が向上しました。
対空用ですが、対水上電探としても使用可能です。
Type 21 Air Radar Kai._info_en:
This is the twin improved version of the Type 21 air radar.
Various things have been improved, increasing its reliability.
Primarily used as an air search radar, it can also be used as a surface search radar.
Type 21 Air Radar Kai._reading: 21ごうたいくうでんたんかい

Type 21 Air Radar Kai 2._info:
初期の実用艦載電探、その改良型です。
対空用ですが、対水上電探としても使用可能です。
小型艦艇では小型でとりまわしの良い13号電探が普及していきましたが、本装備は航空巡洋艦「最上」や秋月型などに搭載運用された21号電探、そのif熟成改良型です。
Type 21 Air Radar Kai 2._info_en:
An improved version of an early ship-borne radar.
Although it was designed for anti-air, it can also be used as a surface radar.
Though the smaller and easier to handle Type 13 RADAR was more widely used amongst small ships, the Type 21 RADAR was installed on the aviation cruiser "Mogami" and the Akizuki-class, with this model being a what-if upgrade of that RADAR.

Type 22 Surface Radar._info:
初の実戦運用された対水上電探です。
当初動作不安定で実用に耐えませんでしたが、改良と調整により、徐々に効果を発揮していきます。
捜索以外にも限定的ながら射撃管制にも使用されました。
Type 22 Surface Radar._info_en:
The Type 22 Surface Radar was first used in the fighting.
It first had teething problems but an improved version became available, gradually increasing its effectiveness.
While mostly used as a search radar, it had limited use as a fire control system for ships.
Type 22 Surface Radar._reading: 22ごうたいすいじょうでんたん

Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4._info:
実戦運用された電探二号電波探信儀二型の改良型です。
新型受信機や様々な改良により、性能と安定性が向上、
実効力のあるレーダー射撃精度も可能となりました。
Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4._info_en:
This radar is a newer version of the Type 22 surface radar.
It received a new receiver plus other things, making its performance and reliability better.
It also became an improved fire control system allowing more accurate shooting.
Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4._reading: 22ごうたいすいじょうでんたんかいよん

Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 (Calibrated._info:
実戦運用された電探二号電波探信儀二型の改良型です。
新型受信機や様々な改良により、性能と安定性が向上、実効力のあるレーダー射撃精度も可能となりました。
本装備は改良型受信機への換装と各調整を施した、後期性能向上型対水上電探です。
Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 (Calibrated._info_en:
This is an improved version of the Type 22 radar that was used in the war.
New receivers and other improvements have improved its performance and stability. It is more effective at accurately guiding fire.
This radar is an improved late-model surface radar that has had a better receiver mounted and lots of tuning done.
Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 (Calibrated._japanese_name: 22号対水上電探改四(後期調整型)
Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 (Calibrated._name: Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 (Calibrated Late Model)

Type 274 Fire Control Radar._info:
レーダー先進国である紅茶の国で開発された、先進的な射撃管制レーダーシステムです。
主砲の火器管制レーダーシステムとして、特に紅茶の国の水上艦艇の対艦戦闘能力を大きく向上させます。
複数装備することで、さらに射撃精度を向上させることが可能です。
中型以上の艦艇で運用でき、紅茶の国の水上艦では改修によってさらに戦闘力を高めることも可能です。
Type 274 Fire Control Radar._info_en:
This is an advanced radar fire director system developed in the country of tea, which had advanced radar technology.
As a main gun radar fire director system, it greatly improves the anti-ship combat capabilities of surface ships of the tea country.
By equipping multiple units, it is possible to further improve shooting accuracy.
It can be operated by medium to larger ships, and the combat power of the tea country's surface ships can be further increased with improvements.
Type 274 Fire Control Radar._japanese_name: Type274 射撃管制レーダー

Type 281 Radar._info:
レーダー先進国である紅茶の国で開発された、早期警戒レーダーです。
対空警戒として上空の航空機の監視、そして水上艦の長距離探知及び同追跡が可能です。
比較的初期から実戦配備された長距離探知可能な艦上レーダーで、紅茶の国の主力戦艦や巡洋艦で運用されました。
改修していくことで、さらに同運用性を向上させることも可能です。
Type 281 Radar._info_en:
This is an early warning radar developed in the country of tea, which had advanced radar technology.
It is capable of monitoring aircraft in the sky as an anti-aircraft warning, as well as of long-range detection and tracking of surface ships.
It is a ship-based radar capable of long-range detection that has been deployed in combat from a relatively early stage, and was operated on the main battleships and cruisers of the country of tea.
By improving it, it is possible to further improve its operability.

Type 3 Active Sonar._info:
対潜兵装です。
いわゆるアクティブソナーです。
性能は残念ながら、ものすごく高くはありません。
それでも、他兵装と組み合わせて、練度の高い駆逐艦で敵潜水艦隊を文字通り駆逐してください！
Type 3 Active Sonar._info_en:
An anti-submarine weapon.
Also called the active SONAR.
It does not have impressive performance.
However, when used in tandem with other equipment, a veteran destroyer will surely put enemy submarines down!
Type 3 Active Sonar._reading: さんしきすいちゅうたんしんぎ

Type 3 Active Sonar Kai._info:
改修型の対潜兵装です。
日本海軍装備の主力アクティブソナーを改良調整、対潜戦闘の戦訓を取り入れて改修した三式水中探信儀の改良型です。
日本海軍の駆逐艦を中心として、いくつかの艦でより高い運用性を発揮します。
Type 3 Active Sonar Kai._info_en:
This is an improved piece of anti-submarine equipment.
It is an upgraded version of the main active sonar used by the Imperial Japanese Navy. The Type 3 Active Sonar has been improved by incorporating lessons learned in combat.
It has increased performance on several ships, particularly on destroyers of the Imperial Japanese Navy.

Type 3 Command Liaison Aircraft (ASW)._info:
陸軍で開発、対潜哨戒機としても運用されていた固定翼機です。
現代のSTOL(短距離離着陸機)のような性能を持ち、艦載対潜哨戒機として運用されました。
全通甲板を持つ強襲揚陸艦や軽空母などで運用可能です。
Type 3 Command Liaison Aircraft (ASW)._info_en:
A fixed-wing aircraft developed by the Army operated as an anti-submarine patrol aircraft.
Similar to modern STOL (Short Take-Off and Landing) aircraft, this plane is shipborne as an anti-submarine patrol aircraft.
It can be operated on amphibious assault ships and light aircraft carriers with flight deck.
Type 3 Command Liaison Aircraft (ASW)._reading: さんしきしきれんらくき(たいせん)

Type 3 Command Liaison Aircraft Kai._info:
陸軍で開発、対潜哨戒機としても運用されていた小型固定翼機、兵装及び磁気探知機等を強化したif改良型です。
現代のSTOL(短距離離着陸機)のような性能を持ち、艦載対潜哨戒機として運用が計画されていました。
全通甲板を持つ強襲揚陸艦や山汐丸などの特設護衛空母などで運用可能です。
Type 3 Command Liaison Aircraft Kai._info_en:
A small fixed-wing aircraft developed by the IJA as a maritime patrol aircraft. This is a what-if version with improved weapons and magnetic anomaly detectors.
Its performance is similar to modern STOL (Short Take Off and Landing) aircraft. The plan was to operate it as a carrier-based maritime patrol aircraft.
It can be operated off amphibious assault ships with through-decks or off special escort carriers like Yamashio Maru.

Type 3 Depth Charge Projector._info:
対潜兵装です。
九四式にかわる新型の爆雷投射機です。
新鋭の海防艦などに装備されました。
大量装備すれば、発見さえできれば、敵潜水艦の面制圧も…きっと可能です。
Type 3 Depth Charge Projector._info_en:
An anti-submarine weapon.
A new type of depth-charge intended to replace the Type-94.
It was deployed on the latest ships.
With a bunch of these equipped, as long as you can find the enemy, you'll be sure to wipe them out.
Type 3 Depth Charge Projector._reading: さんしきばくらいとうしゃき

Type 3 Depth Charge Projector (Concentra._info:
増大する敵潜水艦による脅威に対抗するため、三式爆雷投射機を集中配備。
舷側方向に対して、片舷6～8基、両舷12～16基の爆雷投射能力を誇る、対潜艦艇用の対潜制圧兵装です。
日振型の次級である、鵜来型以降に装備され、海上護衛や対潜哨戒に威力を発揮しました。
Type 3 Depth Charge Projector (Concentra._info_en:
A more concentrated deployment of Type 3 depth charge launchers, in order to counter the growing threat from enemy submarines.
An impressive shipborne weapon for submarine suppression, able to throw 6-8 charges per side for an impressive total of 12-16 charges.
Equipped on the Hiburi-class's successors, the Ukuru-class, where they came into extensive use in convoys and anti-submarine patrols.
Type 3 Depth Charge Projector (Concentra._japanese_name: 三式爆雷投射機 集中配備
Type 3 Depth Charge Projector (Concentra._reading: さんしきばくらいとうしゃき しゅうちゅうはいび

Type 3 Fighter Hien._info:
かの国で開発された液冷エンジンを参考に開発された、液冷エンジンを装備した陸軍戦闘機、三式戦「飛燕」です。
残念ながら信頼性に難があり、その実力を十分に発揮できませんでしたが、万全な状態であれば高い潜在力を持っています。
Type 3 Fighter Hien._info_en:
The “Hien” or Army Type 3 Fighter, was equipped with a liquid-cooled engine developed using the liquid-cooled engine from that country as a reference.
Although under test conditions it was very promising, unfortunately, its lack of reliability prevented it from ever achieving the high potential of its abilities in action.
Type 3 Fighter Hien._reading: さんしきせん ひえん

Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Gr._info:
三式戦「飛燕」を駆り、東京調布に展開して首都防空に奮戦した陸軍戦闘機隊、飛行第244戦隊です。
戦いの最終局面では、「飛燕」を空冷化した信頼性の高い「五式戦」に機種転換し、敵新型機に対抗していきます。
Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Gr._info_en:
These Type 3 Fighter “Hien” are piloted by the 244th Air Combat Group, part of the Army’s fighter forces who bravely took part in the defenses of the capital city while deployed Chofu, Tokyo.
For the final stage of the war, these “Hien’s” have had their engines upgraded to a much more reliable liquid-cooled variant used by the “Type 5 Fighter”.
Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Gr._japanese_name: 三式戦 飛燕(飛行第244戦隊)
Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Gr._localized_name: Type 3 Fighter Flying Swallow (244th Air Combat Group)
Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Gr._name: Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Group)
Type 3 Fighter Hien (244th Air Combat Gr._reading: さんしきせん ひえん(ひこうだい244せんたい)

Type 3 Fighter Hien Model 1D._info:
かの国で開発された液冷エンジンを参考に開発された、液冷エンジンを装備した陸軍戦闘機、三式戦「飛燕」、その性能向上型です。
エンジンの信頼性に課題を残していますが、武装等を強化、総合的に戦闘力は向上しています。
万全な整備状態であれば高い戦闘力を発揮します。
Type 3 Fighter Hien Model 1D._info_en:
An improved model of the Army Type 3 Fighter "Hien", equipped with a liquid-cooled engine developed using a reference engine from that country.
The engine reliability problems have been sorted out and the armament improved to increase overall combat power.
If properly maintained, it will display a high level of combat prowess.
Type 3 Fighter Hien Model 1D._japanese_name: 三式戦 飛燕一型丁
Type 3 Fighter Hien Model 1D._reading: さんしきせん ひえんいちがたてい

Type 3 Shell._info:
戦艦の主砲から放たれる対空用特殊砲弾。
榴散弾の一種で、大量の子弾が爆散、敵を編隊ごと一網打尽に殲滅することが可能。
戦艦主砲の射撃装置の問題で命中率が低いのが難点だが、艦隊の防空力を大きく高めます。
戦艦・航空戦艦・重巡洋艦が使用可能。
Type 3 Shell._info_en:
A special kind of main battery shell used by battleships that is specifically used as an anti-air weapon.
The shrapnel, when ejected from the bullet in large quantities, potentially encases and then annihilates all enemy planes in formation.
The questionable accuracy rate of the firing mechanism of the main battery of battleships is the only weakness, but this is traded for the immense AA firepower boost.
Can be deployed on battleships, aviation battleships, and heavy cruisers.

Type 3 Shell Kai._info:
戦艦などの大型艦の主砲から放たれる対空用特殊砲弾。
榴散弾の一種で、大量の子弾が爆散、敵を編隊ごと一網打尽に殲滅することを狙って開発された三式焼霰弾の改良型です。
対地ソフトスキン攻撃にも効果的です。
戦訓を採り入れ、運用性を高めると同時に暴発対策も施したif改良弾頭です。
Type 3 Shell Kai._info_en:
An anti-aircraft shell that is fired from the main guns of large ships such as battleships.
It's an improved version of the Type 3 Shell, which is a form of shrapnel that releases a lot of smaller shells and that was developed with the goal of annihilating entire enemy formations in one fell swoop.
It's also effective for attacks against soft surface targets.
This is a fictional upgrade of the warhead that took combat data into consideration in order to increase its serviceability and at the same time apply safety measures to prevent accidental explosions.

Type 3 Shell Kai 2._info:
戦艦などの大型艦の主砲から放たれる対空用特殊砲弾。
榴散弾の一種で、大量の子弾が爆散、敵を編隊ごと一網打尽に殲滅することを狙って開発された三式焼霰弾の後期改良型です。
対地ソフトスキン攻撃にも効果的、さらに戦訓を採り入れ、大和型及び金剛型改二改装艦運用性の向上、さらに暴発対策も施したif改良強化弾頭です。
Type 3 Shell Kai 2._info_en:
A specialized anti-aircraft shell used with the main guns of battleships and other large vessels.
This shell is a late-model upgraded variant of the Type 3 Incendiary Cluster Shell, a type of shrapnel shell that was developed to annihilate the enemy in a single salvo of exploding submunitions.
Its effectiveness against soft-skinned ground targets has been improved. This what-if upgrade that incorporates lessons learned during the war has increased effectiveness on Yamato-class and Kongou-class Kai Ni. It also has better countermeasures against spontaneous combustion.

Type 32 Surface Radar._info:
高性能な大型対水上電探です。
遠距離射撃にも対応できる射撃管制が可能ですが、かなり大型で重量過大です。
これを搭載すると、そうとう目立ちます！
Type 32 Surface Radar._info_en:
This is a large, high-performance surface search radar.
While it is capable of long-range search and gunfire control, it was quite heavy.
When mounted aboard ships, it becomes conspicuous because of its size!
Type 32 Surface Radar._reading: 32ごうたいすいじょうでんたん

Type 32 Surface Radar Kai._info:
高性能な大型対水上電探の調整改良型です。
遠距離射撃にも対応できるレーダー射撃管制も可能ですが、かなり大型かつ重量のある電探で大型艦しか装備できません。
また、精度の高い調整と運用には練度の高い操作員が必要です。
Type 32 Surface Radar Kai._info_en:
The Type 32 Kai is a modified, large, high-performance surface search radar.
While it is capable of long-range search and gunfire control, it is very large and heavy, hence only large ships are able to equip them.
For better use of this radar, it will require skilled and experienced crews.
Type 32 Surface Radar Kai._reading: 32ごうたいすいじょうでんたんかい

Type 33 Surface Radar._info:
対水上射撃管制用に開発された小型対水上射撃用電探です。
22号を改修して精度を上げ、探知距離・精度ともに実用レベルで運用可能です。
雷撃管制用にも使用でき、砲雷撃戦の質を大きく向上させます。
Type 33 Surface Radar._info_en:
The Type 33 radar is a compact version with the purpose of the fire control system of a ship.
With an improved version of the type 22 that raised accuracy, this radar also had improved search range and accuracy making it practical.
It can also be used for torpedo attacks and main gun firing which saw improved performance.
Type 33 Surface Radar._reading: 33ごうたいすいじょうでんたん

Type 4 20cm Anti-ground Rocket Launcher._info:
地対地ロケット兵装として、日本陸軍によって開発された試製四式噴進砲。
圧倒的な火力を集中的に投射して、敵の地上戦力や陣地を破壊制圧する目的で整備され、防御戦にも実際に投入されました。
本兵装は、同地対地噴進砲を大量に艦載、集中運用して敵地上兵力を叩く強力な艦艇用対地if装備です。
対地火力大ですが、被弾に弱く誘爆の危険もあります。
Type 4 20cm Anti-ground Rocket Launcher._info_en:
The Type 4 Rocket is a ground-to-ground rocket developed by the Imperial Japanese Army.
It was developed for the purpose of suppressing enemy troops and positions with overwhelming firepower. It was also put to use in defensive positions.
These ground-to-ground rockets were mounted on ships in multiple concentrated deployments as what-if equipment for the fleet to attack ground troops.
Although it is powerful against ground targets, there is a danger of detonations.
Type 4 20cm Anti-ground Rocket Launcher._japanese_name: 四式20cm対地噴進砲 集中配備

Type 4 Fighter Hayate._info:
陸軍の決戦機として開発・量産された傑作戦闘機キ84、四式戦「疾風」。
陸軍戦闘機部隊の主力戦闘機として配備され、捷一号作戦などで戦いました。
フィリピン戦線に投入された四式戦を装備した戦隊は、悪化した戦局の中、一時的ではあるもののレイテ上空の制空権確保に尽力しました。
Type 4 Fighter Hayate._info_en:
The Ki-84 Type 4 Fighter "Hayate" is a masterwork fighter developed and mass-produced for the IJA.
It was deployed as the core of the IJA's air force and fought in Operation Sho-go 1.
A squadron equipped with the Type 4 fighters fought to secure temporary air superiority in Leyte on the Philippines front despite the deteriorating situation.

Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu._info:
陸軍で開発された新鋭双発爆撃機キ67四式重爆撃機「飛龍」です。
爆弾搭載量は大きくないものの、軽快な運動性を誇り、機外懸架ではありますが魚雷装備も可能。
決戦機として配備され、日本爆撃機としては充実した武装と装備を持つ本機は、困難な戦局の中で、陸軍雷撃隊としても戦いました。
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu._info_en:
This is a new twin-engine bomber developed by the IJA, the Ki-67 Type 4 Heavy Bomber "Hiryuu".
It can't carry many bombs, but is light and maneuverable. It can also carry torpedoes on external hardpoints.
It was deployed as a trump card with heavier armament and more equipment than other Japanese bombers, and it fought during the harshest period of the war in the IJA bombing corps.

Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled)._info:
陸軍で開発された新鋭双発爆撃機キ67 四式重爆撃機「飛龍」です。
爆弾搭載量は大きくないものの、軽快な運動性を誇り、機外懸架ではありますが魚雷装備も可能。
決戦機として配備され、日本爆撃機としては充実の防御火力と防弾装備、各電波装備を持つ本機と熟練搭乗員による精鋭「飛龍」飛行戦隊です。
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled)._info_en:
This is a new twin-engined bomber developed by the IJA, the Ki-67 Type 4 Heavy Bomber "Hiryuu".
It can't carry many bombs, but is light and maneuverable. It can also carry torpedoes on external hardpoints.
It was deployed as a trump card with more defensive firepower and bulletproofing than normal Japanese bombers, with each plane of this skilled "Hiryuu" squadron equipped with a radio and crewed by skilled personnel.
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled)._japanese_name: 四式重爆 飛龍(熟練)

Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled) + N._info:
陸軍で開発された新鋭双発爆撃機キ67四式重爆撃機「飛龍」です。
軽快な運動性を誇り、機外懸架ながら魚雷装備も可能な本機に、空対艦ミサイルの始祖的存在であるイ号一型甲無線誘導弾の試作型を装備した誘導弾搭載機です。
陸軍航空の技術者が目指した対艦誘導弾。
本飛行隊は、同装備と熟練搭乗員で編成された精鋭基地航空隊です。
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled) + N._info_en:
The Ki-67 Type 4 Heavy Bomber is a state-of-the-art twin-engined bomber developed by the IJA, aka "Hiryuu".
It is maneuverable despite having externally mounted torpedoes. This guided-missile bomber is also equipped with the No.1 Model 1A guided missile, the ancestor of modern air-to-ship missiles.
This anti-ship ship missile was the goal of IJA aviation engineers.
This unit is an elite land-based unit with said missiles and crewed by a skilled crew.
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled) + N._japanese_name: 四式重爆 飛龍(熟練)+イ号一型甲 誘導弾
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled) + N._localized_name: Type 4 Heavy Bomber Flying Dragon (Skilled) + No.1 Model 1A Guided Missile
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled) + N._name: Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu (Skilled) + No.1 Model 1A Guided Missile

Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu + No.1 Model._info:
陸軍で開発された新鋭双発爆撃機キ67四式重爆撃機「飛龍」です。
軽快な運動性を誇り、機外懸架ながら魚雷装備も可能な本機に、空対艦ミサイルの始祖的存在であるイ号一型甲無線誘導弾の試作型を装備した誘導弾搭載機です。
陸軍航空の技術者が目指した対艦誘導弾。量産の暁には、新型襲撃機キ102乙などへの実戦配備も計画されていました。
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu + No.1 Model._info_en:
This is the latest twin-engine bomber developed by the Army, the Ki-67 Type 4 Heavy Bomber "Hiryuu".
Boasting high maneuverability, this aircraft can mount torpedoes on external hardpoints. This particular plane is a guided-missile carrier equipped with the prototype No.1 Model 1A Radio-Guided Missile, the predecessor of modern air-to-surface anti-ship missiles.
This guided missile was the objective of Army aviation engineers. The plan was to mass-produce it and arm the new Ki-102B bombers with it.
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu + No.1 Model._japanese_name: 四式重爆 飛龍+イ号一型甲 誘導弾
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu + No.1 Model._localized_name: Type 4 Heavy Bomber Flying Dragon + No.1 Model 1A Guided Missile
Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu + No.1 Model._name: Type 4 Heavy Bomber Hiryuu + No.1 Model 1A Guided Missile

Type 4 Passive Sonar._info:
小型艦艇にも装備可能な、新型パッシブソナー兵装です。
九三式水中聴音機に比べて、その対潜発見能力は格段に向上しました。
数は少ないですが、大戦末期に建造された後期型の駆逐艦などの対潜兵装として装備されました。
Type 4 Passive Sonar._info_en:
This SONAR can be equipped on smaller ships, and is a new type of armament: a passive SONAR.
Compared to the type 93 SONARs, this has increased ASW.
There are few of these because it was made in the later part of the war, and were equipped by some of the newer destroyers.
Type 4 Passive Sonar._reading: よんしきすいちゅうちょうおんき

Type 42 Air Radar._info:
高性能な大型対空電探です。
英国のレーダーを参考に開発したため、他の対空電探より高い性能を発揮しました。
Type 42 Air Radar._info_en:
This is a large, high-performance anti-aircraft radar.
Since it was developed from a British radar, it has better air search performance than other radars.

Type 42 Air Radar Kai 2._info:
高性能な大型対空電探です。
英軍のレーダーを参考に開発された元々地上設置用の大型電探で、高い精度が期待されていました。
本兵装は、海外の技術や戦訓を採り入れて改良、さらに大型艦の艦載射撃レーダーとの連携も図るif大型改修電探です。
Type 42 Air Radar Kai 2._info_en:
A high-performance large anti-air RADAR.
It was developed for use in fixed installations using British RADARs as a reference. It has high accuracy because of this.
This large RADAR incorporates foreign technology and lessons learned during the war, with this what-if upgrade also designed to link up with the fire-control RADARs on large ships.

Type 91 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director._info:
高角砲の対空射撃用の高射装置です。
高射機と高射射撃盤を組み合わせ、高角砲の有効な対空射撃をサポートします。
やや、旧式ではありますが、主力の戦艦や巡洋艦などに搭載されました。
Type 91 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director._info_en:
This is the high-angle guns' director.
The director and its firing dish together locate a target and find its best-fit firing angle.
...somewhat. This one is obsolete, and its primary function is already built-in on battleships, cruisers, etc.

Type 91 Armor Piercing Shell._info:
遠距離砲撃戦における秘密兵器「九一式徹甲弾」。
海中突入後急激に向きを変え、魚雷のように敵艦水線下に突き進み、喫水下を破砕する特殊徹甲弾です。
水中弾効果を高める形状設計のため、空気抵抗も減少して射程も延伸します。
戦艦・航空戦艦等が使用可能。
Type 91 Armor Piercing Shell._info_en:
A long-range artillery secret weapon known as the "Type 91 Armor-Piercing Shell".
This type of ammunition will spin rapidly after exiting the gun's barrel, enter the water, and penetrate the target's armor below the waterline like a torpedo, crushing the hull of the ship.
The shell's shape enhances underwater penetration while also improving the range by decreasing air resistance.
Available for Battleship, Aviation Battleship, etc...
Type 91 Armor Piercing Shell._reading: きゅういちしきてっこうだん

Type 93 Passive Sonar._info:
対潜兵装です。
いわゆるパッシブソナーです。
性能は残念ながら、あまり良くはありません。
でも、あるとないとでは大違い！対潜作戦のお供に、ぜひどうぞ！
Type 93 Passive Sonar._info_en:
An anti-submarine weapon.
Also known as the passive SONAR.
It may not perform its job well, but it is better than nothing.
Please use it for anti-submarine operations!
Type 93 Passive Sonar._reading: きゅうさんしきすいちゅうちょうおんき

Type 94 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director._info:
比較的新しい高角砲対空射撃用の高射装置です。
本高射機は測距儀がパッケージされており、高角砲の有効な対空射撃をサポートします。
新造大型艦や、防空駆逐艦 「秋月」 型に搭載されました。
Type 94 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director._info_en:
This is the new high-angle anti-aircraft unit.
The equipment includes a range-finder, providing high-angle anti-aircraft guns with more effective anti-air capability.
Newer large-scale ships and the "Akizuki-class" anti-aircraft destroyers have the unit pre-installed.

Type 94 Depth Charge Projector._info:
対潜兵装です。
もっとも標準的な爆雷投射機です。駆逐艦・海防艦等の小型艦艇に対潜水艦用火力として装備されました。
若干旧式化しつつありますが、敵潜を発見さえできれば、その威力は十分です。
Type 94 Depth Charge Projector._info_en:
The standard depth charge of the fleet.
It is mainly used by destroyers, coastal defense ships, or other smaller ships for anti-submarine duty.
While a bit obsolete, it does the job once the enemy submarine has been located.
Type 94 Depth Charge Projector._reading: きゅうよんしきばくらいとうしゃき

Type 95 Depth Charge._info:
対潜水艦に使用する増加爆雷装備です。
駆逐艦や海防艦などに爆雷投射機やソナー類などの対潜装備ともに装備することで、対潜能力の向上が図れます。
Type 95 Depth Charge._info_en:
This is additional depth charge equipment used for anti-submarine warfare.
Equipping it together with other ASW equipment such as depth charge projectors or sonars on destroyers, coastal defense ships, and the like can increase their anti-submarine capabilities.

Type 96 150cm Searchlight._info:
戦艦装備用の大型探照灯です。
夜戦時に敵に照射することで味方艦隊の攻撃を支援できますが、照射艦は敵艦隊からの集中攻撃を浴びるリスクがあります。
(戦艦級のみが装備可能です)
Type 96 150cm Searchlight._info_en:
Large-scale searchlight fitted for battleships.
Shining the searchlight at the enemy can assist friendly ship's attacks during the night battle, but there is risk of having the enemy focus their fire on the user.
(Only battleships may equip this)
Type 96 150cm Searchlight._reading: 96しき150センチたんしょうとう

Type 96 Fighter._info:
旧式の艦上戦闘機です。
零戦より前に実戦配備されていた旧型機ですが、優れた格闘戦能力を持っています。
武装や航続力、速度の点で既に二線級ではありますが、防空戦闘には活用可能です。
Type 96 Fighter._info_en:
This is an obsolete carrier-based fighter.
It is an old machine that was in operational service before the Zero-fighter, and boasts a history of exemplary aerial combat performance.
With standard armaments and cruising capacity, its speed is now second class, but it is still possible to utilize this aircraft in a dogfight.
Type 96 Fighter._reading: きゅうろくしきかんせん

Type 96 Fighter Kai._info:
旧式の艦上戦闘機の性能向上タイプです。
零戦より前に実戦配備されていた旧型機ですが、優れた格闘戦能力を持っています。
武装や速度の点で既に二線級ではありますが、防空戦闘には活用可能です。
Type 96 Fighter Kai._info_en:
An improved version of an old carrier-based fighter aircraft.
It is an outdated aircraft that was deployed in combat long before the Zero Fighter, but it possesses outstanding dogfighting capabilities.
While its armament and speed are already second-class, it can still be used for air defense.

Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft._info:
陸上航空基地に展開、対艦攻撃などを主任務とした陸上攻撃機です。
大きな航続距離を持ち、対艦はもちろん対地攻撃も可能な本機は、中攻とも呼ばれ、初期の海軍基地航空戦力の基幹兵力を構成しました。
本機の後継機が、あの有名な「一式陸攻」です。
Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft._info_en:
Deployed at the Navy's land-based airfields, its primary mission was anti-ship bombardment.
With its long range, although it was naturally designed for anti-ship missions, it was used against land-based installations as well, it was also nicknamed the Rikko, and it formed the core of the Navy's early air power.
The successor to this design was the more famous "Type 1 Land Attacker".
Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft._reading: きゅうろくしきりくこう

Type 97 Medium Tank (Chi-Ha)._info:
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、九七式中戦車、通称「チハ車」。
列強の新型戦車との対機甲戦闘には不向きでしたが、数多く量産され日本機甲部隊の主力となりました。
占守島の戦いでは、戦車第11連隊で多くの犠牲を出しつつ奮戦しています。
単独では海上機動できませんが、接岸擱座揚陸能力を持つ二等輸送艦などに搭載することで、着上陸戦闘が可能です。
Type 97 Medium Tank (Chi-Ha)._info_en:
The Type 97 medium tank was the main tank of the Imperial Japanese Army, commonly known as the "Chi-Ha".
Though it was unsuited for straight-up fights with newer tanks of the other great powers, it was produced in large numbers and used as the main tank of the IJA.
At the Battle of Shimushu, the 11th Tank Regiment fought bravely and sustained many casualties.
Though they cannot maneuver at sea without support, they can be loaded onto a 2nd class transport ship that has the ability to beach itself so they can perform amphibious landings.
Type 97 Medium Tank (Chi-Ha)._reading: きゅうななしきしゅ戦車(チハ)

Type 97 Medium Tank New Turret (Chi-Ha K._info:
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、歩兵支援に主眼をおいた九七式中戦車、通称「チハ車」。
同戦車の対機甲戦闘力向上を図るべく、新開発の貫通力の高い新主砲を搭載した改良後期型、通称「チハ車改」です。
※単独で海上機動できませんが、接岸擱座揚陸能力を持つ二等輸送艦などに搭載することで、着上陸戦闘が可能です。
Type 97 Medium Tank New Turret (Chi-Ha K._info_en:
The Type 97 medium tank, commonly known as the "Chi-Ha", was the main tank of the IJA used primarily as infantry support.
In order to improve the Chi-Ha's anti-armor capability for its role as infantry support, the "Chi-Ha Kai" was equipped with a new main gun with better penetration power.
※Though they cannot maneuver at sea without support, they can be loaded onto a 2nd class transport ship that has the ability to beach itself so they can perform amphibious landings.
Type 97 Medium Tank New Turret (Chi-Ha K._japanese_name: 九七式中戦車 新砲塔(チハ改)
Type 97 Medium Tank New Turret (Chi-Ha K._name: Type 97 Medium Tank New Turret (Chi-Ha Kai)

Type 97 Torpedo Bomber._info:
当時の世界水準を遥かに上回る艦上攻撃機傑作機。
優れた航続距離を誇り、速度や防弾装備は劣るものの、初期の機動部隊艦載機の主力攻撃機として大活躍しました。
「九七艦攻」と呼ばれ、雷撃・水雷爆撃をこなす主力艦上攻撃機ですが、徐々に現役を退いていきます。
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber._info_en:
This aircraft is capable of long-range cruising in the early days of the war.
Despite being unarmored and slow, it had a great operational range, and in the early days of hostilities was the main attack aircraft of the Carrier Task Force.
Called the "Type 97 Attacker", it was mainly used for torpedo bombing of enemy ships, but was gradually phased out of that role.
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber._reading: きゅうななしきかんこう

Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group)._info:
初期の機動部隊を支えた主力攻撃機「九七艦攻」。
旧式化た同機を対潜哨戒機バージョンとして運用する九三一航空隊所属の「九七艦攻」装備飛行隊です。
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group)._info_en:
The "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was the main attacker in the early days of the Carrier Task Force.
This "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" saw service with the 931st Air Group for anti-submarine warfare duties.
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group)._reading: きゅうななしきかんこう(きゅうさんいちくう)

Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group/Sk._info:
初期の機動部隊を支えた主力攻撃機「九七艦攻」。
旧式化した同機を対潜哨戒機バージョンとして運用する九三一航空隊所属の「九七艦攻」装備飛行隊、その熟練搭乗員ペアによる艦上対潜哨戒機です。
海上護衛部隊の翼として、水面下の脅威から艦隊や船団を護ります。
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group/Sk._info_en:
The "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" underpinned the attack squadrons of the early carrier task forces.
This unit is an anti-submarine patrol variant of the obsolete "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" operated by skilled pilots of the 931 Air Group who run anti-submarine patrols off carriers.
They are the wings of the maritime escort squadrons that protect fleets and convoys from underwater threats.
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (931 Air Group/Sk._japanese_name: 九七式艦攻(九三一空/熟練)

Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)._info:
優れた航続距離を誇り、初期の機動部隊艦載機の主力攻撃機として大活躍した傑作艦上攻撃機「九七艦攻」。
