同機を装備した本部隊は、高い技量と豊かな指導力を兼ね備えた村田隊長の率いる精鋭九七艦攻隊です。
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)._info_en:
Boasting an excellent cruising range, the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was a masterpiece carrier-capable attacker that played a major role as the primary attacker on board Mobile Force ships.
The command squadron equipped with this plane was the elite attack squadron led by Captain Murata, who combined high skill with abundant leadership.
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)._reading: きゅうななしきかんこう(むらたたい)

Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Skilled)._info:
熟練搭乗員で構成された「九七艦攻」装備の艦攻隊です。
速度や防弾装備は劣るものの優れた航続距離と熟練搭乗員の腕で、緒戦の機動部隊と共に大活躍を演じました。
雷撃・水平爆撃をこなす主力艦上攻撃機ですが、徐々に現役を退いていきます。
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Skilled)._info_en:
This particular "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was used by skilled pilots.
While slow and unarmored, it had great operational range and in the hands of skilled aircrews, played an important role in the task force during the breakout of hostilities.
Capable of torpedo runs and horizontal bombing against enemy ships, it was gradually phased out from active service.
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Skilled)._reading: きゅうななしきかんこう(じゅくれん)

Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadro._info:
優れた航続距離を誇り、速度や防弾装備は劣るものの、初期の機動部隊艦載機の主力攻撃機として大活躍した傑作艦上攻撃機「九七艦攻」。
本部隊は、闘志と高い技量を兼ね備えた友永隊長の率いる九七艦攻隊です。
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadro._info_en:
The "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was the mainstay attack aircraft during the early days of the Carrier Task Force, renowned for its operational range despite being slow and unarmored.
This squadron was led by Commander Tomonaga who was spirited and highly skilled.
Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadro._reading: きゅうななしきかんこう(ともながたい)

Type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane (Night R._info:
水雷戦隊旗艦用に開発された水上夜間偵察機です。
長時間の滞空性能を持つ黒く塗装された機体に、夜間索敵能力に優れた搭乗員が乗りこみます(条件が整えば夜戦を支援する「夜間触接」が発生する可能性があります)。
Type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane (Night R._info_en:
This is a night reconnaissance seaplane developed for torpedo squadron flagships.
The airframe is painted black has a skilled crew with excellent night-time detection ability, and can stay in the air for long periods of time (if conditions are right, "night contact" may occur to support night battles).
Type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane (Night R._japanese_name: 九八式水上偵察機(夜偵)
Type 98 Reconnaissance Seaplane (Night R._reading: きゅうはちしきすいじょうていさつき(やてい)

Type 99 Dive Bomber._info:
複葉の九六艦爆から一新、単葉の近代的な艦上爆撃機として登場しました。
「九九艦爆」と呼ばれ、「九七艦攻」と共に初期の機動部隊の攻撃隊戦力の中核を担います。
固定脚の低速機であるため、より高性能な高速艦爆「彗星」にその座を譲っていきました。
Type 99 Dive Bomber._info_en:
It has been completely redesigned from the biplane Type 96 Carrier Attacker and resulted in a modern monoplane carrier-based bomber.
Called the "Type 99 Dive Bomber" and alongside the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", it formed the core of the initial task force's strength.
As it was a low-speed, fixed-gear aircraft, it was replaced by the more advanced high-speed "Comet" naval bomber.
Type 99 Dive Bomber._reading: きゅうきゅうしきかんばく

Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron)._info:
緒戦の空母機動部隊の打撃力の中核を担う「九九艦爆」。
やや設計の古い固定脚低速機ですが稼働率や信頼性は高く、特に高い練度を誇る江草隊長の率いる艦爆隊の急降下爆撃は、驚異的な命中率を誇ります。
Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron)._info_en:
The "Type 99 Dive Bomber" formed the backbone of strike groups of the carrier task force at the beginning of hostilities.
Despite being of old design with a slow speed and fixed landing gear, it has high availability and reliability, especially when used by the veteran Captain Egusa renowned for its impressive dive bombing accuracy.
Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron)._reading: きゅうきゅうしきかんばく(えぐさたい)

Type 99 Dive Bomber (Skilled)._info:
熟練搭乗員で構成された「九九艦爆」装備の艦爆隊です。
「九七艦攻」と共に初期機動部隊の打撃力の中核を担います。
稼働率や信頼性は高いものの、やや設計の古い固定脚低速機であるため、より高性能な高速艦爆「彗星」にその座を譲っていきます。
Type 99 Dive Bomber (Skilled)._info_en:
This particular "Type 99 Dive Bomber" was used by skilled pilots.
Along with the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", it was the core of the initial task force's striking power.
Although it has high availability and reliability, it was a low-speed, fixed-leg aircraft with a somewhat outdated design, being gradually replaced by the more capable high-speed "Suisei" naval bomber.
Type 99 Dive Bomber (Skilled)._reading: きゅうきゅうしきかんばく(じゅくれん)

Type 99 Dive Bomber Model 22._info:
複葉の九六艦爆から一新、単葉の近代的な艦上爆撃機として登場した「九九艦爆」。
固定脚の低速機ではありましたが、「九七艦攻」と共に初期の機動部隊の攻撃隊戦力の中核を担いました。
後期改良機の二二型ではエンジンを換装、主に速度などの性能向上を図りました。
大戦後半期に投入された新鋭機と比べると、残念ながらその旧式化は否めません。
Type 99 Dive Bomber Model 22._info_en:
The Type 99 was introduced as a modern monoplane replacement for the "Type 96 Biplane".
Although it was a slow aircraft with fixed landing gear, it formed the core of the attack squadrons along with the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" in the early days of the carrier task forces.
In the model 22, a late-stage upgrade, its engine was replaced to improve speed.
Despite this, it is still obsolete compared to newer aircraft introduced late in the war.

Type 99 Dive Bomber Model 22 (Skilled)._info:
複葉の九六艦爆から一新、単葉の近代的な艦上爆撃機として登場した「九九艦爆」。
固定脚の低速機ではありましたが、「九七艦攻」と共に初期の機動部隊の攻撃隊戦力の中核を担いました。
後期改良機の二二型ではエンジンを換装、主に速度などの性能向上を図ります。
既に旧式であることは否めませんが、本艦爆隊は、熟練搭乗員で構成された精鋭九九艦爆隊です。
Type 99 Dive Bomber Model 22 (Skilled)._info_en:
The Type 99 was introduced as a modern monoplane replacement for the "Type 96 Biplane".
Although it was a slow aircraft with fixed landing gear, it formed the core of the attack squadrons along with the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" in the early days of the carrier task forces.
In its upgrade to the model 22 in the latter stages of the war, its engine was replaced to improve speed.
It is undeniably obsolete, but this elite Type 99 squadron is crewed by skilled pilots.
Type 99 Dive Bomber Model 22 (Skilled)._japanese_name: 九九式艦爆二二型(熟練)

Type A Kouhyouteki._info:
独自開発された「特殊潜航艇」です。
軽巡洋艦や甲標的母艦に改装した水上機母艦、そして潜水艦が搭載して運用します。
二発の魚雷を装備し、敵艦に肉薄して雷撃、艦隊決戦を補助する特殊兵器です。
Type A Kouhyouteki._info_en:
This is a Japanese-made, distinctive "Midget Submarine".
This can be utilized by light cruisers, seaplane tenders remodeled as midget submarine tenders, and submarines.
Equipped with two torpedoes, this is a unique weapon that can approach and attack enemy ships in order to support open-sea warfare.
Type A Kouhyouteki._reading: こうひょうてきこうがた

Type C Kouhyouteki._info:
独自開発された「特殊潜航艇」、その後期改良型です。
甲型を拡張、発電用ディーゼルエンジンを搭載した乙型をさらに改良熟成しました。
甲標的母艦や新型の水上機母艦、そして潜水艦などで運用可能です。
元来は艦隊決戦を補助する攻撃型兵器でしたが、後期の戦域では防御用兵器としても運用され、反復出撃を実現、奮戦健闘した部隊も存在します。
Type C Kouhyouteki._info_en:
A late model of the domestically produced "Special Midget Submarine".
An enlarged Type A with a diesel turbine that makes it better than the Type B.
It can be operated from midget sub tenders, a new model seaplane tender, or submarines.
It was originally meant to be an offensive support weapon during the decisive battle, but it was used as a defensive weapon in the latter stages of the war; the units fought bravely over many sorties.
Type C Kouhyouteki._reading: こうひょうてきへいがた

Type D Kouhyouteki Kai (Kouryuu Kai)._info:
独自開発された「特殊潜航艇」、その後期改良型のさらなる発展型です。
従来の甲標的を大型化、航続距離や通信能力を強化、搭乗員も5名に拡張、艇首に45cm魚雷発射管2基を備えるミニ潜水艦に近づいた強化発展型甲標的です。
本来はその戦局から艦上での運用を前提の設計でしたが、改良型の本艇は同運用に対応した水上艦での積極運用が可能です。
Type D Kouhyouteki Kai (Kouryuu Kai)._info_en:
This was an independently developed "Special Submarine" that was an improvement over the previous late-model.
It is an enlarged version of the Type-A Midget Submarine with increased cruising range and communications capability. With the crew count increased to 5 members and 2 bow-mounted 45 cm torpedo tubes, this is closer to a mini-submarine than an improved midget submarine.
It was originally designed to be operated from a ship, but this improved model can operate independently to support other ships.
Type D Kouhyouteki Kai (Kouryuu Kai)._japanese_name: 甲標的 丁型改(蛟龍改)
Type D Kouhyouteki Kai (Kouryuu Kai)._reading: こうひょうてき ていがたかい(こうりゅうかい)

Type124 ASDIC._info:
早くから潜水艦との闘いを経験した紅茶の国の研究チーム、Anti-Submarine Detection Investigation Committeeで開発された対潜探知システムです。
「ASDIC」と呼ばれた同システム群は進化を重ね、今日のアクティブソナーへと発展していきます。
124型は大戦初期から運用されていた駆逐艦に搭載されました。
Type124 ASDIC._info_en:
An anti-submarine detection system developed by the research team, Anti-Submarine Detection Investigation Committee, from the country of tea that had early experience fighting submarines.
The system called "ASDIC" would evolve into modern active sonar.
The Type 124 was mounted on destroyers at the start of the Great War.

Type144/147 ASDIC._info:
紅茶の国で開発された対潜探知システム「ASDIC」。
その改良発展型です。
我が水中探信儀にあたるシステムですが、対潜探知技術の蓄積と144型と147型の複合装備により、精度が大きく向上しています。
ヘッジホッグやスキッドなどの進んだ対潜火器と組み合わせることで、より強力なASW(対潜戦)が可能となります。
Type144/147 ASDIC._info_en:
The anti-submarine detection system developed in the country of tea, "ASDIC".
This is an improved model.
Although it is analogous to our active sonars, the anti-submarine detection technology implemented makes the Type 144 and Type 147 have superior accuracy.
By pairing it with advanced anti-submarine equipment such as the Hedgehog and the Squid, you can have more powerful ASW attacks.

Underway Replenishment._info:
戦闘航海中の海上で燃料弾薬を補給することが可能です。
これを保持した状態で燃料が欠乏すると戦闘航海中に「洋上補給」が発動し、燃料弾薬が洋上で「補給」されます。
長期戦となる艦隊決戦のサポートにご活用ください。
(発動すると消滅します。)
Underway Replenishment._info_en:
It is possible to perform resupply on the seas to ships performing combat sailing.
When fuel is low while this is being held, "Maritime Resupply" will happen, and fuel & ammo will be "replenished" on the seas.
Please use this well as a support for the final battle, which could become a war of attrition.
(Will disappear when activated.)
Underway Replenishment._special: Replenishes fuel and ammo of the fleet in sortie

WG42 (Wurfgerät 42)._info:
かの国で開発された対地対艦攻撃用の艦載ロケットランチャー装備「WG42」です。
Uボートにも搭載され、実際に運用されました。
命中精度には難がありますが、ごく浅い深度なら水面下から発射可能な、潜水艦発射対地ミサイルのご先祖様のような装備で、主に対地攻撃に有効です。
WG42 (Wurfgerät 42)._info_en:
The "WG42" is a ship-borne rocket launcher developed in that country for anti-ground attacks.
It was also used aboard U-boats where it saw practical use.
Mainly effective for anti-ground strikes, it suffered from poor accuracy, however, it can be fired from a shallow depth similar to the submarine-launched anti-ground missiles of today.

Walrus._info:
紅茶の国で開発運用された、セイウチの名前を持つカタパルト発進可能な複葉飛行艇タイプのやや旧式な偵察機です。
低速ではありながら使い勝手が良く、木製型が大量生産され、戦艦Rodneyをはじめとした紅茶の国の戦艦や重巡の目として、艦載運用されました。
本装備は、夜偵バージョンの水上戦闘艦搭載機として実装です。
Eagles do not breed doves!
Walrus._info_en:
A slightly old-fashioned reconnaissance flying boat biplane that can be launched by catapult, named after the walrus, developed and operated in the country of black tea.
Although it is slow, it is easy to use, with a mass-produced wooden frame, and it was used on battleships and heavy cruisers from the country of tea, including the battleship Rodney.
This equipment is implemented in its ship-born plane night reconnaissance version, for surface combat.
Eagles do not breed doves!

XF5U._info:
米海軍が名機「F4U」を生み出した航空機メーカーに発注した円盤翼を持つ独特な機体の試作新型艦上戦闘機です。
「Flying Pancake」とも呼ばれた革新的な機体は、STOL性と高い運動性能、そして頑丈な機体強度を持っています。
ぜひ米空母に搭載して、幻の戦闘配備を！
XF5U._info_en:
A prototype carrier-based fighter with a unique disc wing ordered by the USN from the maker of the famous F4U.
Known as the "Flying Pancake", this innovative plane has STOL capabilities, high maneuverability, and a sturdy airframe.
Go on and equip them on US carriers and deploy the dream team!
XF5U._reading: エックス,エフ,ファイブ,ユー

Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight._info:
圧倒的な空戦技量を誇る岩本小隊長を擁する「零式艦上戦闘機21型」装備の艦戦隊です。
零戦の優れた格闘戦能力と長大な航続距離、そして搭乗員の高い技量で圧倒的な強さを誇ります。
開戦から珊瑚海海戦まで「瑞鶴」の上空を護りました。
Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight._info_en:
Commanded by squadron commander Iwamoto, the great dogfighting expert, a carrier-based squadron equipped with the "Type 21 Zero Fighter".
The excellent combat ability and the long range of the zero fighters combined with the skills of the pilots result in overwhelming strength.
Protecting the skies above "Zuikaku" during the Battle of the Coral Sea.
Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight._reading: れいせん21がた(つきいわもとしょうたい)

Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Fligh._info:
圧倒的な空戦技量を誇るエース、岩本小隊長を擁する「零式艦上戦闘機52型」装備の艦戦隊です。
卓越した空戦技量で零戦の後期改良型を駆る「零戦虎徹」は、機体の質的優位性が失われても果敢に敵機に挑み、撃墜を重ねていきました。
Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Fligh._info_en:
Commanded by squadron commander Iwamoto, the great dogfighting ace, a carrier-based squadron equipped with "Type 52 Zero Fighters".
A late model of the Zero fighter piloted by an excellent pilot, the "Reisen Kotetsu", even if the plane is weaker than its enemies, it will still boldly challenge them and shoot them down without fail.
Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Fligh._reading: れいせん52がたこう(つきいわもとしょうたい)

Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)._card_reading: れいしきかんせん52がたへい(ろくまるいちくう)
Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)._info:
零戦の最終的な量産型「零式艦上戦闘機52丙型」です。
武装及び防御力が強化されました。
その分、若干機動性は失われています。
本航空隊は同機材を装備して、再建を目指す空母機動部隊の制空戦闘を担います。
Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)._info_en:
The Zero fighter's final production model is the "Type Zero Carrier-Based Fighter Model 52C".
Weaponry and durability have been enhanced.
However, mobility has been somewhat impaired.
This is the same plane used by the reformed aircraft carrier mobile squadrons, responsible for controlling the skies.
Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)._reading: れいせん52がたへい(ろくまるいちくう)

Zero Fighter Model 52C (Hachiman Force)._info:
零戦の最終的な量産型「零式艦上戦闘機52丙型」です。
武装及び防御力が強化されました。その分、若干機動性は失われています。
「八幡部隊」は、洋上の敵航空母艦への空襲による撃破を目指して編成され、硫黄島に進出した部隊です。
圧倒的な米艦載機の前に、対抗できず硫黄島にて壊滅しました。
Zero Fighter Model 52C (Hachiman Force)._info_en:
The "Zero Fighter Model 52C" was the last mass-produced variant of the Zero.
Its armaments and armor have been upgraded in exchange for some mobility.
The "Hachiman Squadron" was formed and deployed to Iwo Jima to attack and destroy enemy carriers from the air.
Faced with overwhelming numbers of US carrier aircraft, it was destroyed without offering much resistance.
Zero Fighter Model 52C (Hachiman Force)._reading: れいせんごにがたへい（はちまんぶたい）

Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight)._info:
巧みな操縦技術を持つ岩井小隊長を擁する「零式艦上戦闘機52型丙」装備の艦戦隊です。
「52型丙」では、敵新型機に対抗するため、火力及び防御力が強化されました。
その分機動性は若干低下していますが、熟練搭乗員の巧みな操縦技術でカバーします。
Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight)._info_en:
A carrier-based squadron equipped with "Type 52 Model C Zero Fighters" commanded by the skilled squadron commander Iwai.
The firepower and armor of the "Type 52C" were upgraded in order to counter new enemy planes.
Although the maneuverability suffered slightly, it can be covered by the skilled piloting of the pilots.
Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight)._reading: れいせん52がたへい(つきいわいしょうたい)

Zero Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber /._info:
遂に飛行隊を預かることになった「ゼロファイターゴッド」岩井隊長率いる、「零式艦上戦闘機62型」装備の爆戦隊です。
整備の行き届いた「62型」を駆り、高機動戦闘爆撃機として敵艦に爆弾を叩き付け、しかるのち制空戦闘に参加します。
Zero Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber /._info_en:
The last command of Lt. Iwai, the "Zero Fighter God", a bombing squadron equipped with "Type 62 Zero Fighter-bombers".
Equipped with "Type 62s", the quick-response fighter-bomber squadron that can bomb enemy ships and participate in taking air superiority.
Zero Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber /._reading: れいせん62がた(ばくせん/いわいたい)

Zuiun._info:
水上偵察機を発展させ、急降下爆撃可能な水偵として開発された「瑞雲」。
空戦フラップまで装備した高性能な多用途機で、水上機母艦や、航空巡洋艦などからの運用も可能です。
「伊勢」型を改装した「航空戦艦」で集中運用、水上打撃機動部隊を編制するのも楽しいですよ！
Zuiun._info_en:
Derived from floatplanes, "Zuiun" was developed as a reconnaissance plane able to dive-bomb.
Equipped with variable flaps, it is a very fine-tuned multirole aircraft, and is able to be used on seaplane tenders or aircraft-carrying cruisers.
It is also fun to group an "aircraft-carrying battleship" division, mounting it on aircraft-carrying battleships which are modified "Ise-class".

Zuiun (631 Air Group)._info:
急降下も可能な多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。
高価かつ高性能潜水艦搭載攻撃機「晴嵐」を運用する潜水艦部隊の航空隊として編成された第六三一海軍航空隊。
その六三一空の「瑞雲」による練成部隊です。
Zuiun (631 Air Group)._info_en:
Multi-purpose recon seaplane "Zuiun" that is capable of performing sudden dive-bombing attacks.
The 631st Navy Air Force utilized as a submarine-launched seaplane group to operate the expensive, high-performance attack aircraft "Seiran".
This "Zuiun" was used by the 631st Navy Air Group for training.
Zuiun (631 Air Group)._reading: ずいうん(ろくさんいちくう)

Zuiun (634 Air Group)._info:
急降下も可能な多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。
伊勢型航空戦艦等での艦隊運用を前提に編成・錬成した、六三四航空部隊所属の瑞雲飛行隊です。
Zuiun (634 Air Group)._info_en:
The "Zuiun" was a multirole reconnaissance seaplane capable of carrying out dive-bombing.
This Zuiun belongs to the 634th Air Group, grouped and trained for practical application on aircraft-carrying battleships such as Ise and Hyuuga.
Zuiun (634 Air Group)._reading: ずいうん(ろくさんよんくう)

Zuiun (634 Air Group/Skilled)._info:
急降下爆撃も可能な高性能多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。
航空戦艦「伊勢」「日向」等での海上での艦隊運用を前提に編成され、錬成を重ねた六三四航空隊所属の「瑞雲」飛行隊。
実際に航空戦艦での艦隊運用は叶いませんでしたが、その精鋭「瑞雲」隊は、今ここに。
Zuiun (634 Air Group/Skilled)._info_en:
A highly efficient multi-purpose "Zuiun" reconnaissance seaplane that is also capable of dive bombing.
This is a "Zuiun" air force that was assembled for surface fleet operations with ships like aviation battleships such as Ise or Hyūga, and that was part of the veteran Air Group 634.
While it did not actually get to operate from aviation battleships in the end, now is your chance to deploy this elite "Zuiun" group.

Zuiun Kai 2 (634 Air Group)._info:
急降下爆撃も可能な高性能多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。
航空戦艦「伊勢」「日向」に搭載し、海上の艦隊運用を前提に編成され、錬成を重ねた六三四航空隊所属の「瑞雲」飛行隊。
同12型をさらにチューンナップ、最後まで粘り強く戦い抜いた傑作多用途水上偵察機の最終強化型です。
Zuiun Kai 2 (634 Air Group)._info_en:
The "Zuiun" is a high-performance multi-purpose reconnaissance floatplane capable of dive-bombing.
Carried aboard the aviation battleships "Ise" and "Hyuuga", the 634th Air Group was formed of "Zuiuns" and refined for operations at sea.
This is the final enhanced version of the masterpiece multi-purpose floatplane, further improved from the Model 12, which fought tenaciously to the end.
Zuiun Kai 2 (634 Air Group)._reading: ずいうんかいに（ろくさんよんくう）

Zuiun Kai 2 (634 Air Group/Skilled)._info:
急降下爆撃も可能な高性能多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。
航空戦艦「伊勢」「日向」に搭載し、海上の艦隊運用を前提に編成され、錬成を重ねた六三四航空隊所属の「瑞雲」飛行隊。
最後まで粘り強く戦い抜いた傑作多用途水上偵察機の最終強化型、同機を駆る六三四空の精鋭たちによる最精鋭瑞雲隊です。
今、最精鋭「瑞雲」隊を、君に。
Zuiun Kai 2 (634 Air Group/Skilled)._info_en:
The "Zuiun" is a high-performance multi-purpose reconnaissance floatplane capable of dive-bombing.
Carried aboard the aviation battleships "Ise" and "Hyuuga", the 634th Air Group was formed of "Zuiuns" and refined for operations at sea.
This is the most elite Zuiun squadron of the 634th Air Group, flying the ultimate masterpiece version of the multi-purpose floatplane and fighting tenaciously to the end.
Now, the most elite "Zuiun" squadron is yours.
Zuiun Kai 2 (634 Air Group/Skilled)._japanese_name: 瑞雲改二(六三四空/熟練)

Zuiun Model 12._info:
急降下爆撃まで可能な多用水上偵察機「瑞雲」。
空戦フラップ装備の高性能多用途機である本機のエンジンを、より強力な金星62型に換装した「瑞雲改良型」の新鋭機です。
Zuiun Model 12._info_en:
The "Zuiun" was a multirole reconnaissance seaplane capable of carrying out dive-bombing.
This is a state-of-the-art "Zuiun Kai Model" high-performance multi-purpose plane equipped with air combat flaps, had its engine replaced with the more powerful Venus 62 type engine.

Zuiun Model 12 (634 Air Group)._info:
高性能多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」の改良型「瑞雲12型」。
同機によって編成された「伊勢」型航空戦艦などでの艦隊運用を担う六三四航空隊所属の「瑞雲12型」飛行隊です。
Zuiun Model 12 (634 Air Group)._info_en:
The "Zuiun Model 12" is an improved, high-performance version of the "Zuiun" reconnaissance seaplane.
This is the "Zuiun Model 12", belonging to the 634th Air Group, responsible for fleet operations of those seaplanes on the "Ise-class" aviation battleships.
Zuiun Model 12 (634 Air Group)._reading: ずいうん12がた(ろくさんよんくう)
